Name: Hotel Malte - Astotel
Description:
Located in the 2nd district next to the Stock Exchange, the Louvre and Place des Victoires, Hotel Malta provides a superb location for a memorable stay. Whether you want to shop in the heart of the department store neighbourhood or visit one of the main business centres of Paris, Malta Hotel is the place to be. Elegantly concealed behind a facade dating from the seventeenth century, let yourself be seduced by our garden patio, a pleasurable experience on sunny days, our cozy breakfast room, and the relaxing atmosphere of our lobby. After the warm welcome by our professional team, always at your disposal, you will appreciate the comfort of our rooms decorated in an elegant and timeless design. A convenient location , caring personnel and warm atmosphere make Malta Hotel the perfect place for your stay in the capital, whether traveling with family or on your own.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, German and 1 more

Name: Hotel 34B - Astotel
Description:
You'll be amazed by the 100% French interiors at Hotel 34B. This 3-star hotel, ideal for a cultural holiday or shopping trip in Paris, is close to the Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann and Grand Boulevards. Culture fans will enjoy the hotel's closeness to the Folies Bergères, Opéra Garnier and Musée Grévin. Right next to a metro station on lines 8 and 9, you can travel all over Paris in a flash. A charming 3-star hotel in Paris' 9th arrondissement, with its delicate and detailed design, Hotel 34B stands out from the crowd. The interior decoration and French soul of the hotel ensure a purely Français experience! With its innovative and original design and 3-star service, you will be delighted by Hotel 34B. Stay in one of its 128 rooms, each decorated in an unusual style. Exceptional comfort with high quality, spacious 2-metre beds. Use the free WiFi to organise your days. Enjoy your breakfast with fresh and varied produce in the cosy lobby, then relax on the comfy sofas in the lounge. Travel guides and other books on France are at your disposal, to introduce you to the riches of the country and perhaps help you organise your trips. Soft drinks and snacks are available at the open bar in the afternoon. The attentive staff and warm atmosphere at Hotel 34B will make your stay in Paris truly memorable.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 1 more

Name: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel
Adress: 10, rue Saint Philippe du Roule, 75008 Paris France
Description:
Located in an exceptional area between the Champs-Elysees and Faubourg St-Honore, discover the charm of a authentic Haussman-style hotel. Surrounded by the portraits of the Bradford family, presented in a universe of soft and warm silks, let yourself be seduced by the refined, bright and delicate interior of Bradford Elysees. All rooms are serviced by a magnificient historical lift. All rooms are air conditioned and decorated in classic, elegant colors. Some of our 50 rooms feature house chimneys, remnants of the Haussmann period, whereas others provide balconies for a true Parisian stay Of course, we do not forget the modern touch: All rooms are well equipped with an iPod docking station, cable TV and a minibar. Delicious, varied, and generous breakfast buffet, served each morning under the sumptuous canopy of the bright dining room. Don't forget that you can also enjoy breakfast in the privacy of your room. Whether travelling with your family or on your own, the charm of our hotel, a safe shelter from the bustle albeit a few steps away from the most beautiful avenue in the world, will no doubt bewitch you.

Name: Hotel Astoria - Astotel
Adress: 42 rue de Moscou 8th Arr., 75008 Paris France
Description:
At the heart of a quiet street between Opera and major department stores , a short walk from the Gare Saint Lazare, close to Rome station, the Astoria Opera Hotel sits in a central location with direct access to the Champs Elysees - within 10 minutes via Metro, or to the picturesque neighborhood of Montmartre. Our professional and caring staff will welcome you in our cozy lobby, fitted with comfortable leather sofas. Our 86 rooms are decorated with warm colours and contemporary furnishings. They are all carpeted, equipped with satellite TV and feature a private bathroom with hairdryer. This welcoming and cozy atmosphere is intended to make your stay as relaxing and comfortable as possible.

Name: Hotel Palm - Astotel
Adress: 30 Rue De Maubeuge 9th Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description:
Behind its Parisian facade, you will find the subtly offbeat universe of our Palm Opera Hotel, expressed in its style and bright colors, designed by two young interior designers, Aurelie Sahuque and Sophie Hanniet. Vintage pop atmosphere and retro design: Make no mistake, this is a decidedly playful and trendy spot. Our 38 charming and intimate rooms are equipped with flat screen TV, internet connection, i-Pod station and safe. We attach great importance to your comfort: Our hotel is non-smoking and also offers environmentally-safe welcome products. Both children and grown-ups will love our breakfast time: Children can move about in their own playground while a tasty and varied buffet is served. You can also relax in our luminous lobby with a luminous bay window, browse the web on your computer with our free WiFi , or read the style magazines available. The Palm Opera Hotel is 350 meters away from the Cadet Metro station, which provides direct access the Opera , Galeries Lafayette , Louvre Museum and the district of Chatelet . The Palm Hotel, standing in the heart of Paris by the Opera, is a colorful oasis for those seeking an original stay.

Just steps away from the Arc de Triomphe and Avenue des Champs Elysées at 19 Avenue Kléber in the heart of the elegant 16th arrondissement, The Peninsula sits close to some of the world’s most famous monuments, museums and luxury shopping districts.

Name: Hotel Lorette - Astotel
Adress: 36 rue Notre Dame de Lorette 9th Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description:
Centrally located, our beautiful establishment in Haussmann-style embodies the perfect combination of original Parisian charm and modernity, thanks to its recent renovation in 2012. Its outstanding location allows guests to explore Paris on foot. Sacre Coeur, Montmartre, the Opera and major department Stores are withing a 10-minute walk from the hotel; the nearby st Georges (line 12) Metro station provides direct access to Champs Elysees in under 15 minutes. Upon arrival, you will be delighted by our charming reception area, as well as by the efficient and attentive welcome of our team. Our 84 rooms, to which our staff devotes special attention, have been tastefully redesigned to provide you with comfort and modernity. Enjoy free WiFi in the room and in public areas. Take your hearty breakfast in buffet style in an unusual setting, as you discover the original vaulted cellar, a beautiful and airy structure. Needless to say, you may also order your a-la-carte breakfast to be served directly in your room. Thus, the warm and modern furnishings of the hotel , its outstanding central location and our caring staff are the perfect ingredients for a successful business or leisure trip!

At the foot of the Eiffel Tower, the hotel is the ideal starting point for visiting the capital and its main monuments. You will find all comfort services you may expect in every room (Free Internet wifi Access,welcome bathroom amenities from Clarins, bathrobes and slippers, safebox, minibars, hair dryers and much more) We propose 6 room categories recently renovated, our Classic room: charming and cosy 13-15m² ,Superior contemporary and larger 17- 18m², Luxury 20-22m² stylish and comfortable, a Junior Suite of 30m² ideal for a romantic getaway in Paris and 2 stunning attic Suites of 40m² each, best option for long picturesque stay. Continental breakfast is served from 7am till 10h30am up in your room or to our lobby underneath our awesome plant wall. Description:
Located in the 9th district, between Montmartre and Opera, the hotel Joke Astotel is the ideal place to fully enjoy the Parisian lifestyle. The big Department Stores (Galeries Lafayette and the Printemps) and famous theatres neighboring the hotel will satisfy your shopping needs and allow you quick access to the many cultural events of the city. The unique and modern interior design hidden by the Haussman-style facade of this Parisian hotel will provide cheerfulness and joie de vivre for residing clients. In addition, the architect P. Maidenberg's play on light with mirrors and big soundproof windows will guarantee comfort and peace of mind in this warm, playful, and one-of-its-kind ambience. Thanks to its surprising and joyful atmosphere, as well as its generous breakfast, 24-hour reception, and free Wi-Fi available in the whole building, the dedicated staff of the Joke Astotel will do its best to indulge your every need so that your stay with us is an unforgettable experience!

Name: Hotel la Nouvelle Republique & SPA
Description:
Hotel La Nouvelle République is a design boutique hôtel located in the 11th district. The hotel La Nouvelle République welcomes you just few minutes away from metro lines 2, 3 and 11 as well as bus 96 which will take you directly to Rive Gauche. The property is at 5 minutes bike ride from Place de la République, if you just walk down Rue Oberkampf you can reach the Marais within 15 minutes. Decorated in a cool vintage quirky style, the soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms gives you the opportunity to relax fully. The hotel features mostly king size beds with all confort such as hairdryer, thick mattress, usb plugs, safe, tablet in rooms, tv screen. You can enjoy eating at the restaurant and relax in our spa with massages and hammam facilities. The hotel La Nouvelle République invites you every morning for a Free breakfast. In addition, free drinks (tea, coffee) are available throughout the day in our lobby. Finally, you can enjoy the excitement of this area where there are many exiting bars and restaurants. The 11th arrondissement is one of the most the creative scene of Paris. C'est le vrai Paris !

Name: The Hoxton, Paris
Description:
The Hoxton, Paris is a grand 18th century residence in Paris’ 2nd arrondissement with original staircases, plentiful Parisian flair, and camera-baiting corners aplenty. It has 172 bedrooms with seriously comfy beds, chevron timber floors, bold feature walls and oodles of local Parisian charm. We’ve got you covered for your best night’s sleep with comfy mattresses and black out blinds to help you drop off, and you’ll find our very own bathroom amenities range, Blank, to get you squeaky clean the next morning. Our bedrooms come in all shapes and sizes, and with plenty of quirks too. Whatever size you choose, they all come with the usual Hox perks. That's free water, WiFi, 1h of free calls to anywhere in the world and a mini fridge for you to stock from our lobby shop with local products at supermarket price… Whatever you fancy, we’ve got you covered with our three drink and dining destinations. All you need, right on your doorstep.

Name: Hotel Grand Powers
Description:
Among the Parisian buildings which hold the most extraordinary stories, there are hotel windows behind which are the loveliest dreams. Nobly established right in the heart of Paris’s Golden Triangle, the Grand Powers Hotel has shared in an adventure with connoisseurs of beauty and travellers from around the globe since 1920. After welcoming guests for almost 100 years, the hotel is being rejuvenated, a total transformation from the inside out. The haussmannien architecture, typical of the quartier is revisited with new decor inspired by the best elements in design: Italien sensuality, Parisian chic and old English cosiness, with the intention to provide new experiences for its guests who have come to revel in its elegance.

Name: Hotel Le Clement
Description:
Welcome to Hotel Le Clement, your Paris “home away from home.” Hotel Le Clement aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Nearby landmarks such as The Catacombs of Paris (1.3 mi) and Palais Garnier - Opéra National de Paris (1.4 mi) make Hotel Le Clement a great place to stay when visiting Paris.
Rooms at Hotel Le Clement offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.

Name: Hotel Tourisme Avenue
Adress: 66 avenue de la Motte Picquet, 75015 Paris France
Description:
Finding an ideal charming hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Tourisme Avenue, a nice option for travelers like you.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, Hotel Tourisme Avenue is located a short distance from Champs-Elysees (1.5 mi) and Arc de Triomphe (1.7 mi).

Name: COQ Hotel Paris
Description:
COQ Hotel Paris (Community of Quality) is located in Paris, 30.6 km from Marne-la-Vallée and 16.1 km from Versailles. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a private bathroom. There is a 24-hour front desk, concierge services, luggage storage space and a gift shop at the property. Villepinte is 19.3 km from Hôtel COQ (Community of Quality), and Roissy is 22.5 km away. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 11.3 km from the property. 13th arr. is a great choice for travelers interested in monuments, museums and culture. In this area you can shop 'til you drop for popular brands like H&M, Zara.

Name: Hotel Odessa Montparnasse
Description: The Hotel Odessa Montparnasse is an independent family-owned establishment. Our warm team will be glad to welcome you with a smile. The hotel is located in the very center of Paris, in the Montparnasse area, widely known for its typical Parisian atmosphere.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Indonesian and 1 more

Name: Ibis Styles Paris 16 Boulogne
Description: Close to Porte Saint Cloud metro station and Parc des Princes stadium, the ibis Styles Paris 16 Boulogne was newly created in 2017 in a stylish and welcoming design. Ideally located in the heart of the business districts of Boulogne and Issy les Moulineaux, with an innovative coworking space and a wide selection of restaurants available in the heart of Paris 16. Close to Roland Garros and the Eiffel Tower.

Name: Hotel de Londres Eiffel
Description: Independent charming hotel, L'Hotel de Londres Eiffel offers you 30 rooms all equipped with air conditioning with bathroom wc, or shower wc. High speed (optic-fiber) free and secured Wifi.We are situated at 2 minutes by walk from the Eiffel tower, near rue Cler, near Invalides. Some of our rooms have a view on the Eiffel tower.

Name: Hotel Da Vinci
Description:
The journey back to the Renaissance starts in the lift. The glass panel is a window through which you can admire a series of drawings taken from the various studies executed by Leonardo da Vinci. The hotel's 24 rooms are named after the leading figures of the Quattrocento. These include Botticelli, Raffaello, Michelangelo and Catherine de' Medici. The invitingly comfortable rooms are decorated in a style that takes in a great many references, such as a highly typical caqueteuse chair, or a dressing room with curved features, reminiscent of the wardrobes of the period. Almost half the rooms have balconies. Some look out over the hotel patio, a haven of peace and quiet, while others, overlooking the Rue des Saints-Peres, afford a glimpse of the Louvre nearby!
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 3 more

Name: Hotel Apollon Montparnasse
Adress: 91 rue de l ouest 14 Arr., 75014 Paris France
Description:
Independent and family owned hotel, located near the metro Pernety (line 13), the Montparnasse station and the exhibition center of Porte de Versailles, the Apollon Montparnasse welcomes you in a cosy and refined atmosphere. Our 33 rooms are all equipped with high-end bedding, a mini-fridge, a safe box, air-conditionning, free high speed wifi (optic fiber), TVs with thematic channels (Canal +, BeIn Sports, Disney Channel) and bathrooms either with a shower or a bathtub, with toiletries from Couvent des Minimes. For family stays know that we offer connected rooms. Our buffet breakfast with its delicious handmade pastries, is served in our charming vaulted room, typical from Paris. The House offers car parking places in a secured car park, under request.

Name: Les Jardins de Mademoiselle
Description: Completely renovated and opened in June, 2018, Les Jardins de Mademoiselle is a real treasure of greenery right in the heart of Paris! Convenient to the business trips and leisure activities, alone or in family, the hotel offers rooms, reminiscent of nature at all times. It will seduce you with its gardens, terrace on the roofs of the city, heated pool, hammam and fitness. A real moment of rest in the City of Light

Name: Hotel Pavillon Bastille
Adress: 65 rue de Lyon 12th Arr., 75012 Paris France
Description:
Housed in a beautiful building located in the 12th district of Paris ,the Hotel Pavillon Bastille is a place of charm and comfort that you will find graciously welcoming whether you are visiting the capital for tourism or business. Come and discover the many advantages of this 3-stars hotel and its 25 rooms, located just a few steps from the Place de la Bastille (Bastille Square) and its metro station. The pretty courtyard, with its flowers and trees, is ideal for enjoying a leisurely breakfast in the sun or a quiet rest in the dappled shade. In an elegant setting which is both tranquil and friendly, you'll enjoy a wide range of services, many facilities and the smiling assistance of an ever available team.

Name: Hotel Le Quartier Bercy Square Paris
Description: Conveniently located near Gare de Lyon Station and the new dynamic Bercy village district, Le Quartier offers its guests a contemporary and warm ambiance. Both private garden and courtyard enhace the calm and contemporary athmosphere of the bedrooms. Featuring a design lounge bar and sophisticated breakfast room (sweet & savoury buffet), this unique place epitomizes the vitality of the hip nearby boulevard de Reuilly.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, German and 1 more

Name: Hotel de France Invalides
Adress: 102 boulevard de la Tour Maubourg, 75007 Paris France
Description:
The Hôtel de France Invalides offers newly styled and luxurious rooms in the heart of the famous 7th arrondissement of Paris, home to the Eiffel Tower and Napoleon's tomb at Invalides. From standard to executive or privilege accommodations, the rooms at Hotel de France Invalides are perfect for holidays or honeymoons. Included are private bathrooms, Wi-Fi, TV, mini-bar, tea/coffee maker, and fan. Lift access and room service available. A 24-hour front desk managed by a multilingual staff provides a concierge service, tour desk, laundry/dry cleaning services, and luggage storage. Guests can relax in the lounge area or work in the business area. A continental breakfast buffet is served every day with a bar on site, and the hotel is located near excellent restaurants and wine bars. In a prime location, guests can enjoy the Invalides and Rodin museum, shop along the famous Rue Cler, or a romantic walk to the Eiffel Tower.

Name: Atelier Montparnasse
Description: Located just 15 minutes walk from Montparnasse, hotel ATELIER Montparnasse is a design hotel of 40 air conditioned rooms that can accommodate 1 or 2 people with complimentary wireless internet access. This 3* hotel is an ideal base for the discerning business person, for Champs-Elysées and Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre (a 15-minutes metro ride), or for exploring Paris's many tourist or pleasure attractions.

Name: Hotel Square Louvois
Description: Its location in the heart of Paris’ 2nd arrondissement, minutes from the Louvre, Jardin des Tuileries, Palais-Royal, Opera and banks of the Seine, make it the perfect place to soak up the best of the French capital. Whether it’s a business trip, romantic break or weekend away with friends, experience the beautiful spa and the quality of innovative services.

Name: Grand Hotel Dechampaigne
Description:
The Grand Hotel Dechampaigne Paris, built in the XVIth century, is the symbol of the French hospitality tradition, with delicate French decoration and architecture a refined service.Our staff will be pleased to welcome you in French, English, Spanish, Russian, Italian and German. The Grand Hotel Dechampaigne combines a high standard of comfort and the refined service of a friendly mansion within Paris: Few steps from, the Rivoli Street, les Halles, The Louvre Museum, Tuileries Garden, Concorde Square and Champs Elysees.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 4 more

Name: Best Western Quartier Latin Pantheon
Description: Small hotel in classical Parisian building located in the Left Bank near the Latin Quarter.

Name: Citadines Les Halles Paris
Adress: 4 Rue des Innocents above the Forum des Halles, 75001 Paris France
Description:
Apart'hotel Citadines Les Halles welcomes you to one of the districts of the French capital, once known as the belly of Paris. Between tradition and modernity, you will rub shoulders with centuries of history and feel the beating heart of a capital that is perpetually changing. You can stroll among the vast and maze-like pedestrian zone: from the mediaeval alleyways of the Montorgueil district to the avant-garde architecture of Pompidou Centre, from the peace of the Ile de la Cité to the hustle and bustle of the Forum des Halles. Ideally situated just metres from the Châtelet-Les Halles metro station, your Apart Hotel welcomes you 24/7 and guarantees direct and rapid access to all the business centres and iconic places that are dear to Parisians. Each of our 189 studios or 2-room serviced apartments is equipped with a kitchen and a bathroom. Whether yours is a business trip or a sightseeing getaway, our personnel are at your service to assist you with your arrangements and to offer you the benefit of their advice and recommendations. It's impossible to stay in the Forum des Halles area without giving in to the temptations of the myriad of designer boutiques that make this district the cradle of fashion and prestige with the French touch. With its clever blend of shops and cultural attractions, the district is near the Théâtre du Châtelet and the Théâtre de la Ville, within walking distance of the Bateaux Mouches sightseeing boats so emblematic of Paris, and within reach of the busy Rue de Rivoli and its many cafés and restaurants. Once night falls, cross the threshold of a jazz club and discover the intimacy of one of Paris's most typical evenings out. Cosily accommodated in one of our spacious - up to 40m² - serviced apartments, you'll enjoy all the benefits of a stay that's both comfortable and independent. Cook up your meals in your fully equipped kitchen, use the complementary WiFi to keep in touch with your loved ones, and take advantage of the weekly housekeeping and services on offer at this 4 star serviced apartments hotel. A wide range of à la carte services are also available to personalise your stay, from a fitness room and breakfast served in the dining room, to a meeting room, additional daily housekeeping, dry-cleaning, and more.
Read more

Name: Hotel Balzac
Description:
Hotel Balzac is a luxury hotel located in the heart of central Paris' spectacular 8th arrondissement.Just off the Champs-Elysees and moments from the Arc de Triomphe, Faubourg Saint-Honore, Avenue Montaigne and Avenue George V; the hotel is perfectly placed for the very best Paris has to offer. The 69 rooms and suites at the hotel are sublimely decorated in a mix of neo-classical style with rich colours, fabrics and contemporary furnishings. Some of the rooms, including the Royal suite, exhibit spectacular views of the eiffel Tower and across Paris. The hotel contains a rich history and has been immortalised in fiction by a selection of the world's finest writers.
Read more

Name: Le Bristol Paris
Adress: 112 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, 75008 Paris, France
Description:
An icon of French elegance and art de vivre, Le Bristol Paris is located at one of the city’s most prestigious addresses on rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré. The first to receive France’s “Palace” distinction, the hotel boasts 190 rooms and suites— among the largest in Paris — that are now completely renovated. An exceptional setting offering Oetker Collection’s legendary hospitality, Le Bristol is perhaps best known for its outstanding dining tradition, holding 4 Michelin stars between Epicure and 114 Faubourg. A spirit of joie de vivre permeates the hotel from early morning to after midnight with relaxation in the lush, 13,000 square foot courtyard garden, teatime at Café Antonia, wellbeing and fitness at Spa Le Bristol by La Prairie and the iconic rooftop swimming pool, and captivating evenings at Le Bar du Bristol.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 6 more

Name: Shangri-La Paris
Description:
In the former home of Prince Roland Bonaparte, overlooking the Eiffel Tower and River Seine, ultimate Parisian elegance lives on in the French capital at Shangri-La Paris. This 19th century architectural gem has been listed in the French “Monuments Historiques” registry since 2009 and officially awarded the “Palace” status in 2014. Centrally located in the 16th arrondissement, minutes from the Champs-Elysées, the hotel blends European grandeur with traditional Asian hospitality. The hotel also boasts a 1 Michelin-starred restaurant, Shang Palace, along with seasonal dining experiences from Executive Chef Christophe Moret at the enchanting La Bauhinia.

Name: Staycity Aparthotels Gare de l'Est
Description:
Our 40 studio apartments and 10 one-bedroom apartments offer budget accommodation and convenient locations for sightseeing and enjoying all the attractions Paris has to offer. The property is perfectly located in the 10th District near Gare de l'Est, in the very centre of Paris. The self catering studio apartments and apartments provide a genuine home from home as they're furnished with TVs, kitchenettes (microwave, fridge, hob), dining areas, bedrooms and more. 24 Hour Reception, Car Parking and FREE Wi-Fi available. Whether your visit is for business or pleasure we have a superb selection of studio apartments and apartments to suit your needs.

Name: Hotel Joyce - Astotel
Adress: 29, rue la Bruyere 9th Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description:
Standing at an unconventional spot of the upper 9th district, the Joyce Hotel is ideally located at the crossroads of the theater district, Place St-Georges, and the "hot-spots" of the fashionable South-Pigalle neighborhood. Meticulously decorated by Philippe Maidenberg, with nods to inevitable Parisian monuments, our hotel will seduce you with its comfort and bold design. Luxury car furniture recycled as improvised seats, inverted Eiffel Tower, delicate tromple-l'oeil paintings around beds, breakfast with bio breads and cereals under a very Eiffel-like glass roof: Everything is ready to usher you into a fun and surprising world. Our 44 rooms are full of thoughtful and delicate touches that add to the cosiness of the place. All rooms feature a quiet atmosphere, strengthened in some cases with a terrace or an enchanting view over the rooftops. Our team, available 24/24, will welcome you into a chic and relaxing atmosphere

Oak floorboards, wicker chairs, cotton rugs, wooden furniture make this charming Boutique Hotel a real feast for the eyes.

Enjoy thesoothing and exquisite decoration of each room. In the morning, you will be greeted by our caring personnel, as well as by the delicious continental breakfast, which is served in buffet style to meet all your needs. Later in the day, give yourself a relaxing break at our open soft bar , available to you in our bright dining room. Its convenient location , professional and caring team and its warm decoration make of Monterosa Hotel the ideal place for a perfect Parisian stay!

Adress: 12 Rue De La Montagne Ste Genevieve, 75005 Paris France
Description:
The Hotel is welcoming you with a new extension opened in 2020. The Hotel La Lanterne is a unique and independent boutique hotel, located right in the heart of Paris, a stone's throw from Notre Dame Cathedral and the Pantheon. All our guest have unlimited access to the spa equiped with a swimming pool, steam room, sensory shower and fitness center. The Hotel is also equiped of a treatment cabine and has a partership with TAAJ for adult treatments and Nougatine for kids. La Lanterne is perfectly located to experience the Paris of yesterday and the Paris of today for business traveler or leisure.

Name: Hotel Eiffel Blomet
Description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hôtel Eiffel Blomet, a nice option for travelers like you. Rooms at Hôtel Eiffel Blomet provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi. In addition, while staying at Hôtel Eiffel Blomet guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy a pool and breakfast. While staying at Hôtel Eiffel Blomet, visitors can check out The Catacombs of Paris (1.5 mi) and Champs-Elysees (2.0 mi), some of Paris' top attractions. When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Pizzeria Popolare, César Restaurant, and LouLou Paris Restaurant, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike. If you’re looking for something to do, Eiffel Tower (1.2 mi), Observatoire Panoramique de la Tour Montparnasse (0.9 mi), and Musée de l’Armée des Invalides (1.1 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Hôtel Eiffel Blomet. Hôtel Eiffel Blomet puts the best of Paris at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Name: Victoria Palace Hotel
Description:
Bienvenue sur le site officiel du Victoria Palace, un boutique-hôtel 4 étoiles situé entre Le Bon Marché Rive Gauche et la Gare Montparnasse. Bénéficiez des meilleurs tarifs en réservant directement. Totalement rénové en 2020, le Victoria Palace Hôtel vous ouvre les portes de ses 92 chambres dans un esprit intimiste et raffiné. Et plus loin, poussez la porte de la terrasse où vous découvrirez notre écrin de fraicheur secret. Un hôtel parisien éco-responsable et chaleureux où la nature a repris ses droits. : Entendez-vous les murmures des vers du poète James Joyce ? Ils résonnent au Victoria Palace comme une douce brise se déposant sur la majestueuse façade datant de 1913. Situé rive gauche à Paris dans une petite rue calme du 6ème arrondissement, le Victoria Palace Hôtel a en effet accueilli de nombreuses personnalités qui ont façonné l’âme de ce lieu.

Name: Hotel San Regis
Description: None

Name: Hotel Regina Louvre
Description:
The prestigious Regina Hotel, fully renovated, belongs to a long French tradition of luxury hotels. In the heart of the trendy district which is home to fashion design, shopping and museum, Paris aficionados will find the ideal place to stay, across the Louvre museum and the Tuileries Garden. Thanks to its wonderful situation, the capital's major attractions are just a stone's throw away including the Palais Royal and the Champs Elysees. From here, the luxurious Place Vendome, Orsay museum and the shopping centre Les Halles can be reached within 15 minutes on foot. Furthermore, the 'Tuileries' and 'Pyramides' metro stop at 150 meters provide quick and easy access throughout the city. First opened in 1900 for the World's Fair, Hotel Regina welcomes you in an intimate, spacious, sophisticated haven, where fine woodwork and designer lighting reinforce its anchor in Paris' history. This fully air conditioned property offers an array of services including a 24h reception, concierge, room service, laundry and limousine service amongst other. Furthermore, complimentary wireless Internet is accessible throughout the property. Each of the 99 rooms at the Regina Hotel in Paris has been elegantly furnished with antiques and period furniture, creating a traditional and luminous decor. Modern in-room amenities include a safe, direct dial telephone and flat screen television with satellite channels. Some of the bedrooms offer breath-taking views of the Louvre museum, the Tuileries Garden and the Eiffel Tower. Let yourself be charmed by its pretty Patio (opened on sunny days) and its staff dedicated to your personal needs. In its British atmosphere of the hotel bar, you will enjoy a drink or a cocktail from our Chef Barman. You will have also the opportunity to relish pastries from our pastry chef and our selection of teas. For lunch and dinner the Hotel Regina Restaurant will propose you a French and seasonal cuisine.

Name: Hôtel Mayfair Paris
Adress: 3 rue Rouget de Lisle, 75001 Paris France
Description:
Ideally located in the fashion & business area of Paris; within walking distance of the Louvre, Place de la Concorde, Place Vendôme, Opéra and the Champs-Élysées; the Hotel Mayfair Paris is an elegant boutique hotel offering 40 rooms, 7 junior suites and a business meeting room suitable for 12. Member of the Preferred Hotel Group selection, its decoration combines harmonious colours and luxurious fabrics that define the essence of this French style home. The Hotel Mayfair Paris is a perfect illustration of French hospitality at its very best, providing a very attentive and personalised service.

Name: Chouette Hôtel
Adress: 237 rue de la Convention, 75015 Paris France
Description:
Set in a 20th-century building in central Paris, Chouette Hotel is just 400 m from Georges Brassens Park. It has a 24-hour reception and offers guest rooms with satellite TV. Each soundproofed guest room has a telephone and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. All of the rooms have a colourful décor and are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Chouette Hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in public areas of the Chouette Hotel. Guests can read the newspapers provided in the lounge area. Convention Metro Station is 400 m away, providing direct access to the Montparnasse and Montmartre districts. The Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is a 15-minute walk away. 15th arr. is a great choice for travellers interested in romance, sightseeing andmonuments. This is our guests' favourite part of Paris, according to independent reviews.

Description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Paris, Best Western Premier Kapital Opera is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Best Western Premier Kapital Opera makes it easy to enjoy the best of Paris.
Best Western Premier Kapital Opera offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.

Name: Hotel Mademoiselle
Adress: 7 rue des Petits Hotels, 75010 Paris France
Description:
Elegant and warm Boutique Hotel, a few steps away from The North and the East station. Located between the canal St Martin, The opera House and The Sacré Coeur. The Hotel Mademoiselle suggest you to enjoy private sessions for free in our wellness area including a Steam room, Sauna, ice fountain, gym, relaxation room and our massage room equipped with a "Medyjet" water massage bed You can also relax in our pretty Mademoiselle's Lounge or in the Patio for the sunny days's return, to have a drink or enjoy a breakfast to start properly your day in Paris

Name: 25hours Hotel Terminus Nord
Description: The colourful world of cultures living in the midst of the 10th district. Here, opposite the central Gare du Nord train station, you find the 25hours Hotel Terminus Nord, which is a declaration of love for the vibrant spirit of this district and its inhabitants. Local heroes serve as the inspiration for the interior design concept. The design agency Dreimeta collaborated with the Parisian team Visto Images to encapsulate the hustle and bustle of the 10th Arrondissement: A playful hodgepodge of vibrant, colourful wall murals in street-art style.

Name: Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg
Description:
In the heart of Paris, between the highly elegant Faubourg Saint-Honoré and the mythical Champs-Elysées avenue, experience a fashion show atmosphere. You will be charmed by the designer Didier Gomez’ signature and his glamourous vision of the Parisian style, inspired by Haute Couture. Enjoy the latest lifestyle trends. The elegant Blossom restaurant offers a chic and natural table, as gourmet as attentive to well-being. A secret garden with palm trees and fountains, sunny terraces to see and be seen, a warm library, a sumptuous lobby bathed in light, a fitness and spa area make the Sofitel Paris le Faubourg an ideal place to fully enjoy your stay in Paris. Welcoming, protecting and caring for others is the very heart of our identity. In order to ensure your safety and well-being, we have adapted our service and implemented new measures. Discover our commitments here. Our hotel has obtained the ALLSAFE cleanliness and prevention label, verified by Bureau Veritas. This label guarantees that our hygiene and preventive measures comply with the highest and most rigorous standards. This expertise allows us to adapt to new requirements, today and for tomorrow, so that you can continue to fully enjoy the Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg and its iconic lifestyle "Live the French way".
Read more

Name: Les Piaules
Description: Les Piaules is a new hostel offering a bar and a rooftop terrace with a fantastic view on the iconic monuments of Paris, fast free WiFi, check-out until 12am, custom bunkbeds. Ideally located in the arty district of Belleville.

Name: Hotel Caumartin Opera - Astotel
Adress: 27 rue de Caumartin 9th Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description:
Located on Caumartin street in the 9th district, a few steps awayfrom Opera Garnier, the Grands Boulevards, Place Vendome and the main business centres, the Caumartin hotel offers the perfect place of rest and leisure in the heart of the city. Thanks to the easy access provided to major entertainment venues in Paris, as well as to Disneyland Paris, our hotel will make your visit to Paris' main attractions a truly pleasurable experience. The hotel will win you over you with the warmth and discretion of its staff, as well as by its decoration, a subtle blend between modernity and comfort. Take advantage of 40 air conditioned rooms, our cozy breakfast room with colorful hues, whose bright and stylish design creates a warm atmosphere. In the morning, enjoy our delicious continental breakfast buffet. This is thus your only mandate: Let yourself be delighted by our hotel!

Name: Hotel Le Milie Rose
Adress: 22 rue des Petites Ecuries, 75010 Paris France
Description: The Milie Rose welcomes you in the heart of the 10th district of Paris in one of its 38 rooms! Our rooms are equipped with air conditioning, television, mini-fridge, work desk, hair dryer, and much more! Our team will recommend you all the nice places in the neighbourhood!
Language_Spoken: English, French, German, Italian and 1 more

Name: Fauchon L'Hotel Paris
Description:
Life is short — and we intend to savor every moment. Maison Fauchon is all about luxurious indulgences. Experiencing, touching, tasting, and seeking pleasure on our own terms. No apologies. No regrets. Welcome to Fauchon L'Hotel. Fauchon L'hôtel Paris is the new epicenter of contemporary Parisian epicure and luxurious hospitality — curators of culture, aestheticians of the arts, and innovators of fine foods and pastries. Our complimentary Gourmet Bar : There is no better way for Fauchon L'hôtel Paris to demonstrate its commitment to luxurious indulgences and pleasures of the palate, than through a very artistic, curated, original, unexpected moment. As attractive as it is functional, this stunning piece of furniture enables incomparable gratification. Within the many doors and drawers, guests can enjoy unique moments of pure decadence as they seek and savor favorite Fauchon delicacies. Think of it as your very own Fauchon store, made-to-order, just for you. Eat whatever you want, whenever you want, with absolutely no apologies and no regrets! And as our special gift to you, Fauchon will offer you complimentary fresh Fauchon creations upon your arrival to suit your taste preferences. We will customize the contents according to your preference: salty, sweet, healthy, or tasting (a combination of all three). The Gourmet Bar includes a “fresh product” cabinet, a preview of other Fauchon specialities all kept at the ideal temperature. The “drinks” cabinet is the perfect spot to hold wine, spirits, champagne, water, juices, and soft drinks. There is a special area for sweet and savory Fauchon snacks – just perfect for an afternoon nibble – as well as an area to enclose the hot water kettle and Nespresso coffee machine for Fauchon tea, coffee, and hot chocolate. Name: Hotel La Villa Saint-Germain
Description:
The Hôtel La Villa Saint Germain des Prés Paris boasts a perfect location, at the centre of Saint Germain des Prés and near a number of tourist, cultural and historical sites. It lies at the crossroads of three, equally charming quarters: the Latin Quarter and its art galleries, the 7th arrondissement and its antique dealers and Opera and its luxury boutiques, which stretch to the prestigious Place Vendôme. From our hotel, you are just a few minutes from the Seine, the Louvre as well as the Palais Royal and the Tuileries Garden, the ideal place for a gentle stroll whatever the season. The Musée d’Orsay and Notre Dame Cathedral are also close to the Villa Saint Germain des Prés, from where you are within quick and easy reach of all the capital’s different quarters thanks to the good public transport links: bus, metro and RER.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 4 more

Name: Hotel Raphael
Description:
Built in 1925, situated a 2-minute walk from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe, this 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Paris. It offers one of the best panoramic Rooftop in Paris with 360 views all over the French capital. You can also enjoy a cosy English style Bar and a restaurant. Decorated in a Louis 15th and 16th style, guest rooms feature wooden furnishings and elaborate wall hangings. They include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some of the suites feature a balcony, views of the Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triumph. Other facilities at the hotel include free Wi-Fi access and a fitness room.

Name: Hotel Duquesne Eiffel
Description: This cosy hotel offers numerous advantages such as its geographic location, appreciated as much for "leisure" vacations as it is for business meetings. Between "les Invalides" and the Eiffel Tower, the Duquesne Eiffel Hotel is located in one of Paris' most pleasant boroughs on the famous left bank of the Seine. The team welcomes you with a smile 24/7, while taking all the necessary measures to ensure that your stay is a pleasant one.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Paris - Canal de la Villette, an IHG hotel
Adress: 68 Quai De La Seine, 75019 Paris France
Description:
Enjoy a young and lively stay in the Parisian neighborhood at the Holiday Inn Express Paris-Canal de la Villette, next to the canal de l’Ourcq and located just 15 minutes away by metro from the historic heart of Paris. Discover our rooms renovated in 2019 with an average size of 21m ² and enjoy the tranquility and brightness they offer with a pleasant view of the Bassin de la Villette. With your umbrella or your cap, discover the Parc de la Villette or the Louvre Museum. Whatever your choice is, you will never be far from the center of Paris from the Riquet metro station just 2 minutes away by walk from our hotel. You can also easily come and go from/to the Charles de Gaulle airport, by train (40 minutes) or by car and will be able, in this case, to take advantage of our private parking for a peaceful stay. Very committed to participating in the ecological transition of our city, many initiatives are taken to testify our certification of eco-hotel such as our hives, our socially engaged zero waste jams, our solar panels, or our recycling programs. Relax with a homemade cocktail on the tree-lined terrace of the hotel bar before enjoying the surrounding breweries. Our 24-hour reception staff can advise you and make your stay in Paris a pleasant moment with your friend or family.
Read more

Name: Citadines Saint-Germain-des-Pres Paris
Adress: 53, Ter Quai des Grands Augustins, 75006 Paris France
Description:
Located on the banks of the Seine, Apart'hotel Citadines Saint-Germain-des-Prés Paris is set in the heart of the Latin Quarter. Soak up the truly exceptional atmosphere of the famous Boulevards Saint-Michel and Saint-Germain, its narrow streets and its art galleries. You'll have front-row seats to a historical performance. In addition to numerous bus routes, you can count on Metro lines 4 and 7 as well as RER lines B (direct to Charles de Gaulle Airport) and C to get you where you need to go. Our reception is open 24/7. Since parking in this district can prove something of a challenge, a private car park (charges apply) is available. Because we are committed to guaranteeing you an exceptional stay, enjoy our many lounge areas, where coffee and tea are available, as well as our fitness room. Your Apart Hotel offers you an uninterrupted view of the banks of the Seine and its bookshops that will plunge you into a typically Parisian atmosphere. The Pont-Neuf, the oldest bridge in Paris, is directly opposite your door. Cross it to reach the Ile de la Cité and Notre-Dame. You can then head off to drink a hot chocolate at the Café de Flore, one of the iconic institutions of Saint-Germain-des-Prés. In the afternoon, why not go to sample one of the famed ice-creams at Berthillon, on the Ile Saint-Louis? But perhaps you would prefer to go shopping along Rue de Buci, visit the Louvre or stroll along the paths of the Luxembourg gardens. For your evening, don't forget to book a theatre seat at the Théâtre de la Ville, the Théâtre de l'Odéon or the Théâtre du Châtelet. Whether you are in Paris on business or for your holidays, our serviced apartments hotel offers you modern accommodation that is suited to your needs. From our studios for one or two people to our two-room apartments for three or four, all offer a fully equipped kitchen, cable television, air conditioning and complementary WiFi. Personalise your stay with a whole range of à la carte services: daily housekeeping, laundry and dry cleaning, buffet breakfast and flexible modular meeting rooms with views of the Seine.
Read more

Name: Hotel de Crillon, A Rosewood Hotel
Adress: 10 Place de la Concorde 8th Arrondissement, 75008 Paris France
Description:
Fronted by the majestic architecture of Ange-Jacques Gabriel, Hôtel de Crillon, A Rosewood Hotel overlooks the spectacular Place de la Concorde, one of the most beautiful city squares in the world. Built at Louis XV’s request, the hotel became the residence of the illustrious Count de Crillon and his family for many years and was transformed into a hotel in 1909 under the guidance of architect Walter-André Destailleur. Since then, its guest list has featured celebrities, politicians, artists, princes and queens, all attracted to the hotel’s unique and perennial reputation for excellence. Hôtel de Crillon has long since secured its iconic status as a one-of-a-kind property, a living testament to the very best way of life France has to offer. Following a four-year transformation, the Palace hotel opened in 2017 and now boasts 124 guestrooms and suites, four restaurants, a spa, a swimming pool, three heritage landmark salons for meetings and functions, and more.
Read more

The Villa Nicolo is an hotel for more than half a century and has evolved over the years.. With the last renovation in 2018, we have stayed true to the soul of the hotel by preserving , a touch of Africa, and a pinch of Indonesia and we added some modernity and appealing colours on the walls and ceilings. We ensured that the Villa Nicolo will always be your parisian retreat ! Our Team is always willing to provide the best possible service for your. We are looking forward to welcoming you in our elegant establishment in the heart of the village de Passy.

Description: The Hôtel de Joséphine Bonaparte opened this charming residence, with its lounges and 24 rooms, to all would-be Parisians - for a night or a longer stay, a cup of tea, an evening drink, or even a whole night of cocktails and delicious nibbles. Hidden behind a flamboyant courtyard, Hôtel de JoBo is the intimate and delightful escape after a long journey, a day of strolling, visiting museums, and fabulous shopping to be found in this multi-faceted part of old Paris.

Description: 4-year transformation, innovative concept, strategic location in heart of the left bank and Montparnasse district in full transformation: here is the new flagship of the Pullman brand. 957 panoramic rooms, 3 floors dedicated to events, 742m² plenary, 800m² terrace, 5 restaurants and bars with a new concept, rooftop bar on 32nd floor at height of 115 meters.

Name: Hotel Madison
Description:
The Madison Hotel, in the Latin Quarter of Saint Germain-des-Pres, is a boutique hotel in a chic, contemporary style. This delightful hotel with its 50 rooms and suites is located on the Left Bank opposite the church of Saint-Germain-des-Pres and a mere stone's throw from the Seine, the Louvre and the Musee d’Orsay, and the Cathedral of Notre Dame de Paris. The hotel rubs shoulders on the Boulevard Saint Germain with the Cafe de Flore and the Cafe de 2 Magots, at the heart of a quarter famed for its cafes, art galleries, museums, antique dealers and designer fashion boutiques. The Madison Hotel is also firmly at the heart of literary Paris... Albert Camus spent some time at the hotel in the spring of 1940, and it was here that he completed his existentialist novel "L'Etranger" (The Outsider). Perhaps his spirit still hovers somewhere...

Name: Fauchon L'Hôtel Paris
Description:
Life is short — and we intend to savor every moment. Maison Fauchon is all about luxurious indulgences. Experiencing, touching, tasting, and seeking pleasure on our own terms. No apologies. No regrets. Welcome to Fauchon L'Hotel. Fauchon L'hôtel Paris is the new epicenter of contemporary Parisian epicure and luxurious hospitality — curators of culture, aestheticians of the arts, and innovators of fine foods and pastries. Our complimentary Gourmet Bar : There is no better way for Fauchon L'hôtel Paris to demonstrate its commitment to luxurious indulgences and pleasures of the palate, than through a very artistic, curated, original, unexpected moment. As attractive as it is functional, this stunning piece of furniture enables incomparable gratification. Within the many doors and drawers, guests can enjoy unique moments of pure decadence as they seek and savor favorite Fauchon delicacies. Think of it as your very own Fauchon store, made-to-order, just for you. Eat whatever you want, whenever you want, with absolutely no apologies and no regrets! And as our special gift to you, Fauchon will offer you complimentary fresh Fauchon creations upon your arrival to suit your taste preferences. We will customize the contents according to your preference: salty, sweet, healthy, or tasting (a combination of all three). The Gourmet Bar includes a “fresh product” cabinet, a preview of other Fauchon specialities all kept at the ideal temperature. The “drinks” cabinet is the perfect spot to hold wine, spirits, champagne, water, juices, and soft drinks. There is a special area for sweet and savory Fauchon snacks – just perfect for an afternoon nibble – as well as an area to enclose the hot water kettle and Nespresso coffee machine for Fauchon tea, coffee, and hot chocolate. Bon appetite!

Name: citizenM Paris Champs Elysées hotel
Description:
Picasso, Hemingway, Fitzgerald – there's a reason artists have always flocked to Paris. It's the city of love, of lights, and now another citizenM. Our fourth Parisian hotel stands on the world's most luxurious street – Champs-Élysées. Unlike the usual high prices and la-di-da hospitality you find on the avenue, citizenM gives you affordable luxury in a prime location. When you arrive at our can't-miss hotel, there's no long queue at reception. Self-check-in takes only a minute at our kiosks – or use our app to check-in before you arrive. The second-floor living room is packed with art, books and oh-so-comfy Vitra furniture. Feeling peckish? Slide over to canteenM – it's open 24/7 and expands onto an amazing outdoor terrace with bistro-style furniture and chic loungers. There's an intimate, awning-covered courtyard for all-weather dining. The 8th-floor cloudM bar serves shaken and stirred cocktails with a side of Eiffel Tower views. At the front is a terrace overlooking the iconic Champs-Élysées. At the back, an expansive hideout and lusciously green inner courtyard. Is this a place to dine, date or party? We think so!

Name: Fred Hotel
Description:
Fred Hotel is a warm and intimate 3-star boutique hotel with elegant and contemporary style. Fred Hotel is located in the heart of the 14th arrondissement, a neighbourhood which has kept its lively, welcoming stores and village-like atmosphere, close to Gare Montparnasse and Porte de Versailles. The cosy feel of Fred Hotel starts at the lobby with its Jean Prouve and Charles § Ray Eames furniture, its huge contemporary fireplace and its bookshelf generously filled with works of art and novels. Our multilingual team will personally welcome you, taking utmost care to anticipate your needs and ensure you have a very pleasant stay. Public transport (metro line 13) leads you directly to the heart of Paris to visit the main tourist sites or for your business appointments. The 36 rooms, including 2 designed to accommodate guests with reduced mobility, are equipped with custom furnishings, quality materials and high-tech devices including a flat screen television, reversible air conditioning, free WIFI access and a safe with power outlet. Original lithographs give a personal and unique touch to each room! A charming terrace offers a peaceful haven to relax and unwind.

Located in the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Pres, the Artus Hotel revisits the 1950's style. This 4-star boutique hotel on the Left Bank is a tribute to contemporary art. This hotel with 26 rooms including an Exclusive Suite and a Duplex Suite has a decidedly modern interior, featuring all the pop colours of the Fifties. Reflecting its close association with Jacques Tati films, the decade brings fun and frivolous touches to Artus Hotel. Straight-backed chairs, wooden chests of drawers and small, brightly coloured pieces of furniture are part of the charm of this contemporary architecture. Lovers of art and design will make the Artus Hotel their home from home in Paris.

Adress: 49-51 Rue La Fayette 09 Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description:
A British spirit in Frenchy walls Did you say excellence and comfort? Elementary, my dear Watson! We took the best of French-style hospitality and the "so British" sense of humor to offer you an original stay in a vintage hotel. Welcome to your home sweet home in the heart of the 9th arrondissement of Paris, between Montmartre and the antiquarian district of Drouot, near the Opéra Garnier and the Parisian luxury malls. Our cult and vintage rooms Through its 103 rooms, this one-of-a-kind 4-star Parisian boutique hotel reveals 2 worlds. The first one is inspired by the cult TV series The Avengers and the second one is inpired by the pure retro tradition of the 1950s.

Name: Hotel d'Argenson
Description:
Welcome to the Hotel d’Argenson The Hotel d’Argenson is a comfortable Parisian hotel which has maintained its authentic home-like hospitality for over 50 years. It is ideally located in the 8th arrondissement of Paris, halfway between the Champs Elysées and the Opera – at the heart of the “Golden Triangle” between the prestigious avenues Montaigne and George V. In the heart of Paris. The Hotel d’Argenson’s rates are especially attractive for this renowned Parisian district. Our spacious and comfortable rooms are soundproofed and have been fully renovated, ensuring a quiet and relaxing stay in the heart of Paris – just minutes from the city’s top attractions such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame de Paris and the Champs Elysées. Note: FREE Wi-Fi access.

Name: BLC Design Hotel
Description:
The BLC Design Hotel is pleased to welcome you for a stop in the country's white. Completely renovated in 2009, this boutique hotel with 29 rooms with a luggage room and free wifi access, will show you a bold and innovative concept imagined entirely by the decorator Carole Picard. The open space design that characterizes most of our rooms combine a zen atmosphere that evokes the influences of surroundings. Surely you wonder who are these women pictured on our headboards that dresses our white walls? The answer....two steps from the BLC Design Hotel...These are portraits of ladies who stayed in Le Palais de la Femme that were photographed by Parisian photographer Lise-Laure Batifol. Located in the lively neighborhood of the Bastille, République and Nation with its many bars, restaurants and designer shops is in its originality an address to try, even to adopt. See you soon!
Read more

Name: Hotel Moderniste
Description:
Located in a beautiful and very quiet bourgeois street in the 15th arrondissement of Paris, in the heart of the Convention district and very close to the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Center, the hotel Moderniste opens its doors after a complete renovation. This brand new 4-star boutique hotel is a beautiful example of 1930s architecture in Paris and immerses us in the avant-garde atmosphere of this resolutely modern era. The graphic and elegant decoration is inspired by the refined design of Le Corbusier, known as the father of modern architecture. The drawings from Mallet-Stevens' 1922 "Cité Moderne" tastefully decorate the 40 rooms of this 4-star hotel. The Hotel Moderniste pays tribute to these urban planners who laid the foundations of modern art and design. A selection of drawings, paintings and architects’ furniture are references to this very creative era. In the lobby, the Knoll enfilade and the LC6 sharing table by Le Corbusier perfectly blend with the fireplace and the Art Deco glass walls. In the morning you may have breakfast in a beautiful light, during the day you can work in a studious atmosphere, and, at nightfall, the winter garden becomes a lounge area where you can have a drink and relax after a working day or after your Paris visits. You can admire a collection of old posters, a nod to the popular Paris of the Porte de Versailles exhibitions through the years. Structured on 7 floors, the hotel Moderniste offers 40 very comfortable rooms in a resolutely modern decor. Particular attention has been paid to the bedding and soundproofing of each room to ensure optimal sleep in the heart of the capital.
Read more

A simply decorated hotel where the welcome is warm.The hotel Tiquetonne is located in a pedestrian street where you will find shops and great restaurants.In addition, you can enjoy the proximity of the “Centre Georges Pompidou”, “Musée du Louvre”, “Notre-Dame de Paris”, the “quartier Latin”, The Basilica “Sacré Coeur”, the Châtelet-les-Halles commercial center, and many other points of interests.You can almost visit all paris by foot : Our central location is ideal and conducive for tourism.The rooms are equipped with double glazing for a quiet and peaceful night.Nearby public parkings will help you to find a place for your car.A generous breakfast is also possible to start the day off right.Open 7 days 7 and all year round : Our priority is your satisfaction

Name: Hotel Monge

Name: Hotel Elysia
Description:
The hotel Elysia, formerly Champs-Elysees Plaza, introduces you to the Romantic Art of Living. Luxurious and warm, our establishment offers you a unique stay where elegance, charm and refinement will be the key words throughout your stay. We invite you to experience Romanticism as a true Art of Living in this sublime Haussmann-style mansion. Inspired by the famous artistic and literary movement, the decoration of the hotel will charm you from the moment you arrive by immersing you in a world where luxury, culture and passions mingle. Discover a quiet haven of peace and enjoy the calm and serenity of your room, where the lovely headboards invite you to daydream. Elegant, spacious and comfortable, our rooms will fill you with a feeling of plenitude and incomparable well-being. Continue your adventure in our lounge for a timeless break. Let yourself be seduced by our restaurant and bar Le Bayadère, in homage to Dance and especially to the legendary ballet to which the same name refers. Succumb to temptation and savour our delicious cocktails and refreshments according to your wishes. Treat yourself to a gourmet experience in a chic and modern environment. Our chef's authentic and refined cuisine appeals to your senses for a pure moment of pleasure. Escape, relax and unwind in our wellness area where you can benefit from our exceptional treatments. Sauna, hammam and fitness centre will be at your disposal during your stay. Initiate yourself to Parisian romanticism during your visit to the city of love!

Description:
The newly renovated Whistler Hotel, tucked between the Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est, welcomes you to an unforgettable experience in the heart of Paris’ 10th arrondissement. The Whistler Hotel greets guests in an unusual setting where the tiniest details subtly echo the legendary trains of a bygone era. The decor of its light-filled rooms that subtly recall travelling on the mythical trains of the Belle Epoque promise wonderful nights. In today’s super-fast era, take a moment to relax in our comfortable lobby with leather and wood decor to immerse yourself in the atmosphere. Savor the passage of time at your rhythm, visit our hammam after a busy day as Paris slowly transforms into the City of Light every evening. After a tasty breakfast, explore the hotel neighborhood and peaceful Canal Saint-Martin or venture further to discover the enchanting streets of Montmartre… A voyage within a voyage!

Name: Hotel Jardins d'Eiffel
Description:
The Jardins d’Eiffel Hotel enjoys one of the best locations in Paris, in the Invalides district, left bank, a few steps from the Eiffel Tower, the Champ-de-Mars, the river Seine and the Champs-Élysées. We offer 81 nicely decorated rooms, with a contemporary spirit. Each room is air conditioned with TV, mini-bar, safety box, free Wi-Fi and en suite bathrooms (with shower or bath and hairdryer). Some rooms feature a balcony or terrace and 60 rooms overlook our charming interior garden. Some Premium rooms have a view on the Eiffel Tower, from the windows or from the balcony.
Read more

Name: Hotel Henri IV Rive Gauche
Adress: 9 rue Saint Jacques 05 Arr., 75005 Paris France
Description:
L’Hôtel Henri IV Rive Gauche vous invite à un voyage dans le Paris littéraire, et artistique au cœur du quartier historique de la ville lumière. En vous accueillant, l’hôtel Henri IV vous convie à découvrir les quais de Seine bordés de l’hôtel de la Monnaie, de l’Institut de France, de Notre Dame de Paris ainsi que tous les lieux évoqués par Hemingway dans « Paris est une fête ». Vous habiterez une maison du 17ème siècle offrant le confort moderne, le charme d’une décoration authentique et raffinée avec un accueil chaleureux et attentif pour répondre à vos attentes d’un séjour inoubliable.
Read more

Name: Hotel Les Jardins du Marais
Description: Located in the heart of Le Marais, historical and trendy district, near Place des Vosges and Bastille Opera, Les Jardins du Marais present 263 elegant rooms and suites and a beautiful private garden terrace. A real oasis of charm and tranquility in the heart of Paris. The restaurant and its beautiful terrace offer a French inspired contemporary cuisine. With its 10800 sqft of conference facilities, the hotel, with its five modular room located around the private gardens and a glass canopy, can accommodate up to 450 people.

Name: Hotel Saint Germain
Description:
Hotel Saint-Germain is a property 4* of charm and character. Upscale comfort and customised hospitality, right in the heart of Paris. Our 17th-century private mansion has not lost its early ambiance of a wealthy, middle-class residence. You will feel at home at this boutique hotel – a delightful, secluded mansion, offering a warm welcome. Enjoy our reception rooms with their exposed beams, settle down into our plump armchairs and enjoy a book from the library or relax in one of our enchantingly elegant guestrooms. Here is a place where you can take time to enjoy life and feel at home. You will be surprised and delighted! All our rooms, whether Classic or Superior and including our Junior Suite, are meticulously appointed – just relax and let yourself be cosseted. Enjoy the personalised service of an inimitable 4* guaranteed to exceed your every expectation. The hotel is located in the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Prés, right next to the secret world of Rue du Bac.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Italian and 1 more

Name: Hotel Novotel Paris Porte De Versailles
Adress: 4 avenue de la Porte de la Plaine, 75015 Paris France
Description:
Sublimé par son architecture contemporaine, le Novotel Paris Porte de Versailles est la nouvelle adresse incontournable de Paris et du quartier de la Porte de Versailles. Facilement accessible, notre hôtel dispose de tous les atouts pour un séjour parisien réussi : chambres et suites au design épuré, espaces de vie insolites, lieux de restauration surprenants et salles de réunion dernier cri. Prenez un aller simple pour le Sud en découvrant notre nouveau restaurant et café Rosé : une cuisine contemporaine aux accents de Provence vous y attend, on raconte même qu'on entend même les cigales. Notre rooftop avec une vue imprenable sur la Tour Eiffel ouvrira ses portes en décembre 2020. Adresse parisienne du 15e arrondissement et bénéficiant de plusieurs lignes de métro, tram et bus, vos déplacements sont facilités vers les attractions de Paris, dont la tour Eiffel et le quartier Montparnasse. Situé à l'entrée du parc Paris Expo Porte de Versailles, au pied de l'entrée B et directement accessible du Pavillon 6.
Read more

Name: Hotel Gaston
Description: Near the Paris Convention Center and a few steps from the Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Elysees, the hotel Gaston welcomes you to an authentic Parisian experience : • Hotel entirely renovated in 2014 • Perfect soundprounding and reversible air-conditionning • HD TV, individual safe, hairdryer • Free internet access

Name: Lenox Montparnasse
Description:
Located in the Left Bank, in the heart of mythical Montparnasse, where the great artists, writers and painters of the 20th century once lived, the hotel will delight those who love Parisian art and literature.Housed in a period building, hotel Lenox Montparnasse has genuine character and a warm atmosphere brought to life by portraits of the legendary personalities that were the soul of the area. Man Ray was once resident in room 37…A friendly welcome combined with a chic, casual atmosphere invite guests to relax and enjoy the French art of living.Nearby theatres, cinemas, cafés and restaurants offer numerous entertainment and dining options.The location is also close to the Latin Quarter and Saint Germain des Prés.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Japanese and 2 more

Name: Hotel Duo
Description: The essence of Hotel Duo Paris revels in its unique perfect location. Niched at the heart of the Marais, where tradition and history goes along with creative effervescence of designers and art galleries. A true fusion of cultures and visual & culinary entertainment one has to experience. Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just 140 meters from Duo hotel, providing direct access to Le Louvres, Bastille or Champs Elysees. Notre Dame Cathedral is a 10-minute walk away.

Adress: 3, bd de Grenelle 15 Arr., 75015 Paris France
Description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Paris, Hotel Eiffel Seine is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its charming environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel Eiffel Seine makes it easy to enjoy the best of Paris.

Name: Melia Paris Champs Elysees
Adress: 102 avenue Victor Hugo Distrito 16, 75116 Paris France
Description: The luxurious Melia Paris Champs Elysees Hotel is located in an elegant residential area of Paris, close to the famous Champs Elysees and the Victor Hugo Square with its Fountains. Walking distance from the Arc de Triomphe (1 km), the Eiffel Tower (2 km) and the Seine river. The Business Center CNIT is just 5 km away. Well communicated by train & metro, and close to the International Airports of Orly (20 km) & Charles de Gaulle (35 km). While in Paris, visit as well nearby Versailles (35 km) and/or Disneyland Paris (45 km).

Name: Castex Hotel
Description: This three star hotel is located right in the heart of the Marais. With its Louis XIII furniture and style, it has retained its 17th century character, the golden age of this district.Charm and originality blend with elegance, thanks to a subtle mix of wood panelling and wrought iron.Your stay in our hotel is sure to be a marvellous experience, because we know that when you travel, you hope to feel like you’re at home, if not even better.

Name: Hotel Central Saint Germain
Description:
Hotel Central Saint Germain combines the grace and typically Parisian comfort.Centrally located in the Latin quarter and Saint Germain des Prés, near the Seine, Notre-Dame, the Sorbonne and the Pantheon, near the Jardin du Luxembourg.Building with a charming new decor since 2009 with 5 levels in various environments, it offers luxury and tranquility of a beautiful house in the heart of an historic district in a setting designed in harmony for all your well-being.Its central location allows you easy access to tourist areas and business.Our 35 rooms are all equipped with bathroom, hairdryer, satellite TV, air conditoning, personal safe, modem and wifi access.A great welcome awaits you for a wonderful stay.

Name: Eden Hotel Opera
Adress: 35 rue Jean Baptiste Pigalle 09 Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description: A warm welcome in a contemporary style with a typical Parisian set characterizes the hotel Eden Opera. The hotel Eden Opera is a superior three star and is located close to Montmartre, The Opera House Garnier, big department stores of Haussmann Boulevard and many theaters and cabarets as Mogador or Moulin Rouge.Reception is personalized. Our professional and dynamic staff is omnipresent to answer to all your needs and to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

Name: Hotel Harvey
Adress: 7 B rue du Debarcadere 17 Arr., 75017 Paris France
Description:
Independent hotel located between the Palais of Congresses, Porte Maillot and Etoile square, with all rooms equipped with bath/shower room, air conditioning, safety box, minibar, satellite TV, and free Internet Wi-fi. A large buffet breakfast is provided. You can choose between comfortable OPERA classic rooms or also large ETOILE superior rooms with accommodation possible for up to 4 persons (extra beds). Bus terminals from airports (CDG, Orly, Beauvais) at 5 min walk maximum. Multi-language, nice and efficient welcome reception service.

Name: Relais Christine
Description: The Relais Christine, built on the foundations of a 13th-century abbey, is your Left Bank peaceful haven. Behind the gate is a cosy world and an ambiance of fine antiques. The 48 guest rooms and suites, all individually decorated, are stylish comfortable, some of them with a private terrace on the garden. Enjoy a peaceful haven in the garden or unwind after a day of sightseeing in the hotel's spa with exclusive treatments. Bicycles are available for guests to use free of charge, as well as a convertible Fiat 500 for a small extra fee.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, German and 2 more

Name: Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy
Adress: 1 rue de Libourne Cour Saint-Emilion, 75012 Paris France
Description:
In the heart of East Paris neighborhood, Pullman Paris Centre-Bercy is ideally located. Close to the AccorHotels Arena, the Cite de la Mode & du Design, and the Cour Saint-Emilion, a few steps away from the metro line 14 as well as Gare de Lyon, and quickly accessible from the two main airports, it is the perfect place for business, leisure and lifestyle. The lobby and event center have just been renovated by British and iconic designer Tom Dixon. The hotel offers a seamless blend of work and play with the LIVE corner bar hosting live performances and DJs sets every week, a pamper bar with a barber and a manicurist, open or private coworking spaces, an artist playground sheltering contemporary exhibitions, a privatized cinema by mk2, l'Esprit du 12eme, a bistronomic restaurant, two terraces, and a 1500 sq.m event center with a patio. Please note : the pool & spa area will reopen in the near future.
