Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Chinese and 2 more

Name: Hotel Splendide Royal Paris
Description:
Faithful to the values of art de vivre of the Roberto Naldi Collection, the Hotel Splendide Royal Paris is a discreet location, refined, nestled in the heart of one of the most elite streets of Paris, calm and elegant. Inside the Splendide Royal, the beauty of warm materials and refinement of the most contemporary comfort combines with subtlety. The atmosphere is that of a place of luxury, distinguished, tasteful and without ostentation: here one feels at ease. The classic-style decorations redesigned with subtle Italian touches give each junior suite and suite a unique and personalized charm. With a capacity of 12 junior suites and suites located in pairs on six floors, the objective of the Roberto Naldi Collection is to create "A Parisian house" chic and relaxed in an Italian spirit, a kind of "pocket-sized family Palace." An elegant Italian restaurant will open its doors in early 2017. It will propose a simple cuisine, refined and extremely qualitative under the leadership of the starred chef, Michelino Gioia, who officiates at Pauline Borghese restaurant at the Parco dei Principi Grand Hotel & Spa in Rome, one of the establishments of the Roberto Naldi Collection.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 2 more

Name: Maison Souquet
Description:
Only those in the know will experience the luxury of the Maison Souquet, hidden behind an understated facade signaled by two red lanterns. The bawdy, wanton legend of the City of Light was forged in the area around Montmartre, a legend of which the Maison Souquet now forms part. In a building that served as a pleasure house during the Belle Epoque, one of the most lavish and licentious pages in the history of Paris has been brought to life. Jacques Garcia has applied his talent to recreating the mystery, elegance, exoticism, sensuality, and ostentatious luxury of these establishments with their own architectural mores. Carried away from the city on the whimsy of the decor, the mind is free to pursue pleasure amid a fantasy setting conjured through artwork, sofas, causeuses, and divans. Perfectly at home, guests see their room open out onto a plush setting where life revolves around the ritual of tea-time, play, and rendezvous before and after dinner.
Read more

Name: Hotel Moliere
Description: New four star boutique hotel in chic 1st arrondissement. Our 4* hotel sits in a prime central location in the heart of Paris. Within walking distance of the River Seine, Place Vendome, the Louvre and the Jardin de Tuileries and the Opera Garnier, the 1st arrondissement is considered Paris's most prestigious district. This historic area offers the best of culture and entertainment with traditional architecture style and elegant French formal gardens, world-famous museums, haute-couture and jewellery shops, antiques dealers and art galleries.

Name: LAZ’ Hotel Spa Urbain
Description: The LAZ' Hôtel Spa Urbain is a 4* boutique hotel, design and industrial style which will open in the fall of 2017 at the heart of cosmopolitan areas of Saint Lazare & South Pigalle. 56 rooms & lofts, 12 privatized terrace with a view on Paris rooftops, a Lounge with direct access to our outdoor patio. A stylish Bar and a hippie chic SPA with a pool, sauna, hammam, gym, massages.

Name: Hotel Turenne Le Marais
Description: The Hotel Turenne Le Marais seduce you with its warm and friendly atmosphere.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 2 more

Name: Acacias Etoile Hotel
Adress: 11 rue des Acacias 17th Arr., 75017 Paris France
Description: Conveniently located near the Arc de Triomphe, the Acacias Etoile is a beautiful, quiet and well-kept 3-star hotel ideal for business trips or holiday travel. Very lively area, close to many shops and restaurants. Via the Argentine or Arc de Triomphe metro station, direct access to all of Paris and the business district of La Défense in just minutes. Paying public car park nearby. Romms from 109 €…

Name: Le Pavillon de la Reine
Description:
The Pavillon de la Reine & Spa, a discreet luxury address in the heart of Le Marais! Established in the Place des Vosges, both one of the most famous and most historical districts of Paris, the Pavillon de la Reine perpetuates an elegant atmosphere combined with discreet luxury to attract the most stylish globetrotters in the world in their quest for a quiet and discreet place to relax. The Pavillon de la Reine is embellished with its shady gardens s and its distinctive facade. Its historical setting has been totally reviewed by Didier Benderli (Kerylos Interieurs) blended with a contemporary and friendly touch, combining aesthetics with original ideas. The Pavillon de la Reine comprises 56 rooms and suites 5 stars all decorated distinctively, using different shades of colours and furniture. The Spa de la Reine by Codage, a revelation to your Senses! The 250 m² Spa (2,420 sq feet) comprises 2 treatment booths, a gym and Jacuzzi as well as a steam bath.
Read more

Name: Hotel des Grands Hommes
Description:
If you are looking for a boutique hotel in Paris, with both a neat, elegant and warm decoration, the Hôtel des Grands Hommes is the ideal choice. Located in the heart of the Latin Quarter in Paris, a few steps from the Luxembourg Gardens and facing the Pantheon, the Hotel des Grands Hommes wiith an empire style offers a personalized and professional welcome in an exceptional place, full of history and charm. Our rooms offer exceptional and unique assets with stunning views of the Pantheon and Paris, with balconies and private terraces for some of them. Our high-end bathrooms, renovated in 2019, will only enhance your stay. Hotel Des Grands Hommes offers all modern amenities including a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and air conditioning. Our internet network is equipped with fiber and offers to our guest a complete satisfaction. Reception and concierge service are available 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a rich and full breakfast, served in our room or in your room. There is a public car park nearby which is available to guests. The staff of the Hotel des Grands Hommes will be pleased to welcome you during your future visit to Paris and will offer you a unique experience in Paris.
Read more

Name: Courtyard by Marriott Paris Gare de Lyon
Description:
Tucked within an eclectic neighborhood and offering breathtaking views of some of the city's most legendary landmarks, the 4-star Courtyard Paris Gare de Lyon sets the tone for a remarkable hotel experience. Whether you're in France for business or on a family vacation, you'll find everything you need here to pursue your passions. Settle in to contemporary, comfortable rooms with deluxe bedding, ergonomic work areas, high-speed Wi-Fi and oversized TVs with streaming capabilities - not to mention awe-inspiring views of the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame, Sacré-Coeur and La Defense. Start or end your day in Paris with a meal at Kitchen & Bar @Gare de Lyon, our French bistro, or challenge yourself to a workout in the hotel fitness center. If you're in Paris for business, you can explore our flexible meeting rooms, which accommodate up to 100 seated guests. Our close proximity to the train and Metro stations makes it easy for you to discover the city, too. Your 4-star getaway awaits at Courtyard Paris Gare de Lyon.

Adress: 20 rue de la Gaite, 75014 Paris France
Description: In the south of Paris and 5 minutes from the Montparnasse station, the 4-star Mercure Paris Gare Montparnasse welcomes you in the famous rue de la Gaité. From this ideal location, discover the lively areas of Saint-Germain des Prés and Saint-Michel or pla ces laden with history such as the Invalides. The quality services of our hotel will meet all your expectations: gastronomic cuisine, an excellent choice of wines, comfortable rooms, everything thought out for your relaxation.

Name: Hilton Paris Opera
Description: Experience classic Parisian elegance at the newly renovated Hilton Paris Opera hotel; a landmark building which features a magnificent lobby decorated with crystal chandeliers, marble columns, bronze statues and stunning art pieces by Charles Joseph Lameire.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 2 more

Name: Neuville Arc de Triomphe Hotel
Description:
In the heart of Paris' 17th arrondissement, a short 15-minute stroll from the Arc de Triomphe, the Neuville Arc de Triomphe hotel is located at 3 rue Verniquet in a former 19th-century mansion featuring all of Paris' typical charm. This 4-star hotel shows its appeal by its location in a quiet district surrounded by some of the finest examples of Haussmann architecture. In the vicinity of the avenue des Champs Elysees and Parc Monceau, the Neuville Arc de Triomphe hotel is well served by the city's public transit system, offering direct access to many monuments and Paris districts: the Garnier Opera House, Eiffel Tower, Beaubourg-Pompidou Center, the Marais, Invalides and the Latin Quarter.

Name: Hotel Albe Bastille
Adress: 66 rue de Charenton 12 Arr., 75012 Paris France
Description: Freshly renovated and refurbished, the Pavillon Saint-Louis Bastille (formerly Hôtel Belle Epoque) is ideally located between the Place de la Bastille and the Gare de Lyon train station and within walking distance of the famous Place des Vosges and Marais district.Developed around a small courtyard, the Pavillon Saint-Louis Bastille hosts 31 bedrooms that will provide charm and refinement to the guests.

Name: Hotel du Collectionneur
Description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Paris, Hotel du Collectionneur is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel du Collectionneur makes it easy to enjoy the best of Paris. The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. The Hotel du Collectionneur features a concierge and room service. In addition, as a valued guest, you can enjoy an exceptional Lounge on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, the Hotel du Collectionneur is located a short distance from Eiffel Tower (1.4 mi) and Montmartre (1.6 mi). If you’re looking for something to do, Arc de Triomphe (0.6 mi), the Champs-Elysées (0.5 mi), and Palais Garnier (1.2 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of the Hotel. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, The Hotel du Collectionneur is sure to make your visit to Paris one worth remembering.
Read more

Name: Classics Hotel Bastille
Adress: 131 rue de Charonne 11th Arr., 75011 Paris France
Description:
Classics Hotel Bastille is a small charming 3 stars hotel with 35 contemporary-styled rooms. It is perfectly located between Place de la Bastille, Place de la Nation and the Pere Lachaise cemetery. The Marais and the Louvre Museum are only at a few bus stops. At the Metro stop Charonne, 100 meters from the hotel, you can reach the mains touristic places of Paris like the Department Stores, Champs-Elysees Avenue and Eiffel Tower. The rooms have all been renovated and offer the modern comfort of a 3 stars hotel (free internet wireless, LCD TV 82 cm, safety deposit box, hair drier). One single room is equipped for guests with reduced mobility. Buffet breakfast is served below the veranda. If you wish, in summer time, you can enjoy it in our garden. A private and paying garage is available on request (not accessible for 4X4). All the staff will make a pleasure to help you during your stay. Just ask us!

Name: Hotel Le Belmont Paris
Description:
Le Belmont, a luxurious setting near the Champs-ElyseesHotel Le Belmont is a hotel located at 30 rue Bassano in the Golden Triangle, a hotspot for Parisian luxury, and situated just a few steps away from the Champs-Elysees, Arc de Triomphe, Avenue George V and Avenue Montaigne. This luxurious setting, renovated in 2013, has 74 Romantic-style rooms and suites. In the heart of the French capital, Le Belmont invites you onto its cobblestone patio in a peaceful and quiet setting.A Haussmann-style building with an interior design using dressed stone and the finest wood, Le Belmont hotel offers a peaceful setting with a touch of orientalism. It reveals the inner poet of Paris, "the city of light".Designed by Alexandre Danan, Le Belmont is a symbol of the French "Art of Living".

Name: Garden Elysee Hotel
Adress: 12 rue Saint Didier 16th Arr, 75116 Paris France
Description: Garden Elysée hotel, a secret address tucked down near the Trocadéro and nestled between the Eiffel Tower and Champs Elysées. The large lobby and lounges with fireplaces feature bursts of violet and orange to create a modern, elegant, stylish and relaxing setting. This leafy hotel is a haven of peace in the heart of Paris. No matter the season, guests can relax on the patio amongst the many plants or settle into the wicker furniture in the winter garden. Direct access to Congress center, free WIFI, parking places extra charge).

Name: Hotel Westside Arc de Triomphe
Description:
The Team of the Hotel Westside Arc de Triomphe (formerly Waldorf Arc de Triomphe) has an obsession: to make the life of its Guests more pleasant and more comfortable and turn their trip to Paris to a remarkable moment that gives them the taste of return in the Capital … and to the Hotel Westside. Our 4 star Hotel is famously known for the quality of its welcome, the friendliness of its Team and its « cozy » atmosphere. This place is an ideal hotel for a business trip to Paris. Its comfort and its location are also appreciated by tourists wishing to visit Paris in excellent conditions of calm and comfort. Welcome !
Read more

Name: Citadines Place d'Italie Paris
Adress: 18 Place D Italie 13th Arr., 75013 Paris France
Description:
This Apart'hotel is situated at the crossroads of two very different worlds - on one side of the square lies Chinatown, with its exotic sights and smells as well as its restaurants and supermarkets. On the other, is a typically French scene - the Butte-aux-Cailles village is filled with quiet cobbled streets, small houses and bistros. It overlooks a tree-lined street, and is in an important economic area just a few minutes from the Ecole nationale des Arts and Metiers, Pitie-Salpetriere hospital and the Latin Quarter. From the Apart'hotel, you can take a stroll in the Jardin des Plantes and Natural History Museum, or head towards the Bibliotheque Mitterrand (the new National Library). For lively atmosphere and bistros, head to the Latin quarter nearby. Choice of Apart'hotel The 3-star establishment offers 169 apartments, all with air conditioning in over 8 floors, including 130 Studios for 1 or 2 guests, and 39 One-Bedroom apartments for up to 4 guests. The Studios are furnished with double beds or twin beds. In Apartments there are twin sofa beds in the lounge area and one double bed or two single beds in the bedrooms. Ideal Location The Apart'hotel is located in a typical French area - the very quaint Butte aux Cailles is filled with charming streets and little bistros. The Jardin des Plantes with its Natural History Museum, the Francois Mitterrand Library (the TGB), the famous Chinese Quarter and the Gobelins tapestry workshop are attractions within easy reach. Bercy sports arena, Censier and Jussieu universities and the Arab World Institute are also a short distance away. Comfort and Convenience All Studios and Apartments in this residence are air-conditioned and have their own bathroom, with separate toilet in the One-Bedroom apartments. There is a fully-equipped kitchen area complete with electric hob, microwave, fridge and dishwasher in all apartments. Each apartment also has a desk, TV with satellite channels and direct-line phone. Linen and towels are provided. The apartment is cleaned and linen and towels are changed for free once a week. Additional housekeeping service is available upon request and is charged according to your needs. 7 Studios are equipped for guests with reduced mobility. For your comfort, the property is 100% non-smoking.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Catalan and 4 more

Name: Hotel de Fleurie
Adress: 32 rue Gregoire de Tours 06 Arr., 75006 Paris France
Description: On the Left Bank, at the crossroads of Odéon and the St-Germain Market, an ideally located, small quiet street, stands a charming hotel with a white 18th-c. façade, and a statue watching over vigil every floor. Indoor, the same spirit of refinement from the lounge to the breakfast room. Stone, tiles, woodwork, paintings and antiques all make for cosy universe and an impression of snug serenity. Since 1988, the Marolleau family have carried on the tradition of hospitality.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Italian and 1 more

Name: Grand Hotel Malher
Description:
We are a family establishement for the past 3 generations, in the very heart of the Marais area, just next door to Place des Vosges, the Bastille Opera House, the Picasso and Carnavalet museums, and close to the Ile Saint Louis, Notre Dame, Pompidou center and the Grand Louvre.We are located 2 minutes from the metro station Saint Paul.In our historical area, you will also find antique dealers, art galleries, fashion boutiques, restaurants, typical bars and colourful markets.The Grand Hotel Malher is being entirely renovated now and 2 floors are already finished. We will become a 3 star hotel by the end of the year. All rooms including bathrooms and furnitures are new, with modern and elegant design. You will also be delighted to have breakfast in our 17th century wine cellar.Our charming team will be happy to help you if you need information on your business trip or if you are visiting Paris.
Read more

Name: Hotel Celeste
Description: 30 room boutique hotel located in the Batignolles-Monceau district near Place de Clichy. Located between Montmartre and Opéra Garnier, nearby Batignolles Village, at 10 mn to the Arc, Celeste Hotel is a new four stars boutique hotel & spa of 30 rooms and suites.

Description:
Citadines Trocadéro Paris is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Paris, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Close to some of Paris' most popular landmarks, such as Palais Garnier - Opéra National de Paris (2.1 mi) and Parc des Princes (2.3 mi), Citadines Trocadero Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at Citadines Trocadero Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a kitchenette providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.

Name: Hotel George - Astotel
Adress: 46, rue Notre Dame de Lorette 9th Arr., 75009 Paris France
Description:
Located in a beautiful, century-old building in the 9th district of Paris, the George Hotel is the perfect place for your stays in downtown Paris. Completely renovated last year in a decidedly Parisian style, it perfectly combines modernity and practicality. With its quiet and colorful atmosphere and its location near two metro stations, our hotel is recommended for both business travelers and holidaymakers. Upon arrival, you will be greeted by our warm and caring team , at your disposal 24 x 24. Our 46 rooms are decorated with modern furnishings, provide excellent soundproofing, comfortable beds, satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower. The hotel is entirely air-conditioned and offers free Wi-Fi. A rich and varied breakfast buffet is served every morning including hot drinks, pastries, juices, cereals, eggs, etc. The hotel is ideally located between Montmartre (Moulin-Rouge / Sacred Heart) and Opera, just steps away from a Metro station with direct connection to the Champs Elysees. Find endless shopping options right around the corner with Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann, etc. The airport shuttle A/R is available for a fee and upon reservation. The trip takes about 30 minutes. There is also a convenient car park nearby. The George Opera Hotel is 140 meters from the Saint George Metro station (line 12) and 400 meters from the Pigalle (lines 2 and 12) metro station.

Name: Hotel France Albion
Adress: 11 rue Notre Dame de Lorette 75009 Paris, 75009 Paris France
Description:
The France Albion Hotel is superbly located for a Parisian visit. Metro line 12 crosses Paris from north to south, with the business areas of Paris - Porte de Versailles, Gare Saint Lazare, La Defense - on one side, and on the other side is Tourist Paris: Opera, Madeleine, Concorde, Musee d'Orsay, Jardins du Louvre, Champs Elysees… Sports enthusiasts are not forgotten: The Stade de France is 20 minutes with the RER B or D from North Station. The Parc des Princes is 40 minutes with line 9 (direct). In an ideal position less than 20 minutes from the main Paris stations: Gare du Nord by bus n° 43, line 7 for the Gare de l'Est, line 12 for Montparnasse and line 14 to the Madeleine for Gare de Lyon. The Paris airports are within easy reach: The Roissy bus from Opera or the RER from Gare du Nord will take you to Roissy / Charles de Gaulle, whilst for Orly, take the Air France Cars shuttle from Montparnasse on line 12, or the RER from Gare de Nord. We can also provide private airport shuttle transfer in either direction on request.

Name: Hotel Le Littre
Description:
Hotel Littre offers you a warm welcome at the heart of Paris. From the moment you set foot in the hotel, the concierge and the rest of our team will give you a personal welcome, and you will always be greeted by a friendly face during your stay. We take pride in offering a genuine welcome. Hotel Littre has been in the same family for three generations and is still going strong. This place has real character Hotel Littre has a unique feel to it which radiates peace and tranquility to all its guests. Classic elegance perfectly complements the warm atmosphere. Whether in the cosy bar, the new winter garden or in your room, you will feel at ease. Luxury at Hotel Littre is expressed through timeless refinement reflected in the surroundings, furnishings and gestures. "Art de vivre" the French way… It occupies an ideal Paris location between Montparnasse & Saint Germain des Pres The rue Littre is one of those Paris streets which you may stumble across by chance; a quiet street cached between bustling shopping streets. Discreet and elegant Away from the city hustle and bustle but still close to Paris life, tucked away in the street of the same name. Daytime pleasures near the Hotel Littre include Montparnasse and Saint-Germain-des-Pres, a quick trip to the Bon Marche department store, or the Jardin du Luxembourg, Hotel des Invalides and the Eiffel Tower. When night falls, you have Paris theatres nearby and the popular Left Bank brasseries. There is nothing better than exploring the treasures of the French capital.

Name: Suites & Hotel Helzear Champs-Elysees
Description:
Our 27 Suites and apartments located steps away from the Champs Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe offer you the unique opportunity to both enjoy the city buzz and a Parisian life cocoon. Whether you stay with us for business reasons or to discover Paris, you will have the luxury to retreat in your Suite of this magnificent Haussmannian hotel. All our Suites and apartments, from 2 adults, are fitted with a kitchenette so you can prepare a simple meal at home like true Parisians. Our 27 Suites, all different, spread over 6 floors with lift, respect the Hausmannian spirit of this beautiful 19th century building. As Parisian moments creators, we care about preserving the authenticity of the property. Each Suite combines modernity and attachment to noble material and character furniture. Our unique offer associates prestigious hotel services with the possibility to live as a Parisian in the centre of Paris. A neighbourhood in the Golden Triangle: steps away from the Champs Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe, you will be lucky to live like the few privileged Parisians of the area. Besides the local touristic monuments, museums and attractive shops, we are ideally located for your business or family travels. Discover below all the opportunities to wander around Paris and its surroundings from the hotel. We are well located to make the most of the beautiful Parisian monuments: • Arc de Triomphe, 8 minutes’ walk • Eiffel Tower, 20 minutes’ walk • Alexandre III Bridge, 20 minutes’ walk • Alma Bridge, Liberty Flame, 10 minutes’ walk • Invalides, 30 minutes’ walk On the shopping side, you will be spoiled too! We are located: • 2 minutes’ walk from the Champs Élysées • 3 minutes’ walk from the George V Avenue • 10 minutes’ walk from the Avenue Montaigne If you are here for business reasons, we are: • 3 minutes’ walk from the George V Metro station (M°1) • 10 minutes’ walk from the Metro and RER Charles de Gaulle Etoile station (M° 1, M°2, M°6, RER A) • 8 minutes’ walk from the Alma-Marceau station (M°9) • 10 minutes by car from Porte Maillot, 2 Metro stops from Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro station (M°1) • 15 minutes by RER or Metro from business area La Défense from Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro station (M°1 or RER A) And if you have time to explore the Parisian museums, you are best placed for: • Yves Saint Laurent Foundation, 5 minutes’ walk • Palais de Tokyo, 10 minutes’ walk • Modern Art Museum, 10 minutes’ walk • Galliera Museum, 10 minutes’ walk • Asian Arts National Museum, 10 minutes’ walk Finally, if you are here with your family, nothing could be easier! • Disneyland Paris: 45 minutes by RER A from Charles de Gaulle Etoile station Palace of Versailles: 30 minutes by RER C from Pont de l’Alma station

Name: Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa
Description:
Paris j’Adore Hotel & Spa est un hôtel-spa 5 étoiles qui invite les amoureux à célébrer leur passion au cœur de Paris. Luxueux et excentrique, l'hôtel allie le meilleur du classicisme français avec sept thèmes inattendus. Émerveillez-vous devant les lustres monumentaux, le cristal vénitien, le marbre, les balançoires, les boiseries françaises… Amusez-vous avec votre iPad dans la chambre pour créer l'ambiance de vos rêves… huit options d'éclairage d'ambiance, quatre parfums enivrants, ouvrez et fermez automatiquement vos rideaux… Et parce que le luxe est composé d'une myriade de petits détails, vous pouvez même commencer à faire couler votre bain en appuyant sur un simple bouton… De délicieuses spécialités locales et internationales vous attendent au Restaurant j'Adore, un restaurant à thème qui offre une agréable vue sur le jardin et qui abrite un bar, parfait pour prendre un verre avant le dîner. Passez de purs moments de détente dans l'incroyable spa de l'établissement, un centre bien-être qui propose des massages, des soins corporels et des soins du visage. Profitez des nombreuses infrastructures présentes comprenant notamment une piscine couverte, un bain à remous, une Grotte de sel, un sauna et hammam.

Open 24 hours a day, this elegant and discreet hotel is a real haven of peace and quiet in the heart of Paris.

Their decor plays on the dualities which have always enlivened the neighbourhood: graphic shapes and industrial furniture from the factories sit alongside highly colourful, quality fabrics evoking the workers' allotment gardens of the Menilmontant quarter.

Nearby points of interest include the Alesia shopping district, the charming Parc Montsouris with its lake, cascade and sloping lawns, the Palais des Sports, a famous concert venue can be found in the near vicinity of the hotel. A popular flea and vintage street market is held every week-end Porte de Vanves, near Porte de Chatillon.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 2 more

Name: Hotel Saint-Andre des Arts
Adress: 66 rue Saint Andre des Arts, 75006 Paris France
Description:
With its combination of a bohemian, pop artist sensibility and its invitingly cosy and contemporary ambiance, the Hotel Saint-André des Arts will help you to fully immerse yourself in the vibrant artistic and literary side of Paris.
Entirely revitalized by the skill and creativity of the interior architect-designer Chloé Nègre, the hotel pays tribute to this rich past by incorporating unique vintage and decorative touches such as bespoke and designer furniture and timelessly evocative lighting.
Read more

Name: Hotel Cambon
Description:
The seven floors of the Cambon Paris have been entirely restructured and renovated, inviting you on a journey through the artistic and literary world of the 19th century. For the hotel reveals itself floor by floor with a tastefully cultivated romantic spirit and delicate colours. Seven floors, for the seven famous figures who lived on Rue Cambon and went down in history, from France's Consulate period to the Second Empire. Empress Eugénie, Chateaubriand, Stendhal... they were all an inspiration to us when decorating the rooms and redesigning them to feel like a guest room in a private home, offering only the very best. Step inside and be carried away by the beauty of the mouldings, the blond warmth of the oak flooring; run your hand over the furniture's pure lines, tracing its curves with your hand, and feel the soft light flooding in; open up to a sweet romantic reverie while contemplating the floral motifs and idyllic little country scenes that unfold around you. Here, there is no desire to show off, just a focus on materials, design, well-being, and know-how that makes each room a restful haven. A cocoon where each vintage object and each painting from our collection naturally finds its place. Where lamps in the purest of blown glass seem to float in the air, echoing the solar discs which diffuse their precious halo of light with infinite softness when night falls. A cosy, perfectly soundproofed nest, ideal for a revitalising break, whose atmosphere extends beyond each room into a bright, streamlined bathroom. A graceful and poetic invitation to unwind.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 3 more

Name: Hotel Academie Saint Germain
Adress: 32 rue des Saints Peres, 75007 Paris France
Description:
In the heart of the legendary Saint-Germain-des-Pres district, its antique-dealers, galleries, designer boutiques... this former mansion of Duc de Rohan, , shares the neighborhood with the Louvre & Orsay Museums, famous cafes including "Le Cafe de Flore" and "Les Deux Magots". tastefully restored offers a cosy atmosphere with old beams and stonework. Like a rare item in a historic case, this nice 18th-century mansion offers a unique scenery in the heart of Saint Germain des Pres. The marriage of the Empire-style decoration and the 18th-century architecture confers to this hotel charm and authenticity.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Japanese and 2 more

Name: Chouchou
Description: Welcome to the chouchou, a French popular, colloquial word, full of affection and kindness used for your special One. Paris, Opera, chouchou Hotel, Private baths & Guinguette (Bar and food market) is a new parisian adress from september 2020, open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 4 more

Name: Villa Beaumarchais
Description:
Écrin situé dans une rue calme du quartier du Marais, la Villa Beaumarchais possède un concept unique rappelant l'univers de la "chasse à courre". De nombreuses références à la vénerie animent l’élégance classique des lieux comme en témoignent les cors enlacés à l’entrée de l’hôtel ou la fresque dans l’ascenseur, œuvre d’un artiste animalier. Derrière la façade classée, tout a été pensé pour faire entrer la lumière et créer un univers étonnamment paisible bien qu'en plein cœur de l’animation parisienne. Les chambres, parfaitement insonorisées, donnent sur un patio verdoyant et offrent le rare privilège de pouvoir dormir la fenêtre ouverte dans la Ville Lumière.
Read more

Name: The People Hostel - Paris 12
Description:
There is no arguing here, Paris is not to be missed. Whether it is your first or hundredth time, a wandering day in the city never disappoints. Our charming hostel in the pretty 12th arrondissement will be the perfect starting point of your day and the final stop you will look forward to. Kick your journey off with a coffee on the 8th floor rooftop to take on its typical pretty Parisian view and finish it with a fresh pint in the bar and its patio. Sleep tight in our brand new comfy beds in private, family or shared rooms. Repeat. We got all you need: a common kitchen, a verdant patio, a rooftop with a vegetable garden, a bar, a cosy living room, a secure parking for bikes and the must is a 24/7 team who is thrilled to share their favourite spots in the city, tasty beers and carefully selected cocktails, WiFi everywhere. We are expecting you!
Read more

Name: Taylor Hotel
Description: Formerly composed of two hotels, one named "L'Annexe" (30 rooms) the other "The Taylor" (37 rooms), Caroline COSTAGLIOLA CONDY, Owner and Manager merged these two establishments to make it the hotel of 55 rooms, which you know now or you will discover very soon! From 2015 to 2019, the Taylor Hotel has entered a renovation phase to offer you 4 categories of rooms, enough to satisfy each of your needs.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 3 more

Name: Ritz Paris
Description:
The Ritz Paris has reopened in June 2016 after an unprecedented restoration. The legendary hotel opens its doors with 71 luxurious suites, including 16 historic Prestige Suites, and 71 rooms. Renowned interior architect Thierry W Despont oversaw the restoration which unveils three restaurants, three bars including famed Bar Hemingway and gorgeous gardens and terraces with retractable roofs and floor heating to be enjoyed year-round. Ecole Ritz Escoffier will benefit from a third demonstration kitchen and the historic Salon Proust with its wood-burning fireplace offers Ritz afternoon tea. This two-story wellness universe of the Ritz Club features an indoor pool and a modern fitness center. A discreet tunnel connecting the parking lot to the hotel is available for completely private guest arrivals and departures.
Read more

Name: Libertel Gare de l'Est Francais
Description: Behind its very fine facade, Hotel Libertel Gare de l'Est Francais offers 70 rooms. At once traditional, innovative and elegant, it is strategically located near gare du Nord and in front of gare de l'Est, 10 min from the Stade de France, 20 min from the Parc des Expositions in Villepinte, 30 min from Roissy Charles de Gaulle by the RER line B, close to the main boulevards, the large department stores and the Opera Garnier.

Name: Dadou Paris - Hotel
Description: Staying at Dadou means enjoying Paris in the shade of the Arc de Triomphe, and being two steps away fromp the Champs Elysées. Dadou, an address with eloquent charm and upright taste, where Parisians from here and abroad enjoy life in all circumstances. Designed as a pied-à-terre, makes it a point of honor of following no rules, except of making you feel good during your stay.

Name: Hotel OFF Paris Seine
Description:
Welcome to Hotel OFF Paris Seine, your Paris “home away from home.” Hotel OFF Paris Seine aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Close to some of Paris' most popular landmarks, such as Latin Quarter (1.3 mi) and Sainte-Chapelle (1.3 mi), Hotel OFF Paris Seine is a great destination for tourists.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel OFF Paris Seine offer air conditioning.

Description:
See why so many travelers make Timhotel Paris Gare de l'Est their hotel of choice when visiting Paris. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a quiet setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a desk, and Villa Saint Martin makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy breakfast buffet during their visit. As an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.

Adress: 41 avenue Ledru Rollin 12th Arr., 75012 Paris France
Description: The Ibis Paris Gare de Lyon Ledru Rollin hotel is located in the centre of Paris, 500 m from the Jardin des Plantes and 2 km from Notre Dame. The railway station is 300 m away and the airport 15 km from the hotel. The hotel has 119 air-conditioned rooms with Wifi Internet access, including 7 adapted for disabled persons. You can also book 1 meeting room. A bar, snacks 24/24, a terrace, private outdoor closed parking and private covered closed pay parking are at your disposal.
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Italian and 1 more

Name: West-End Hotel
Description:
The Hotel West End is a very unique place, a boutique hotel with 49 air-conditioned rooms, which offers you all the comfort of a luxury hotel, with high-end services provided by a professional international team, in a quiet French-style setting. Nestled on the corner of a street in a beautiful Haussmann-style stone building, the balconies on the 2nd and 5th floors are an undeniable advantage in some rooms (5 rooms have a view of the Eiffel Tower, a very romantic setting). Ideally located in a quiet and luminous street in the heart of the famous golden triangle outlined by the Champs Elysées, Avenue Montaigne and Avenue George V, Hotel West End is a very unique spot, gathering all the best places: high fashion boutiques, designer fragrance shops, jewelry stores, restaurants, museums, theaters, cinemas . Close to the hotel, you will discover the Arc de Triomphe, Grand Palais, Lido ... You can also walk to the Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Concorde, Tuileries Gardens and the banks of the Seine.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 3 more

Name: Nolinski Paris
Adress: 16 avenue de l Opera, 75001 Paris France
Description:
The heart of Paris conceals mysteries...to be unlocked by a select few initiates. Moments away from the Comedie Francaise and the Palais Royal gardens, enclosed between layers of history and Haussmann elegance, lies a temple to art and life a la francaise: the NOLINSKI. A minimalist reception made from Carrara marble .In the quiet discretion of its 45 private apartments, this private home safeguards the secrets of the art of living,Designed for locals and travellers alike. From bright, luminous rooms and a mineral spa to the Rejane brasserie and the hushed tones of the Grand Salon, each space is an invitation to let the senses roam and emotions rise. An intimate setting scented with spices and musk, a musical atmosphere and the warm softness of velvet or tweed. Conviviality served with passion. The passion of Epicurean experiences and unimaginable dreams, where the art of attention to detail intuitively paves the way for mystery. Welcome to the inner circle, a gallery of precious moments.
Read more

Name: Perreyve Hotel
Description: The Hôtel Perreyve is a family owned hotel, that combines the charm of a 1901 building with modern comforts (Air Conditioning, private bathroom, LCD TV with international channels, free WiFi access in all rooms etc). We are a stone’s throw-away from the quiet « Luxembourg Garden » and connected to Paris areas and suburbs via public transportation including the subway system (subway stations of St Placide, Notre Dame des Champs…), buses (83, 27, 91…).

Name: Apostrophe Hotel
Description:
The Apostrophe is a stylish design hotel set near Saint-Germain-des-Pres and the Luxembourg Gardens in central Paris. It offers air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi and modern facilities. Guest rooms at the Apostrophe include a flat-screen TV, DVD and CD player and a powerful jet shower together with a rain shower. They are uniquely decorated and each room has a different theme. The Balneo rooms have a jacuzzi bath with chromotherapy. Breakfast is "a la carte" and served in room without any extra charge. The hotel is 100% non-smoking. The Apostrophe is near Vavin Metro station and the RER at Port-Royal. This gives direct access to the heart of the city and CDG or Orly Airport via the RER B.

Description:
The fanciest address: 123 rue du Faubourg Saint Honore, 8th district. A district renowned for its fashion houses, antique shops, art galleries and gourmet restaurants, a few steps from the Champs Elysees. Our hotel is the new "Haute Couture" of the 8th district. We present an original display of materials: Dressed-stone in some rooms , four-poster beds in others, a starry sky above the zinc roof of some bathrooms... Let us guide you through our grand staircase, decorated with red brick in London style, to one of our 41 rooms of unique and contemporary design. Do not hesitate and stay in the perfect place for lovers of fashion and Parisian lifestyle.

Description: Welcome to Maison Astor Paris, a hidden gem on a peaceful street in the luxury and fashion district. Built in 1907 by John Jacob Astor IV, our hotel is thoughtfully designed for a stay that’s rich in history, Parisian chic and Astor’s spirit. Our charming hideaway is steps from Haute Couture shops on the world-famous Avenue des Champs-Élysées, a 10-minute metro ride to the Eiffel Tower, and near the Saint Lazare train station, the gateway to the Normandy region.

Name: Secret de Paris - Hotel & Spa
Description: Secret de Paris invites you to enjoy the unusual experience of travelling while staying still. You are welcomed into a dream-like Paris where monuments fade away only to come sharply back into focus, colours blend as your perception becomes disoriented by the blur of images.In the intimacy of your room, you suddenly become the privileged guest of the Musee d'Orsay, the Moulin-Rouge, the Eiffel Tower or the Garnier Opera House, each delicately evoked by an innovative and amazing approach to design and staging.

Name: Hotel du Petit Moulin
Description:
The Hotel du Petit Moulin is an authentic residence, decorated throughout by Christian Lacroix. With its location in the Haut Marais district, guests will discover a host of treasures. This renowned 4-star boutique hotel gives guests the chance to discover each luxury room and suite's unique charm and character, each one more surprising than the last. The Hotel du Petit Moulin has 16 rooms and one Junior Suite The rooms and suites at the Hotel du Petit Moulin in Paris, each one decorated in different style, all have their own particular colour scheme and character. They are all decorated in a stylish, modern, bold, yet harmonious, style, where every tiny detail corresponds exactly to each room's unique atmosphere.

Name: Hidden Hotel
Adress: 28, Rue De l'Arc de Triomphe, 75017 Paris France
Description:
The Hidden Hotel is a subtle blend of materials, colours, and scents in an ambience that succeeds in being both contemporary and timeless. It's a unique place, where you forget you are in Paris the moment you step in from the bustling streets. In this project, we derive great enjoyment to reveal tempting fragments of mystery and leaving you to discover the hidden remainder. We want every day to be an adventure. We want to draw you into the pleasure of discovering hidden delights: treasures, secret places, a surprising and multicultural cuisine, all tucked away from the sweeping avenues and the neverending hustle of Parisian life. Behind the Hidden Hotel is a philosophy of love and respect for noble materials and hand-made craftsmanship.

Description: Located just a short stroll from the Eiffel Tower and Les Invalides, the Cler Hotel has 26 superbly comfortable rooms and was fully renovated to exacting standards. A beguiling blend of the timelessly classic and the distinctly contemporary, this welcoming hotel on the Left Bank offers beautiful and appealing design without sacrificing the stylishness of simplicity.

Name: Hotel Le A
Description: In the heart of the 8th arrondissement, interior designer Fédéric Mechiche master hands has created a “lieu de vie” in a 4 stars with subtle mix of sophistication and elegance. In the lobby, where a bookcase harbours many artistic books, you can admire a large wall tapestry by Fabrice Hyber. In all 26 rooms you will find a discreet luxury where the artist’s paintings will evoke singular and enigmatic symbols.

Name: Hotel Longchamp Elysees
Description:
The Longchamp Elysées hotel is a very attractive, privately-run hotel; it is ideally located in the centre of Paris, next to Trocadéro square and within easy walking distance of the Eiffel Tower, the renowned Champs-Elysées, several museums and some of the most beautiful shops in Paris.The hotel was completely refurbished in 2013 and now offers a successful blend of elegance, comfort and refinement.The luxury bedding will guarantee you a peaceful night’s sleep.The 19 soundproof rooms all have en suite bathrooms and are equipped with hairdryers. Each has a flat screen LCD television, free WI-FI internet service and individual safe.The hotel has several suites with three or four beds, which are ideal for family trips or if you are travelling with friends.A continental breakfast is served in the dining-room, which looks onto the courtyard patio and there is an Honesty Bar in reception, offering a wide range of refreshments.The hotel reception is open 24/7.Our friendly team will be on hand to help ensure that your stay in Paris is unforgettable.

Most monuments such as Notre-Dame, the Louvre Museum, the Opera House, the Champs Elysées, the Pompidou Centre, the Sainte-Chapelle and the Conciergerie but also the Seine river with the Ile de la Cité and Ile Saint-Louis are walking distance. Name: Hotel Victor Hugo Paris Kleber
Description:
Completely renovated, our hotel offers you the elegance, the charm and the refinement of a French residence. Let yourself be amazed by our rooms combining harmony, comfort, equipment and aesthetics. Some of them, of "Superior" and "Prestige" category, will allow you to enjoy a moment of pure relaxation while relaxing in a whirlpool bathtub. From our terraces, admire the incredible view of the rooftops of Paris, but also the basins of Passy, real jewel unsuspected 16th district. Let yourself be carried away by the warm and trendy atmosphere of our "Les Contemplations" bar and discover our selection of drinks and snacks. A French Breakfast every day from 7:00 to 10:30 around a buffet, offering a wide range of fresh and tasty products. For those in a hurry, a formula Breakfast Express is to be enjoyed at the Bar from 6.30am. Our two coworking lounges have the equipment and comfort necessary for working moments combining efficiency and pleasure. French and international daily newspapers, high-speed Wi-Fi access, a business corner and luggage storage are at your disposal free of charge in our entirely non-smoking establishment. Our staff will be happy to welcome you and guide you throughout your stay to make your parenthesis Parisian unforgettable.

Name: Hotel de Sevres
Adress: 22 rue de l Abbe Gregoire, 75006 Paris France
Description: In the heart of Paris on its famous Left Bank, between the mythical districts of Saint Germain des Pres and Montparnasse, the Hotel de Sevres is an elegant hotel full of charm which welcomes you for holidays, your business trips or just a quiet escapade in the French capital.

Name: Castille Paris
Description:
The Castille is prestigiously located in Rue Cambon near the city’s most exclusive fashion boutiques and signature sights, such as the Louvre, the Champs Elysées and the Centre Pompidou. The hotel's 108 rooms and suites occupy two wings of the building, each with a character of its own: one exudes contemporary elegance, while the other offers a touch of classic French style. In the elegant Salon de Thé, the Castille has something for every occasion at the L’Assaggio restaurant and its bar. During spring and summer, guests can dine under the Parisian stars in the enchanting inner courtyard. The Castille has three daylight meeting rooms to host receptions and private gatherings for up to 55 people. The hotel team can arrange any type of event and make it a memorable occasion. All services are carefully crafted to ensure every guest a superlative experience, from the Les Clefs d’Or Concierge to the 24-hour room service.

Name: Hotel De La Bretonnerie
Adress: 22 rue Ste Croix de la Bretonnerie 04 Arr., 75004 Paris France
Description: A few steps away from the Place des Vosges, the Picasso Museum, the Georges Pompidou Center and from the Notre-Dame, you will enjoy a charming residence typical of the Marais area, which has managed to preserve its character.Each of its 7 suites and 22 rooms, uniquely decorated, invites you to an intimate stay. It resides in an old private hotel from the 17th Century and buried in the heart of Pari, where it is easy to get lost among the old facades and flowered interior gardens.

Name: Hotel Princesse Caroline
Description:
At the heart of the Golden Triangle, near the Champs-Elysées in the 17th district of Paris, Princess Caroline hotel offers you a warm welcome. Our 3-star hotel took its name from Napoleon's sister, Caroline Bonaparte, wife of Joachim Murat. From this imperial history, our hotel has retained a certain idea of the French art of living combined with an elegant and refined atmosphere. As a romantic hotel in the heart of Paris, the Princess Caroline provides the promise of an exceptional stay. Our hotel offers 53 air-conditioned rooms both cosy, quiet and very comfortable. Most of them offer views on the rue Troyon. Rooms on the 7th and last floor look out on the rooftops. The Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysées are just a few stemps away...
Read more

Name: Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France
Adress: 218 rue de Rivoli 01 Arr., 75001 Paris France
Description:
"An unique view in the heart of Paris" The Hôtel Brighton, built on Rue de Rivoli by Lord Egerton at the beginning of the 19th century, became one of the capital’s leading hotels, attracting many British customers. This district of Paris, which is now the 1st arrondissement, was very popular with British clients on The Grand Tour, an initiatory trip across Europe and sometimes as far as Asia with the aim of completing the artistic and cultural education of the young middle classes. The hotel has preserved a large number of antique elements down the years, beginning with the period mosaic with the words "Hôtel Brighton" on the ground beneath the arcades of Rue de Rivoli in front of the hotel. Inside, the marble columns in the hall, the sculpted high reliefs in the bar, the set of antique mirrors and the many French windows, the tall ceilings on the "noble floors" and the exposed beams in the rooms on the upper storeys all bear witness to the history of the site and the people who gave it its charm. But what makes the Hôtel Brighton a truly exceptional place is the breathtaking 180° panorama. To the left, the Louvre, once a royal palace, today a museum, the Tuileries Gardens opposite and the Place de la Concorde to the right with the Eiffel Tower in the background. One of your best memories of Paris will be this unique view.
Read more

Name: Hotel de Seze
Description: Just 50 meters from Madeleine Church and metro stop Madeleine (line 8, Hotel de Seze offers suites and rooms set in a renovated stately townhouse. On site you will find a hammam, a fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. Each air-conditioned room features free WiFi access, a desk and a 42-inch LED TV with 42 satellite channels and free video on demand. The private bathrooms have a bathtub or a walk-in shower with a rain shower-head, free luxury Clarins amenities, bathrobe and slippers.

Stay in one of our 34 rooms. Both modern and inviting, all rooms are non-smoking. With their chestnut-beige and burgundy tones, select choice of fabrics and furniture crafted from wenge wood, our rooms will ensure visitors a cosy stay.

A Nespresso coffee machine is available in each room, that allows you to have a coffee "on the go" whenever you want.

In a beautifull atmosphere, these rooms in the center of Paris adapt to your desires: double rooms for lovers, communicating rooms for families or even with terraces. Made from materials of character: solid oak, black porcelain, marble, light parquet ... the rooms at Hotel du Sentier are meant to be lively, welcoming hotel residents like long-time friends.

Numerous bus and metro lines near the hotel offer quick and easy access to the city's top tourist attractions.

Name: Novotel Paris Centre Bercy
Description:

At the foot of line 14 & 6 you will be 10 minutes from the center of Paris. Our establishment is located 5min walk from the Gare de Lyon and 2min from the Gare de Bercy Its proximity to the Gare de Lyon (RER A) will allow you to reach Disneyland in 40min. Name: Le Petit Beaumarchais Hotel & Spa
Description:
Looking for a place to stay in Paris? Then look no further than :The Petit Beaumarchais Hotel & Spa, located in the heart of historic Paris, a few steps from Place des Vosges and Place de la Bastille, is a charming, comfortable and warm place to come and sleep and relax. A place where people come easily and with pleasure, a bit like spending the night with friends. Quite simply, a place where you feel good. We have therefore imagined the hotel as a large, welcoming and lively house: you can come and drink your coffee on the bar island, organize a professional meeting in the living rooms, read a book in the library or relax at the spa. All the rooms are tastefully decorated, every detail has been thought out and redesigned to find the right balance between a pretty decoration and the essential comfort of a hotel. The colors of our rooms are carefully chosen by our decorator, a painter by training, to create a soft and warm atmosphere in each room Every morning, our guest can taste our delicious pastries: croissants, pain au chocolat, fresh breads… … a real treat Coffee, tea, freshly squeezed fruit juice, cakes, cereals, yogurts, dried fruits… On the savory side, a selection of quality cheese and cold meats. After a long day of work or a visit, you can privately take advantage of our Spa area to relax in the Flotarium / Sauna or have a massage treatment by an approved practitioner according to their choice. Our guests can also take advantage of our Bar to enjoy our house cocktails or other drinks with friends and to accompany your glasses, a selection of very simple but very good products, chosen from small producers For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, Le Petit Beaumarchais Hotel, is located a short distance from Louvre Museum (1.6 mi) and Palais Garnier - Opéra National de Paris (2.1 mi). While visiting Paris, you may want to try some dumplings at one of the nearby restaurants, such as L'Arpege, Ze Kitchen Galerie, or Raviolis Chinois Nord Est. If you’re looking for something to do, Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Paris (0.9 mi), Le Marais (0.4 mi), and Latin Quarter (1.2 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance from our Hotel. We hope and would be grateful if you shared and told others about this lovely small hotel where you spent the night if you enjoyed your experience with us

Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel. Le Tsuba Hotel features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a wellness area with Sauna, Hammam and gym, and breakfast. Nearby landmarks such as Eiffel Tower (1.3 mi) and Palais Garnier - Opéra National de Paris (1.8 mi) make Le Tsuba Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Paris. Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to L'Avenue, L'Avant Comptoir, or Pedra Alta. Otherwise, you may want to check out a steakhouse such as Le Relais de l'Entrecote, La Poule au Pot, or Sacrée fleur. If you are interested in exploring Paris, check out one of the ancient ruins, such as Archeological Crypt of the Parvis of Notre-Dame, Arenes de Lutece, and Les vestiges des Tuileries. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Le Tsuba Hotel is sure to make your visit to Paris one worth remembering.

Depuis 1973, cette maison historique de 44 chambres & suites offre un cadre unique grâce à son jardin paisible en coeur de la capitale. With its ideal location in the heart of the Left Bank, in the historic district of Saint-Germain-des-Prés, the Hôtel de l'Abbaye is just a few steps away from the most beautiful monuments of the capital. Since 1973, this historic home of 44 rooms & suites offers a unique setting thanks to its peaceful garden in the heart of the city.

Hotel Marignan Champs Elysées 5 star is ideally located at 12 Rue de Marignan, a quiet street in the 8th Arrondissement, which connects the Champs-Elysees and the Avenue Montaigne, Mecca of Parisian shopping, in the center of the famous Parisian Golden Triangle. At the Marignan Champs Elysées, customer service is about making guests feel welcome and ensuring a bespoke experience. The luxurious hotel offers 45 rooms and 5 suites , an innovative bar , a private screening room and a seasonal restaurant. In 2012, the interior architect Pierre Yovanovitch, icon of New French Style, transformed the Marignan Champs Elysées Hotel into an island of contemporary luxury, a serene and confidential stop in the heart of the capital. In 2014, the decoration of the Canopée restaurant is directed by the drawings of Julien Colombier and the technology, AV Exciters agency, architecture of lights. Name: Hotel Molitor Paris - MGallery Hotel Collection
Adress: 13 rue Nungesser Et Coli, 75016 Paris France
Description:
Conveniently located in the 16th arrondissement of Paris, a short walk from the very exclusive and internationally known Roland Garros tennis stadium and only few minutes’ drive away from the Eiffel Tower and the Arc de Triomphe, the hotel Molitor sits in a stunning Art Deco building. Molitor is an absolute gem, an icon for any Parisian. Well known since its opening as the most exclusive swimming pool in Paris for its avant-garde ambiance. It saw the launching of the first bikini in 1946 and later became the temple of the underground scene from 1989 to 2011. In 2014, Molitor was reborn with an entirely new dimension: The 5* hotel Molitor Club and Spa by M Gallery Collection. A perfect marriage of luxury, lifestyle and art, all embraced by our unique signature pools. With 124 rooms including 7 suites, private terraces and amazing views over the 44m outdoor pool, the hotel is a special destination in itself. Clients can enjoy an all-day dinning international cuisine at The Urban Brasserie or taste one of our detox juices at the 1929 lounge & bar before pampering themselves at our 13 treatment room Spa by Clarins. The Molitor experience is different and all-encompassing. From the arrival in the lobby where the 1984 Rolls Royce tagged by the popular JonOne artist stands, the varied event spaces, including a rooftop terrace, to the street-art displays that adorn the walls and the Art Cabins surrounding the Winter Pool that clients can visit with our Art Director.

Name: Hotel Le Royal
Description:
Hôtel le Royal Rive Gauche is located in Paris, in the heart of a district of comedians and writers. It accommodated the biggest writers Ernest Hemingway, Laurence Durell, Henry Miller. Few steps walk far from Luxembourg Garden and Latin Quarter abounding in breweries typically Parisian. Decorated in a traditional and elegant style, this hotel offers a shared lounge and air-conditioned rooms or suites. The soundproofed rooms and suites at Hôtel le Royal Rive Gauche include a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms are fitted with free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the modern-style breakfast room. All types of restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Additional facilities are included such as free Wi-Fi access, luggage storage and an airport shuttle is available at a surcharge. The accommodation has a 24-hour front desk. The hotel is 2 km from Notre-Dame-de-Paris Cathedral and 2.1 km from Louvre Museum.

Description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Paris, France does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel de Berri, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Paris, a nice option for travelers like you. Guest rooms at our hotel in the fashionable 8th arrondissement offer amenities such as air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel. If you are interested in exploring Paris, check out one of the government buildings, such as Hôtel de Ville, Assemblee Nationale, and Elysee Palace. Hotel de Berri, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Paris puts the best of Paris at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Name: Hotel Adele & Jules
Adress: 2 Et 4 bis Cite Rougemont, 75009 Paris France
Description:
Located in a quiet alley of the trendy 9th arrondissement of Paris, hotel Adèle & Jules is a newly opened hotel, with a very chic Parisian style. It offers all services you would expect such as free high speed wi-fi, 24 hr reception with full concierge service, as well as an Honesty Bar, room service, a business corner, a fitness and a meeting room for up to 18 guests. Hotel Adèle & Jules offers 4 categories of rooms: The Superior Parisienne, the Deluxe Faubourg, the Club Boulevard, as well as 2 Suites Capitale. All rooms come with 1 double bed (Queen size 160 or King size 180) or twin beds (2x80 or 2x90). They are all equipped with 40' flat screen TV with satellite channels, Air conditioning, individual safe which can accommodate a laptop, bathrooms with Shower or Bath, Fragonnard amenities, bathrobes, hair-dryer. In our Deluxe, Club and Suite categories, guest can enjoy a Nespresso machine as well as tea facilities. Upon arrival guests can relax and refresh with complimentary mineral water. The hotel offers a complimentary High tea every day from 4 to 6 PM in the lounge area. Continental buffet Breakfast is served from 7h to 11h30, or it can also be ordered in room. Thanks to its exclusive location in a private alley and with the addition of sound proof walls, guests can enjoy total silence in all rooms categories, although the neighbourhood raves with restaurant, cafés and bars as well as theatres. The hotel front desk team will be happy to take care of all your needs: restaurant bookings, cultural activities, shopping tips, bicycle rental, transportation including transfer to and from the main airports. Luggage service is free and available at all times.

An air of the 18th century lingers over the Latin Quarter in the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Pres... And a address at the refined, intimate Hotel de Buci. This 4-star boutique hotel took its inspiration from the great traditions of the Enlightenment. Bringing a modern touch to the boudoir, that great invention of the Louis XV period, this charming hotel on the Rue de Buci, with its 24 quintessentially Parisian rooms and suites, offers the unparalleled experience of a journey back in time. Centrally located in the centre of historic Saint-Germain-des-Pres, the hotel puts you right on the doorstep of all the leading art galleries, not to mention all the top luxury boutiques. Across the way from a typical street market, enjoy all the comfort of a luxury French hotel in central Paris as you experience the vibrant life of the Quartier Saint Germain des Pres and the whole of the left bank.

Novotel Paris Gare de Lyon is ideally situated by Gare de Lyon. For family weekends or business trips, you'll enjoy a great stay in Paris! Discover our new living spaces combining relaxation and conviviality, and let our baristas help you choose cocktails and mezzes to share. Need an office for a few hours? Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Litteraire Marcel Ayme
Description:
Welcome to the Best Western PLUS l’Hôtel Littéraire Marcel Aymé, your new literary address dedicates to Marcel Aymé, in the hearth of Montmartre… The rue Tholozé, in the Abbesses district of Paris, may be one of the prettiest streets in Montmartre. The Hôtel Littéraire Marcel Aymé and its 39 rooms and apartments stands at the corner with rue Durantin, on the hill that was so dear to the writer. Marcel Aymé (1902-1967) liked to wander around Montmartre every day, meeting his friends in the cafés or in painters’ studios. He was a familiar figure in this neighbourhood where he lived for over forty years. A few minutes’ walk from our Hôtel Littéraire is place Marcel Aymé with the famous statue of Le Passe-muraille (The man who could walk through walls) sculpted by Jean Marais as a tribute to our author and to the character of his short story. A four-star cultural break to discover this artistic Montmartre, with an unobstructed view over the rooftops of Paris.

Name: Hotel & Restaurant Edgar
Description:
It all started with love at first glance. What if it was possible? Transform a dark and antiquated fabric workshop overlooking a small and quaint tree-filled square, into a stunning and charming place coveted by visitors and bustling with Parisians. And the idea just grew from there! All Guillaume had to do was convince family and friends to get involved in this crazy adventure. Photographers, graphic artists, decorators, creators and set designers set up shop, customizing the building and changing it into a remarkable and refined hotel. They created quirky rooms with unspoken expertise and imagination, all overlooking the charming tree-lined square. Restaurant Decorator: Guillaume Rouget-Luchaire Room decorators: family & friends Interior Design Consultant: Barbara Bachman Photographer: Thomas Millet Graphic Design: Simone Agency

Name: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris
Description:
This prestigious address offers the ideal combination of independence and personalized service in a luxurious setting. Located in Paris' 16th arrondissement, between the Trocadero and the Avenue des Champs-Elysees, the residence comprises two buildings, each with its own unique ambience. They effortlessly combine celebrated architect Ricardo Bofill's modernism with stately Haussmannian style. Enjoy the warm, elegant atmosphere of this exceptional 19th-century building, with its wood paneling, drapes, fine net curtains and exquisite gilding. The tasteful color palette perfectly accents the subtly refined decor. The building designed by Ricardo Bofill offers a more contemporary style, which features rounded contours and natural light. Our 112 spacious rooms and apartments boast generous volumes - a rare luxury in the City of Lights. The Suite Tour Eiffel offers an exceptional view of its namesake monument. You'll enjoy the welcoming atmosphere in the different lounge areas, where plush sofas invite you to put up your feet and relax while taking in the sumptuous surroundings. If you need to relax, take a break in the residence's Turkish bath. The gym and a personal fitness coach are also at your disposal. Live like a Parisian in the French capital's most exclusive neighborhood, just a few steps from museums, theaters, luxury-brand shopping and celebrated restaurants.

Personal welcome and first class services await you in the heart of Paris Rive Gauche. Our staff is attentive to your needs and strives to ensure that your stay in the capital is a memorable occasion. Our staff welcomes you to our relaxing family establishment all year round. The front desk is open 24/7 and we strive to ensure that your stay in Paris runs smoothly and would be delighted to advise you on places to visit in the capital or make reservations for you. The hotel offers free and unlimited access to : WIFI, computer, printer, coffee machine (organic coffee and organic tea), luggage room, national and international newspapers, and also have a bar and laundry and dry cleaning service. Our 23 rooms all offer peace and comfort in a sleek atmosphere... The ideal conditions for working or resting quietly. All are air-conditionned, and have a flatscreen TV , international channels, a telephone, an electronic safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with bath or shower, washbasin, toilet, hairdryer. Get off to a great start to the day with our gourmet breakfast, served buffet style ! Enjoy it in the vaulted dining room with exposed stone walls and a blend of warm colors, or in your room.

Name: Esmeralda Hotel
Adress: 4 rue Saint Julien le Pauvre, 75005 Paris France
Description:
One of the most original hotel in the French capital. Opened over 100 years ago in a 17th century building, the Esmeralda Hotel bears the name of the gypsy girl that, thanks to her grace, illuminated the story by Victor Hugo. Central, well communicated, charming, quiet, comfortable ... Each room is unique and has its own personality. Artists such as Hugo Pratt, Bejart, Gainsbourg ... were regular clients at the hotel. You can also talk about Paris, art and literature as most of our receptionists are writers and poets with PhD at the Sorbonne. Please, do not miss the authentic flavor of the Latin Quarter. Be warmly welcomed at the nearest hotel to Notre Dame for the best value for money in Paris: the staff will immediately address all your queries with their proverbial kindness.

Name: Hotel Eugene en Ville
Description:
An impromptu pied a terre or a Parisian holiday address for an extended stay, Hotel Eugene en Ville offers guests superior hospitality with spirited service. The emphasis is on creating a mixed palette of styles. The raw-finished walls and industrial furniture poke fun at more traditional features and appointments. Dark Victorian patinas, ornate mirrors and candelabras, soft, cosy armchairs and curios – all handpicked from antique shops and markets – create a style that is at once refined and iconoclastic. The chemistry is simply compelling. On the same eccentric register, a giant screen shows snippets of life inside a luxury hotel: an unconventional film that takes a witty look at an establishment that is well and truly frequented in every sense of the word. The hotel has inherited the sort of elegance that never seeks to look overly sophisticated. It possesses the kind of charm that always feels spontaneous: that truly Parisian effortless chic that Eugene holds the secret to.

Name: Hotel Therese
Description: Discreet and warm, Hotel Thérèse is just reborn. You are invited to rediscover the new hotel with its chic retro charm where comfort and wellbeing remain the key elements. Rich colors and fabrics deliberately faded or given a patina were chosen to combine a 20TH century vintage look with the neo industrial atmosphere of a loft Here you will discover a new Parisian elegance that mixes modernity and creativity, always taking its inspiration from the main decorative trends of the past decades.

Name: Hotel du Jeu de Paume
Adress: 54 rue Saint Louis en L Ile, 75004 Paris France
Description: The Hotel du Jeu de Paume is a charming 4* hotel created in a former 17th century royal jeu de paume; it was fully renovated during summer 2010 and decorated in the "Arty" style. The rooms are cosy and comfortable, overlooking the small patio garden in which breakfast or drinks can be served. The Jeu de Paume is located in the historical heart of Paris on the Island Saint Louis, at walking distance from the cathedral Notre Dame, the Latin Quarter..

Name: Hotel Exquis by Elegancia
Description:
With this new hotel opened in September 2015, artist Julie Gauthron carries you into the world of surrealism and art, where the mysterious is omnipresent. The 42 rooms have been decorated in a retro style, with bargained furniture that tells a story of its own. A unique piece of collective and original art is displayed in each room. These artworks are based upon the “exquisite corpse” concept; several artists have contributed to their creation by bringing in their own unique style. The result tells a fantastic story to be discovered in the hotel’s common areas as well. Located in the 11th arrondissement of Paris, a few minutes from Bastille and in a popular district among artists and antique dealers, Hotel Exquis welcomes guests in an artistic and colorful location that makes it the ideal place to stay during your leisure and business trips.

Each of them has a flat screen TV, free wifi access and a bathroom with bathtub. Our two rooms accessible to people with disabilities are equipped with a shower for easy access. Name: Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel
Description:
DIVE INTO AN ELEGANT, WILD AND VIBRANT RENAISSANCE HOTEL LOCATED IN ONE OF THE MOST LIVELY AND COSMOPOLITAN AREAS OF PARIS. Are you ready to become an authentic Parisian? Let’s start your adventure at Martin (restaurant, bar, terrace) : the best spot in the neighborhood to unleash with friends in a verdant cocoon or for a loosen up and cosy « rendez-vous ». From morning to evening, chef Emmanuel De Oliveira creates greedy locavores dishes, combines to spicy cocktails from our daring mixologist. A full fledged journey with a hidden terrace brimming lushy vegetation and cheerfully colored furniture create this unique atmosphere. Get inspired from local lovers and artists of the neighborhood. Discover Canal Saint-Martin with its designer boutiques and urban artworks – it’s perfect for a stroll. Along the Canal banks play a game of stone skipping and bounce up to the Marais. The Paris historic district is here! It offers plenty of treasures. And the city is never ending, so get in to the vibe of Parisian nightlife at Place de la République with its cafes, speakeasy bars, famous clubs and concerts. All this with your bed located just a stone’s throw away. It is in our Renaissance Spa by Sothys and in our fitness center that it will be possible to take care of yourself, recharge your batteries, and relax.

Furnitures from Les Histoires d'Alice et Cie were created to tone with the patterns on our wall paper fabrics from Manuel Canovas, Toiles de Mayenne and Pierre Frey. It is convenient to the Olympia music hall and theatres such as Theatre De La Michodière, Théâtre de Paris, Théâtre de la Pépinière, Théâtre Edouard VII, Théâtre Daunou, Théâtre des Variétés and Théâtre du Gymnase. Today the hotel combines modern comfort with distinguished service, keeping the soul of the 1930s hotel creating a warm Parisian experience. Located in one of the most typical areas of Paris walking distance from Pigalle and from major Parisian Department stores this elegant hotel has 90 rooms and 16 suites wich offer modern conveniences and majestic views of Paris.
