Name: Juliana Hotel Paris
Description:
Located on Rue Cognacq Jay in the 7e arrondissement, just a few minutes away from the capital's celebrated tourist sites, the Juliana Paris Hotel allows its guests fast and easy access to the city's main cultural sites and tourist attractions: the Eiffel Tower, the Champ-de-Mars, the Quai Branly museum, the Arc de Triomphe, the Invalides, the Grand Palais and also the famous Avenue Montaigne, with its prestigious luxury boutiques and designer shops. The decor of the Juliana Paris Hotel has been meticulously designed. In the bar, the breakfast room, the communal areas, everywhere one looks, beautiful decorative items from all four corners of the world catch the eye. The magnificent chandelier, extravagant mirrors, ethnic statues, art brut sculptures, pictures and paintings, tribal objects, designer furniture, oriental touches, a mother-of-pearl and chrome side table; unique items that give the hotel its own individual character and its refined atmosphere, where Art Deco blends superbly with the contemporary. This warm yet modern ambiance also extends to the 40 rooms and suites and to the health club reserved exclusively for the use of our guests. Steeped in history, the Juliana Hotel gives you the opportunity to order and customise your services online, to make your stay even more comfortable and truly unforgettable. Welcome to the Juliana Hotel, Paris!

Name: Suites & Hotel Helzear Montparnasse
Adress: 40 rue Liancourt Tour Montparnasse, 75014 Paris France
Description:
It is in the heart of the lively Montparnasse neighbourhood and steps away from rue Daguerre, well known for its food corners, that you will discover our most atypical and charming address. You will be delighted first by the paved shaded courtyard of our garden which invites you to a quiet Parisian moment then by the originality of these 14 Suites and apartments all different from one another. If the vintage decoration has been picked up carefully and respects the codes of this protected site, comfort and services are truly modern. Come discover solo, the two of you or with your family this magnificent location which reminds of a prestigious family pension by its size and intimacy. Our 14 Suites and apartments, all different, respect faithfully our intimate address. All our rooms overlook our beautiful quiet courtyard. Caring about preserving the authenticity of this unique property, each Suite associates modernity with attachment to noble material and character furniture. Solo travellers, couples or family in Paris for business or to discover the city, our Suites and apartments can accommodate up to 6 people. In each Suite, you can make the choice to retreat from the Parisian buzz and to allow yourself a true Parisian moment by cooking your own meal, at home, while benefiting from prestigious hotel services. The living Montparnasse neighbourhood is well known for its creperies, its historical bistros and attractions such as the Montparnasse tower or the Catacombs. In addition to the cultural wealth of the neighbourhood you will be ideally located for your business or family trips. Discover below all the opportunities to wander around Paris and its surroundings from the hotel. We are well located to make the most of the beautiful Parisian monuments: • Montparnasse tower, 15 minutes’ walk • Catacombs, 9 minutes’ walk On the shopping side, you will be spoiled too! We are located: • 15 minutes’ walk from the Galeries Lafayette Montparnasse • 15 minutes’ walk from the rue de Rennes • 30 minutes’ walk from the Bon Marche If you are here for business reasons, we are: • 7 minutes’ walk from the Gaite Metro station (M°13) • 15 minutes’ walk from Montparnasse-Bienvenue Metro station (M°4, M°6, M°12, M°13) • 8 minutes’ walk from the Denfert-Rochereau Metro station (M°4, M°6, RER B) • 10 minutes’ walk from the Montparnasse rail station • 20 minutes by Metro from Porte de Versailles from the Gaite Metro station (M°13) • 30 minutes by Metro from business area La Defense from Gaite Metro station (M°13 and M°1) And if you have time to explore the Parisian museums, you are best placed for: • Giacometti Institute, 8 minutes’ walk • Cartier Foundation, 10 minutes’ walk • General Leclerc’s Museum, 10 minutes’ walk • Bourdelle Museum, 20 minutes’ walk Finally, if you are here with your family, nothing could be easier! • Luxemburg garden, 25 minutes’ walk • Disneyland Paris: 50 minutes by RER from Denfert-Rochereau station (RER B then RER A) • Palace of Versailles: 15 minutes by train from Montparnasse train station, then 20 minutes’ walk • Palace of Vincennes: 45 minutes by Metro from the Gaite station (M°13 then M°1)

Name: The Chess Hotel
Description:
The Chess Hotel opened in 2014 in one of the most prestigious areas of Paris. Located close to the Opera, La Madeleine, the Grands Magasins department stores, and La Bourse, the Paris stock exchange, it is a unique establishment in many ways. Firstly, it astonishes with its compelling aesthetics. It boasts an original design by Gilles and Boissier, which makes striking use of beautiful materials such as linen, oak and Carrara marble. It features the bold and innovative artwork of Cyprien Chabert. From the curvaceous furniture and quality fabrics to the hues of the wood and the shape of the fixtures, no detail was left to chance. A harmonious and elegant decor has been created that is like no other. While chic and refined, the Chess Hotel is also distinguished by its welcoming and cosy atmosphere, which transforms each room into a true haven. The heart of the city beats just beyond our doorstep. Yet somehow the hotel seems miles away from any hustle and bustle. Travellers are invited to enjoy absolute relaxation. A game of chess by the fire or a quiet hour's reading on the inner terrace. Perhaps an evening spent in blissful privacy amidst the original decor and intimate atmosphere of your room. After long hours of work, or a busy day's sightseeing, you will appreciate the calm and gentle ambience of the Chess Hotel. The Chess Hotel is also exceptional in terms of facilities and services. It is a place distinguished by our efficient, yet warm and gracious, hospitality. It is a place that transcends routine. We are proud that our guests are so much more to us than simply clients. It is a charmingly friendly hotel which places an accommodating and helpful team at the disposal of all guests. We are pleased to provide personalised services and thoughtful recommendations for discovering the treasures of Paris, allowing you to venture off the beaten paths of the capital.

Name: Villa Royale
Description:

Because of the shape of the building, most of the rooms have a view on Montmartre and Sacré-Coeur.In their time, Toulouse-Lautrec and Picasso frequented the establishment. The décor takes its inspiration from the world of the theatre. Details are numerous and the rococo style is clearly evident. Deep reds, tassels and tufted velvets are omnipresent, as is the decorative gilding, which even surrounds the plasma TV screens.In the Suites, a fireplace adds to the cosy atmosphere and a whirlpool bath invites guests to let laziness take over. Name: Libertel Canal Saint-Martin
Description:
The Hotel's 69 rooms, entirely renovated and air-conditioned, are contained in 3 small typical Parisian buildings joined by a courtyard and a garden. The largest building has 38 rooms overlooking the main street. Some, named "Paris Comfort" offers a balcony with stunning views of the Butte Montmartre and the Sacre-Coeur. The 25 rooms of the second building, called "Privilege" as is peacefully located in the yard and garden. Warm tones married to white duvets give their charm and intimacy. The 6 remaining rooms, named "Villa Cosi", renovated in warm colors are located in a charming town house, surprisingly quiet for the middle of Paris. The approach of our architects was to rethink the rooms as comfortable cocoons using a rational and highly practical layout to make all the services immediately accessible along the walls. The choice of materials and subtly contemporary colours give a chic touch of elegance and design to the decor. The comfort and modernity are enhanced by the presence of large flat screen television with TNT and satellite, new bedding with quilt instead of the traditional bedspreads.

The private bathrooms contain a hairdryer, a towel dryer, free toiletries and either a bathtub or a shower. A full buffet breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. You will find many bars and restaurants in the Daguerre street, which is famous for its typical Parisian atmosphere, this street has a cosy market place and becomes pedestrian each Sunday. The Montparnasse Daguerre Hotel also provides 24-hour reception, free coffee, newspapers and free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel. The Hotel is situated between the Montparnasse Cemetery, Montparnasse Train Station and two Metro stations, which provide direct access to the Montmartre, the Eiffel Tower, the Latin Quarter and the Notre-Dame Cathedral. The famous Catacombs are only 10 minutes away. 14th district of Paris is a great choice for travellers interested in monuments, museums, culture and a typical Parisian atmosphere.

Name: Holiday Inn Paris - Montmartre, an IHG hotel
Description:
Holiday Inn Garden Court Montmartre Hotel in Paris is conveniently located in the highly desirable yet quiet district of Montmartre. The hotel is within walking distance of the famous Basilica Sacre Coeur, which provides amazing views of Paris thanks to its hilltop location. And why not spend your evenings in the famous cabaret Le Moulin Rouge. Located almost on the hotel s doorstep, this provides a valuable insight into the lives of the famous painters who used to live in Montmartre (Picasso, Utrillo, Salvador Dali) This charming hotel and its multilingual staff provide warm and friendly personal service. You are sure to spend an exceptionally quiet and restful night in our large, comfortable rooms. In the morning, enjoy a generous breakfast buffet in the presence of a beautiful fresco depicting the famous stairs of Montmartre. Then, sit back and drink a final coffee on the attractive terrace The Holiday Inn Garden Court Montmartre Hotel in Paris is also conveniently located if you are travelling on business. It is within easy reach of most of the major companies, which are situated in Saint-Ouen, Clichy, Saint-Denis and La Defense, as well as the Convention and Exhibition Center Paris-Nord Villepinte. It also provides direct Metro access to Paris-Expo Porte de Versailles Come and enjoy a wonderful stay with us. We look forward to meeting you as a guest.

Name: Citadines Didot Montparnasse
Description:
Situated between the Paris Expo Portes de Versailles exhibition centre and the Gare Montparnasse train station, Apart’hotel Citadines Didot Montparnasse Paris enjoys a privileged position at the heart of a quiet, “typically Parisian” residential district. The surrounding buildings are magnificent examples of late 19th and early 20th century architecture, and there are many local shops. Streets that bustle with open-air markets give way to unassuming and peaceful little alleyways. The surroundings are refreshingly green, thanks to the public gardens and acacias that line the main routes. With the quiet of rue Didot to one side and the greenery of the garden to the other, your Apart Hotel offers you both comfort and convenience. The serviced apartments hotel is just ten minutes’ by car – or 4 tram stops – from Porte de Versailles and its Parc des Expositions exhibition centre, a year-round venue for major Parisian trade fairs. Numerous bus routes enable you to travel throughout Paris while soaking up the atmosphere of the capital: the no. 58 bus takes you to Montparnasse station in under 10 minutes. The reception is open 24/7. Whether you are in Paris for a long stay or just passing through, our serviced apartments offer everything you could need for your well-being. Stay on your own or as a couple in a studio, or opt for serviced apartments for three or four, with living room and bedrooms. Whichever you choose, you’ll feel right at home. From fully equipped kitchens to complementary WiFi and air conditioning, everything has been designed for your comfort. A range of a la carte services – including daily housekeeping, dry cleaning and a car park – is also available. Each Studio and Apartment houses a bathroom inclusive of a hairdryer, with separate toilet in Studios and One-Bedroom apartments, a fully-equipped kitchen area complete with stove, microwave/grill, dishwasher and fridge. Each apartment has a TV with satellite channels, safe deposit box and direct-line phone. All our Studios and Apartments are fully air-conditioned. Linen and towels are provided. The apartment is cleaned with linen and towels changed for free once a week. Additional housekeeping service is available upon request and is charged according to your needs.

Name: Hotel Lancaster Paris Champs-Elysees

This address is a piece of heaven nestled in the heart of Paris that offers the utmost comfort and refinement to its guests. The 45 rooms and 11 suites are mostly situated around a beautiful courtyard that provides guests with a calm and peaceful atmosphere, the ideal place for lunch or dinner, afternoon tea or cocktails carefully prepared by the barman. Inside, contemporary and traditional elements merge to create a harmonious balance; every detail has been taken care of to create a classic and elegant atmosphere. The Hotel Lancaster is incredibly rich in history. Monsieur Restaurant has been created at Hotel Lancaster serving seasonal, regional and authentic French countryside cuisine sourcing fresh ingredients from each locality. Each month a different region is celebrated for guests to discover and savour combining both simple and complex tastes filled with countryside conviviality. Patrons of the restaurant have a chance to experience the delight of each different area without travelling out of Paris. The mix of authenticity and glamour in the decor coupled with warm and friendly staff make the Hotel Lancaster a refuge in the heart of bustling Paris. The Bar of Lancaster offers an intimate atmosphere to relax and savour a personalised and exclusive cocktail.

Description:

Name: Maison Armance
Description:
"A private address in the heart of Paris" If you are looking for a Parisian pied-a-terre, then you are sure to be seduced by Maison Armance, the new 4 stars boutique hotel on Rue Cambon. To find it, stop outside number 5, which was home to Stendhal at the beginning of the 19th century. Today, the mansion is known as Maison Armance, in homage to the novel penned by the French writer. After opening the carriage door, walk through the typically Parisian porch and cross the peaceful courtyard. Let yourself be transported to another world. Take the lift straight to the top floor where your welcome awaits. Once you have your room key in hand, head to the floor shown and cross the hallway designed in the style of a winter garden, calling to mind the orange trees in the Jardin des Tuileries. Enter your room. The parquet floors and molding, a common thread in an unfolding story, accentuate the furniture that has been specially designed for the space. Each room features an authentic print whose finesse is sure to impress. The unusual layout of the reception on the 6th floor plunges you into the world of a French literary and artistic salon. The windows offer a unique view over the capital and transport you in a space flooded with natural light.
Read more

Name: Le 1er Etage Opera
Description:
1er Etage Opera is an innovative hospitality concept that combines the comfort of a refined boutique hotel and the authentic charm of a guest house in an elegant Paris apartment. Enjoy a prime central location in a typical Parisian town house at the 1er Etage Opera, which blends the vintage style of the 50s with elegant contemporary furniture, creating a true home away from home for our guests visiting Paris. Each of the 6 rooms is unique and you feel immediately at home in this exclusive location in the center of Paris. Breakfast is served in the living room. We offer complementary soft drinks, coffee Nespresso, tea Mariage Frères, and cookies to make your stay relaxing and easy as possible! 1er Etage offers soundproofed rooms, equipped with a queen size bed (160 x 200), air conditioning, flat screen TV, private toilets, shower or bath, and free WIFI. Children under 12 years can not be accommodated at the hotel, and pets are not allowed. Our reception is open 7:30 to 1:30 p.m., but access is possible 24/24 using a system of codes. Conveniently located near the Opéra Garnier and a 3-minute walk from Galeries Lafayette, 1er Etage Opera is the ideal base for visitors to Paris! 1er Etage Opera is a sister property of the 1er Etage Marais, managed by the same owners, with the same spirit

Name: HotelHome Paris 16
Adress: 36, rue George Sand 16 Arr., 75016 Paris France
Description:
HotelHome Paris 16 is a residential hotel with 17 apartments in a recently renovated Haussmanian building in Paris’ 16th arrondissement. HotelHome Paris 16 is a pleasant house of charming dimensions, situated in the heart of a welcoming and residential, calm and elegant area of Paris, not far from the Eiffel Tower, Roland Garros, and the Auteuil and Passy districts. The Champs Elysées and Paris’ major tourist and culture spots are accessible by Métro (Jasmin – line 9 or Michel-Ange/Auteuil and Michel-Ange/Molitor – line 10), RER (Boulainvilliers – line C) and bus (lines 22 and 52). HotelHome Paris 16 offers several types of apartments of which rates per night vary according to : • the chosen apartment (Junior Suite, Twin Suite, Suite Double, Family Suite), • the number of persons occupying the apartment (between one and six persons), • the duration of the stay (rate for 1 or 2 nights, 3 or 4 nights, 5 to 9 nights, 10 to 19 nights, 20 nights and more). These rates include V.A.T and charges such as those for heating, electricity, and water. You need to add the local tax for the City of Paris (1€ per person and per night). Our apartments all have at least two rooms (bedroom and lounge), and all have an equipped kitchen (or kitchenette) and a bath/shower room. The kitchens, kitchenettes, bathrooms with bathtub or with shower have all been recently completely renovated. Our largest apartments (Twin Suite, Suite Double and Family Suite) are all air-conditioned, accessible by lift, and have a charming lounge/dining room with fireplace, warm parquet flooring complemented with a soft carpet and crown mouldings on the ceiling, one (or more) spacious and comfortable bedrooms, one (or two) bath (or shower) rooms and a fully equipped kitchen. Our smaller apartments (Junior Suite), also air-conditioned, are accessible by staircase and have a small lounge with an equipped kitchenette, a spacious bedroom and a bathroom with shower. Old-style charm lives in harmony with the most modern technology: direct telephone line, television with international cable channels, and WiFi broadband Internet access, not to mention individual and adjustable air conditioning system in all the apartments “Suite Double”, “Twin Suite”, “Family Suite” and “Junior Suite”. We provide a wide range of guest services and offer our guests a daily cleaning service (our room maids make the beds, clean the bathrooms and empty the bins) and weekly full cleaning service with change of the provided linen (sheets, pillowcases, bath towels, hand towels bath mats, and cloths). We will of course change your linen more frequently if required. In addition to a personalized welcome adapted to guest availability, we offer a number of à la carte services: secretarial work, sending of faxes or e-mails, shopping services and delivery of meals, laundry and dry cleaning, access to the laundry integrated in the basement, baby-sitting, and restaurant, event and guided tour reservations. Our reception office is open every day from Monday to Friday from 9.00 am to 4.00 pm and later in the afternoon and during weekends according to the arrival and departure time of your guests. We naturally always remain at your service to ensure your stay is a pleasant and comfortable one. When the reception office is closed, permanent telephone availability is provided day and night. An access code enables our guests to enter HotelHome Paris 16 outside of reception opening hours.

Name: Hotel Beaubourg
Adress: 11 rue Simon le Franc 04 Arr., 75004 Paris France
Description:
Come to us for a romantic weekend, a family holiday, or for the three days of the Fashion Week, you will be charmed by the quiet and refined luxury of the Hotel Beaubourg which combines tradition and modernity. We offer impeccable service and a personal welcome, absolute peace at the heart of a lively area. Unique rooms with old beams, a cosy decor, and WiFi, provide a welcoming atmosphere and modern facilities. This is a chic hotel open to everyone… With swinging Paris at your doorstep!In a listed building, cosy rooms and lively streets make this a charming three-star hotel in the heart of the Marais… Stroll around the cobbled streets of historic Paris, visit Notre Dame, the Louvre and the Pompidou Centre, drop into a trendy bar for a drink, grab a bargain at the BHV and in the designer boutiques, dine until late in a traditional brasserie… then pop straight back into the cosy world of the Hotel Beaubourg. Old beams and traditional wall-hangings, china ornaments and brand new facilities... Like a cottage with a traditional French touch, the 28 renovated rooms are tastefully styled and have bathrooms with all modern conveniences. Every single one a gem! This is a world outside time with state-of-the-art services where you can retreat from the bustle of Paris in a beautiful environment... Pastel pink, almond green and royal blue, poppy red set off by chic grey beige: the whole palette is there! Pop culture and luxury revamp toile de Jouy, fleur-de-lis and Japanese prints. Antique or painted wooden furniture contrast with modern facilities to keep you connected… Retro fabrics and flat-screen TVs, bright colours and WiFi, damask curtains hiding soundproofed windows... A harmonious balance which comforts and restores.

Superior rooms with balcony, DVD player, HIFI equipment with USB port, facing our courtyard, some of them are wheelchair accessible. We invite you to enjoy an unforgettable stay in our 19th century house with all the comfort the 20th century can offer you.

Description:
In the heart of Ile Saint-Louis, the hotel Saint-Louis en l’Isle has an outstanding location. A very quiet place in the middle of Paris, the Ile Saint-Louis is a village with a prestigious history, symbolized by the 17th century town houses that lie there. Very close to Notre-Dame cathedral, the Marais and Saint-Germain-des-Pres neighbourhood, you will find in Ile Saint-Louis unique Parisian authenticity, well-being and hospitality. A charming hotel by excellence, the hotel Saint-Louis en l’Ile will welcome you in a warm atmosphere. Visible stones, old terra cotta and oak beams make this place unique. An elevator serves all floors, including the stone vaulted basement where breakfast is served.Whether your visit is for tourism or business, the hotel Saint-Louis en l'Isle will suits your needs.

Name: InterContinental Paris - Champs-Elysees Etoile
Description:
A stroll from the Champs Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe, close to trendy french restaurants and to the Avenue Montaigne's couturiers, not far from Place Vendome's jewellers, the newly opened Intercontinental Paris Champs Elysees is the ideal adress for your stay in Paris. It is also the place for business travelers and corporate meetings with its 300m2 of meeting facilities. Located with easy access to Porte Maillot, La Defense, Le Palais des Congres, and Orly and Roissy Airports .Harmony of modernity, comfort, design, a jewel box of unique objects, the Intercontinental Champs Elyees is the new place of the capital that you must not miss. This former private mansion once owned by the Comte de Breteuil, displays a Haussmannian facade which hides from glances two other buildings of surprising architectural style. Once the porch has been passed through, a garden patio and a Renaissance inspiration turret appear. In such an environment the visitor feels immersed in a universe mingling warm colours, immaculate white, works of art and noble materials. The decoration of this luxurious hotel plunges the guests into a warm and comfortable atmosphere.
Read more

Name: Hotel Les Theatres
Description:
A unique hotel for a unique stayJust imagine opening the door of the Hotel Les Theatres and finding yourself immersed in a world in which you are both performer and audience at the same time! Throughout the hotel as well as in our Classic, Superior and Suite rooms, our guests play the prestigious title role amidst a setting in which every detail is carefully chosen to recreate the atmosphere of theatre and pay homage to three of its greatest geniuses; Moliere, Feydeau and Cocteau. Then relax as a spectator and enjoy the comfortable and appealing surroundings in which you find yourself. You decide the theme of your accommodation, and choose the backdrop most suitable to your role. But whatever your selection, the outcome cannot be anything other than happy and memorable, as we offer a warm and elegant atmosphere in which you can give yourself over to the pampering of our attentive staff. We are certain you will wish to return for an encore! Enjoy our turkish bath and our Honesty Bar.

Language_Spoken: English, French, Russian, Spanish and 3 more

Name: La Finca
Description:
Bienvenue à la Finca! Situé à moins de 10 minutes à pied du cœur historique de Paris, le Marais, des places de la Bastille et de la République, l’hôtel restaurant La Finca propose des chambres dépaysantes et conçues individuellement. Bien plus qu’un hôtel 3 étoiles, un véritable lieu de vie qui vous téléporte aux sorties d’une ballade sur les plages des Baléares, hiver comme été, en manteau ou en maillot. On y vient pour la nuit ou pour une sieste, ne serait-ce que pour profiter d’une ambiance déconnectée de la vie parisienne, à toute heure du jour et de la nuit. On y regarde passer le temps et les autres… Toutes les chambres sont équipées d'une connexion Wi-Fi gratuite, de la climatisation réversible et d'une télévision (Canal +). Elles disposent toutes d'une salle de bains privative avec douche ou baignoire, sèche-cheveux et d'articles de toilette éco-responsables à discrétion. Tous les matins, La Finca vous propose une formule petit déjeuner express ou une seconde formule plus complète. Le bar restaurant propose toute la journée une sélection de lèche-doigts typiques des tablées de la grande Méditerranée, ainsi qu’une belle sélection de cocktails, de vins fins et de spiritueux. Vous pouvez également réserver une table pour le déjeuner, pour le dîner pour le brunch servi le week-end.

Name: Hotel Apolonia Mouffetard
Description:
Our hotel is located in one of the oldest and most historically interesting districts in Paris : the Latin quarter. Rue Mouffetard dates back to when Paris was part of the roman empire. Located right in the heart of Paris’s nightlife, the Mouffetard quarter in the 5th district is steeped in centuries of history and is bustling with shops, restauraunts and bars all oozing with traditional Parisian charm. Find out more on the Paris Latin Quarter and rue Mouffetard The 5th arrondissement of Paris is bustling with life and activities The Qualys Hotel Apolonia Mouffetard is just a short walk away from the Panthéon, the Luxembourg Gardens, the Notre Dame Cathedral and the botanical gardens, so it’s ideally located for scenic walks. Our team is also on hand to help you plan your trip to the Château de Versailles or to Disneyland Paris. Find out more on Paris 5th arrondissement A quiet hotel with rooms overlooking the courtyard The hotel Mouffetard is an oasis of calm and relaxation in the heart of an animated quarter, right in the center of Paris. Thanks to it's construction around a courtyard, the 42 rooms, all decorated in relaxing colors, will guarantee you a peaceful night's sleep. Before setting off to discover the beauties of Paris, kick-start your day with a full buffet breakfast.

Name: Hotel Bonsoir Madame
Description:
Si vous recherchez un hôtel à Paris, alors l'Hôtel Bonsoir Madame est le choix idéal. Tout proche de monuments populaires comme Le Jardin du Luxembourg (0,4 km) et l’église Saint Sulpice (0,6 km), l'Hotel Bonsoir Madame vous permet de profiter facilement des attractions les plus connues de Paris. Pendant votre séjour L’hôtel Bonsoir Madame vous fait profiter d'une réception ouverte 24 heures sur 24, d'un stockage des bagages et d’un honesty bar. De plus, vous pourrez profiter de la salle de fitness et du spa (à réserver à l’avance) pour vous détendre. De plus, l’hôtel Bonsoir Madame est doté d'un buffet petit déjeuner offrant l'endroit rêvé pour se relaxer après une journée bien remplie à arpenter les rues de Paris. Si vous préférez prendre votre petit déjeuner en chambre, le petit déjeuner continental est disponible et si vous réservez une chambre avec terrasse au 6eme étage, vous pourrez en profiter sur votre terrasse privative au soleil dans la matinée. Durant votre visite de la ville, ne manquez surtout pas les attractions populaires comme Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Paris (1,5 km), Musée du Louvre (1,6 km) et Les Catacombes De Paris (1,5 km), qui sont toutes situées à quelques minutes de marche de l'hôtel. Le personnel du Bonsoir Madame se fera un plaisir de vous servir lors de votre visite.

Name: Green Hotels Paris 13
Description:
All our rooms are light, soundproofed, fully equipped (TV, air-conditioning, wi-fi, welcome platter…), and provide you with a charming Scandinavian ambiance. Our rooms have either a bath or a modern high-tech shower. Breakfast is served from 6.30 a.m. to 9.30 a.m. We offer you a buffet that caters to all tastes (fresh orange juice, biological products, pastry, etc.). The hotel has a bar, a gym and a sauna, where you can enjoy a workout before a long day or relax after work or lengthy tourist walks. There is also an underground parking lot (places available upon reservation). Our welcoming and dynamic team is always ready to help you and answer all your questions, 24/7. You can easily recognize our hotel thanks to its unique green facade made by the highly acclaimed botanist Patrick Blanc. Plants and flowers cover a natural and perfectly ecological system of sound and thermal isolation made of cork. Close to the hotel you can find the Francois Mitterand Library, Bercy park, Paris Bercy Sports Palace, Pitie Salpetriere Hospital, Paris Diderot University, Chinatown, Place d’Italie, the Buttes aux Cailles neighbourhood, Seine riverbanks, Georges Carpentier Hall, Station F (Freyssinet Hall). Our hotel is conveniently located near different public transport stops. A 5-minute walk will bring you to the subway station Olympiades (line 14), which can take you to Bercy (the perfect place to see an evening concert) in 7 min, Gare de Lyon Train Station, Chatelet, Pyramides and Louvre (15 min), Gare St. Lazare Train Station (as well as a famous shopping area) – 20 min. If you take the express underground line C (RER C) from Bibliotheque F. Mitterand station you can go to Gare d’Austerlitz Train Station, the Notre Dame de Paris Cathedral (15 min) and the Eiffel Tower (20 min). Buses number 27, 62, 64, 132 stop right in front of the hotel. If you wish to go to the Porte de Versaille exhibition center, you can take tram T3a from the Maryse Bastie stop, which is only 5 minutes away from the hotel. Our hotel is located in a lively neighbourhood, and a busy shopping area where you can easily find plenty of restaurants, bars and little shops.

Name: La Mondaine
Description:
Vous êtes à La Mondaine. La seule Maison Close parisienne s'étant transformée au fil des ans en hôtel. Un lieu chargé d'histoire(s), un endroit à part. Nous l'avons amélioré sans toucher à son âme, nous lui avons apporté un confort d'aujourd'hui sans dénaturer l'atmosphère. Nous souhaitons que y viviez des instants précieux. Ici vous ne trouverez pas de télévisions dans nos 17 chambres, mais de vieux papiers peints, des tissus surannés, des couleurs chaudes et une profusion de détails et de miroirs jusqu'aux plafonds. Bienvenue à La Mondaine. You’re at La Mondaine. The only Parisian Maison Close that has over the years turned into a hotel. A place full of history(s), a place of its own. We have reinvented it without betraying his soul, we brought him today’s comfort without distorting the atmosphere. We want you to live precious moments there, therefore you will find no television in our 17 rooms, but only old wallpapers, outdated fabrics, warm colors and a wealth of details and mirrors up to the ceilings. Welcome to La Mondaine.

Name: Citadines Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris
Description:
Apart'hotel Citadines Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris plunges you into the very heart of the French capital's 12th district. Explore the many artisanal boutiques in the narrow streets off the main boulevards, or enjoy an extravagant night at the Bastille Opéra. Your serviced apartments hotel is ideally situated between Place de la Bastille and Place de la Nation, adjacent to the famous Saint Antoine university hospital. The spacious and practical serviced apartments are located in a building in a residential street, next to Reuilly-Diderot metro station and 10 minutes from the Gare de Lyon train station. Disneyland Paris is also directly accessible via public transport using the RER A rail line from Place de la Nation. Our reception is open 24/7, and our serviced apartments hotel also has a private car park (charges apply)., Whether you are staying in Paris for just one night or for several weeks, you are sure to find these serviced apartments ideal. The Bastille-Gare-de-Lyon district offers something to suit every taste. Start your day with a stroll around the Cour St-Émilion where shops and bars now fill Paris's former wine-merchants' quarters. Particularly loved by the regulars, Aligre Market is the place to go to discover a simultaneously colourful, exotic and traditional Paris. Enjoy a breath of fresh air strolling along the paths of Parc de Bercy public park, or along the Coulée Verte, a former railway that's been reborn as a green promenade. For an evening out, you have the choice of enjoying classical melodies at the Paris Opera, or a rather more rock'n'roll atmosphere at a concert at Bercy Arena. In the Apart'hotel Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris you'll find fully equipped serviced apartments decorated in a warm and welcoming style. From studios for one or two people to apartments for up to six occupants, all our serviced apartments also come complete with complementary WiFi. Weekly housekeeping is provided free of charge and guests can choose from a range of à la carte services that include meal delivery, babysitting and car rentals. And whether you are on holiday or a business trip, take advantage of the private garden for a relaxing break.

The junior suites on the sixth floor are even grander: their high ceilings, arranged in a carefully thought out layout puts them among the most beautiful rooms in Paris. The buffet breakfast is extra special thanks to a selection of fresh products, as well as the eggs prepared on request by Gloria, who'll serve you an energising meal to start the day. Name: Le Petit Cosy Hotel
Description:
Hidden in the heart of the convivial charm of the 12th arrondissement of Paris you will find a place of unexpected tranquility, next to Picpus and a few steps from the Place de la Nation Far from the tumults of the city, The Petit Cosy Boutique Hotel welcomes you to one of its 22 rooms, for you to enjoy Paris for a night or a weekend. In this cocoon of tranquility lies the real Paris, the one that’s lived to the fullest, loaded with unforgettable memories and far from the postcards and tourist traps. Take advantage of a peaceful and relaxing stay where the modern comforts sit alongside the forgotten elegance of Paris, the one that will surprise you at every instant. Situated on a street with local shops, The Petit Cosy Hotel has its own warm and welcoming Parisian bistrot that is delicately decorated. All of the ingredients are assembled for you to discover the the real Parisian lifestyle. Throughout your visit, our friendly and available team will be happy to accompany and advise you to make you Parisian escape as pleasant as possible.

When you stay at the Hotel du Pré, you will experience the real Paris, enjoying the many restaurants, pubs and shops of this fashionable neighbourhood. Metro Line 7 gives you direct access to the large department stores, the Opera, the Louvre and Notre Dame de Paris Its 40 rooms, its location and quality service make this hotel the ideal destination for a holiday or a business trip.

Name: Mercure Paris Notre Dame Saint Germain des Pres
Adress: 20 rue du Sommerard 5th Arr., 75005 Paris France
Description:
A 5-minute walk from Notre Dame Cathedral, Île de la Cité and Île Saint-Louis, opposite the Sorbonne and right in the heart of the Latin Quarter, the Mercure Paris Notre Dame Saint Germain des Prés hotel enjoys a prime location. The hotel is easy to access from the RER B, RER C or Saint-Michel and Cluny-La-Sorbonne metro stations. Enjoy a relaxing stay in one of its comfortable, contemporary, air-conditioned rooms. In Paris city center, the Mercure Paris Notre Dame Saint Germain des Prés hotel is ideally located in the Latin Quarter to visit Paris, to go shopping or just to hang out. You will find nearby the Notre Dame Cathedral, Saint-Michel, the Louvre, the Sorbonne, the Panthéon, the Luxembourg Garden, and Châtelet Les Halles. Its great location allows a direct access to the Roissy CDG and Orly airports through RER B, as well as Montparnasse train station, Gare du Nord, Gare de l'Est and Austerlitz train station. The Mercure Paris Notre Dame Saint Germain des Prés hotel is a short walk away from the Panthéon, the bar and the breakfast room have been renovated in 2019. The hotel gives you easy access to all of Paris.

Name: Citadines Republique Paris
Description:
Midway between Place de la Republique and Pere-Lachaise cemetery, Apart’hotel Citadines Republique Paris is the gateway to the trendy and authentic Right Banks of Paris you’ve been dreaming of. Just steps away are the colourful districts of Belleville and Menilmontant. A little further south, the Boulevard Richard-Lenoir gives way to Place de la Bastille. Close to the very trendy Rue Oberkampf, your Apart Hotel opens its doors to you 24/7 to make your stay in Paris as enjoyable as possible, whether you are on a brief professional trip or taking a long holiday. In the Republique and Oberkampf districts, revel in the streets that fill with life from daybreak, as the markets set the pace. Explore exotic Belleville and picturesque and characterful Menilmontant. Take a walk along the Saint-Martin canal to reach the alleyways that bring you to Boulevard Richard-Lenoir and on to Bastille. On the way, don’t forget to lose yourself in the little streets of the Marais, the symbol of Old Paris. In the evening, take your pick from among the numerous entertainment venues close to your serviced apartments. Alternatively, opt for one of the bars and restaurants in lively Rue Oberkampf and Rue Jean-Pierre Timbaud, right on the doorstep. Whether for one or two people staying in a studio, or three or four in a two-room serviced apartment, Apart’hotel Citadines Republique Paris aims to ensure that you feel completely at home. You’ll find fully equipped kitchens, complementary Internet access, and more. While housekeeping is provided once a week, you also have the option of requesting daily housekeeping as well as a whole series of other services (laundry, dry cleaning, car park, etc.) to personalise your stay as best as possible.

The Sport Club with an atmosphere inspired by 1930s boxing clubs propose a 22 meter Pool, a warm plunge pool, a sauna, a hammam and a salt cave for complete wellbeing. Collective sport classes, private coaching’s and consultations are also proposed. The bright and spacious rooms and Suites are fully equipped and feature large terraces with a lounge area and a different perspective views of Paris. The Restaurant offers healthy and balance cuisine inspired by the Mediterranean influences. Guests can also savoir Pastries created by Yann Brys Meilleur Ouvrier de France and delicatessens.

Name: Hotel ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes
Description:
Découvrez pourquoi l'Hôtel ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes est l'hôtel préféré des voyageurs visitant Paris. Mélange idéal entre rapport qualité/prix et confort, il offre un cadre économique avec une gamme de services conçus pour les voyageurs comme vous. Le wi-fi gratuit est offert aux clients et les chambres de l'Hôtel ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes sont dotées d'une climatisation et d'un bureau. Pendant votre séjour, vous pourrez profiter des services de l'hôtel, dont la réception ouverte 24 heures sur 24, la conciergerie et le stockage des bagages. Les clients de l'Ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes sont également invités à utiliser un petit déjeuner inclus de l'hôtel. Un parking public payant à proximité est à la disposition des voyageurs véhiculés. Situé à proximité des monuments les plus célèbres de Paris, comme Place des Vosges (3,3 km) et Île Saint-Louis (3,8 km), l'Hôtel ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes est une destination idéale pour les touristes. Vous aimez les restaurants mexicains? Cela tombe bien, car l'Hôtel ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes est situé à deux pas de restaurants comme Candelaria, Baili et Homies. Durant votre visite de la ville, ne manquez surtout pas une des attractions les plus populaires, Cimetière du Père-Lachaise (1,9 km), qui est située à quelques minutes de marche de l'hôtel. Nous sommes sûrs que vous apprécierez votre séjour à l'Hôtel ibis Styles Paris Nation Cours de Vincennes et que vous pourrez profiter de tout ce que Paris a à offrir.

Description:

Close to many public transport (subway lines 2 and 9), this entirely new 3-star hotel offers a charming location and in a pleasant district typical of the 20th area of Paris - including that of the great photographer of the twentieth century Willy Ronis. Between trendy bars, small houses, the lively Place de la Nation and Boulevard de Charonne. Hotel Terre Neuve ***, is an establishment of 17 elegant and modern rooms in a friendly atmosphere. The capacity is 2 people per room, accessible only by stairs. Our rooms offers free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, TV, minibar (service fee), and hospitality tray. Ideal for a business trip or for a visit. Reception is open 24h / 24, all the year. Breakfast available every morning from 7am to 10am at a price of 12 € per person.

Take the time to stroll to the Opera Garnier or do some shopping in the Grands Magasins. On your way, discover the bookstores and antique dealers; take a quick metro journey to the Musee du Louvre, to Place Vendome, or to the Grands Magasins on Haussmann Boulevard. The BEST WESTERN Hotel Opera Drouot is perfect for business customers or for cultural and tourist trips. Discover one of the 39 rooms in the hotel, completely renovated calm and comfortable, all equipped with a flat-screen television, air-conditioning, Nespresso(R) machine, iPod docking, satellite channels, direct telephone and free Wi-Fi. The entire BEST WESTERN Hotel Opera Drouot team is at your disposal to guarantee you a pleasant stay.

Name: Maison Barbes
Description:
Derrière cette façade se cache votre nouvelle maison, nichée à deux pas de Montmartre et du Moulin Rouge nous avons créé pour vous une parenthèse intime et d'exception pour rendre votre séjour parisien unique. Passées ces portes, Maison Barbès vous dévoilera une décoration intimiste avec ses 29 chambres chacune au caractère unique et profondément Parisien. Maison Barbès est le premier hôtel de luxe et de caractère dans le quartier parisien de Barbès. Le design art-déco de l'hôtel rend hommage au passé du quartier et offre à ses hôtes un oasis de style au cœur d'un des quartiers les plus vivants de Paris.

Name: Mercure Paris Opera Faubourg Montmartre
Description:
Housed in a 1930s Art Deco building, the Mercure Paris Opéra Faubourg Montmartre hotel invites you to enjoy Parisian life in the heart of the capital. Stroll to Galeries Lafayette, just a stone's throw away, and discover the bustling nightlife of the Opera district with its theaters and restaurants, then fall in love with the authentic neighborhoods of Montmartre. After a day of sightseeing, enjoy a drink under the beautiful glass roof at our Le Joséphine bar. Occupying a 1930s building with a sublime Art Deco facade, the Mercure Paris Opéra Faubourg Montmartre hotel is located in the center of Paris near the theater district, the Grands Boulevards and the Opera. This elegant 4-star hotel is close to both taxi stands and metro stations, for easy access to all the capital's major tourist attractions. Located in the theatre district, this Mercure hotel lets you get the quickest to Notre-Dame, the Champs-Elysées, Eiffel Tower, Opera Garnier, the Louvre, the big stores and the many Parisian restaurants.

Name: Ibis Styles Paris Gare de l'Est TGV
Description:
Breakfast and unlimited WIFI are included in all prices at the Ibis Styles Paris Gare de l'Est TGV. At the foot of the East Railway Station, 5 minutes from the North Station and opposite the release of several subway lines and buses, Ibis Styles Paris Gare de l'Est TGV welcomes you in its 37 rooms fully air conditioned. The hotel is the ideal starting point for your business trips or family holidays. Name: Citadines Maine Montparnasse Paris
Adress: 67 avenue du Maine 14th Arr., 75014 Paris France
Description:
Nowadays an important Parisian business area, the 14th district is not short on charm. Citadines Maine Montparnasse Paris is set in the heart of this atypical location where former 20th century artists' studios rub shoulders with major shopping centres and skyscrapers that exemplify contemporary architecture. But the 1920s are really not far off. The brasseries and artists' cafés of Montparnasse, so reminiscent of that lovely era, are still to be found and perpetuate that oh-so-special atmosphere. Your serviced apartments hotel is exceptionally accessible, not only for travelling within Paris, with the Gaîté metro station just a stone's throw away, but also for heading off to explore other regions of France, with the Gare Montparnasse railway station in immediate proximity. Whether you are just passing through or staying for several weeks, your Apart Hotel will be an ideal pied-à-terre. Our reception staff are on hand at all hours, day and night. A private car park for average-sized vehicles (charges apply) is also available. During the Roaring Twenties, Montparnasse was the artistic heart of Paris. To understand the district's golden age, head to the Cité des Arts museum, far from the hustle and bustle of the street. But you'll still find artists there exhibiting every Sunday on the Boulevard Edgar-Quinet during the creative arts market. And don't miss the Cartier Foundation and its contemporary art collections. In the evening, take your pick from a choice of performances in the many theatres or take in a film at the local cinemas. Apart'hotel Citadines Maine Montparnasse Paris offers both traditional rooms and fully equipped serviced apartments, from studios for two people to family apartments for four occupants. The latter include a fitted kitchen, satellite TV, complementary WiFi, and views of either the inner patio or the Avenue du Maine. Whether you are travelling for business or pleasure, enjoy a wide range of à la carte services - including meal delivery, daily housekeeping and dry cleaning - to ensure your comfort and independence.

Name: Hotel Beausejour-Ranelagh
Adress: 99 rue du Ranelagh 16th Arr., 75016 Paris France
Description:
I AM PASSIONATELY 16TH ARRONDISSEMENT The thirty chic, quiet, tasteful rooms of this beautiful Haussmann era-style hotel reflect the reinvigorated dynamism of the 16th arrondissement, one of the most beautiful districts of Paris, which has become the hot new trendsetting destination in the capital. We can no longer keep a count of the newly fashionable and cool places in this district. Quietly and discreetly, it has undergone a velvet revolution and around the typically Parisian Halles de Passy covered market, we are now seeing a colourful and exciting explosion of fashion and decor shops, health-oriented eateries, designer restaurants, hot trattorias, dreamy pâtisseries and popular cocktail bars. The 16th has even seized the environmental awareness initiative by becoming the greenest district in the capital ! By strolling through the Jardin du Ranelagh and the greenway of the Petite Ceinture former railway line, by way of embassies and consulates, you arrive in less than a quarter of an hour at the Bois de Boulogne - the Parisian version of Central Park – where you’ll find the Fondation Louis Vuitton and the Parc de Bagatelle, as well as world famous sports venues such as the Parc des Princes, the Hippodrome de Longchamp and the Stade Roland-Garros. There’s a chic and cool movement underway around Passy, La Muette and the Jardin du Ranelagh. Lovers of the quarter who delight in staying here include diplomats, cultural professionals and higher education specialists, as well French and foreign tourists who have fallen under the spell of the timeless and arty DNA of the 16th arrondissement… In harmony with its setting, the hotel has a relaxed, bourgeois and warm ambience complemented by modernist and contemporary works of art, as well as both vintage and designer furniture. The hotel’s owner was formerly an antique dealer at the Marché Paul Bert of the world-famous Puces de Saint-Ouen flea market and her architect son designed a contemporary decor for her establishment that is totally inspired and in tune with the times. To give our guests ample opportunity to relax, the hotel’s two lounges await with their well-stocked library filled with works on art and literature for the more serious-minded and books and magazines on decoration, cooking and tips on getting the most out of Paris for everyone else! You are welcome to curl up on the soft sofas to enjoy coffee or tea, unless you prefer to sit in the inviting vintage courtyard... If you like minimalist and contemporary spaces, opt for the quiet and chic attic rooms with their Flos lighting. On the other floors you have a choice of different styles, depending on whether you select the Classic, Superior or Deluxe categories of rooms. Some have planted balconies or terraces, but all are equipped with furniture chosen with care from among the creations of renowned architects/designers such as Eames, Mies van der Rohe and Starck, tastefully arranged lighting, up-to-the-minute bathrooms with baths or walk-in showers and, everywhere, works of art from the hotel collection. The air-conditioned rooms are cool in summer and heated in winter by our good old central heating and its cast iron radiators. All the super comfortable beds are made in Brittany, and the welcome products are supplied by Maison Payen (1730) in white olive oil, saffron and midnight jasmine. Breakfast is prepared using fresh and locally sourced produce and served in the attractive dining room or in your own room and, during warmer weather, in the interior courtyard. Welcome to Hôtel Beausejour-Ranelagh !

Name: Hotel Bresil Opera
Description:
Renovated in 2014, the Hotel Brésil Opéra opens its doors to welcome you. Whether you are in Paris for a business trip, a weekend getaway or a family holiday, here you will enjoy your stay in the capital amidst elegant, friendly and relaxing surroundings. New the SPA ! Our three star hotel offers 49 fully renovated rooms of various sizes and arrangements, all with a high standard of contemporary décor. Each is well appointed, having quality facilities and amenities designed to provide the optimum comfort during your vacation. The Hotel Brésil Opéra is ideally located in the heart of Paris, close to the shopping district of the Grands Boulevards, the Opera Garnier and many other landmark attractions of the French capital. The Hotel Brésil Opéra enjoys an ideal location in the heart of Paris, situated close to the Grands Boulevards. These famous avenues were designed by Baron Haussmann for his reconfiguration of the city in the nineteenth century. They are renowned as a major retail district, with designer outlets, boutiques, delightful shops and the famous Galeries Lafayette and Printemps department stores. The main cultural and tourist attractions of the city are easily accessible from our hotel. The Grevin museum, the Louvre and the Sacré-Cœur Basilica are located less than two kilometres away. We are also close to the beautiful Opera Garnier, and its eclectic offerings of opera, contemporary dance and ballet. Theatregoers are spoiled for choice in this part of Paris. The many venues include the Théâtre des Variétés, Théâtre des Nouveautés, Théâtre du Nord-Ouest, Théâtre de Trévise, Théâtre du Gymnase, Théâtre de la Renaissance, Théâtre de la Porte-Saint-Martin, Comedia, Théâtre des Bouffes-Parisiennes, Théâtre de Montorgueil, Théâtre Antoine-Simone Berriau, Théâtre Daunou, Théâtre des Bouffes-Parisiens, the Comédie des Boulevards, the Comedy Club, the Feux de la Rampe and the Palace. Not forgetting, of course, the legendary Folies-Bergere cabaret music hall, and the magnificent art deco Grand Rex, the largest cinema in Europe. Many fine restaurants are to be found within the vicinity of the Hotel Brésil Opéra. including the famous and very Parisian Bouillon Chartier, the Grand Café Capucines and the Brébant, open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Night owls are drawn to the Grands Boulevards to dance the night away in famous Parisian clubs such as the Rex and the Silencio, or enjoy the intimate atmosphere of cosy bars. There is something for everyone.

Adress: 13 rue des 2 Gares 10th Arr., 75010 Paris France
Description:
Traditional Parisian charm and character "Atmosphere! Atmosphere!" The famous quote from the the cheeky Arletty to Louis Jouvet in the famous French film l'Hotel du Nord. Ideally tucked away in a small quiet street, between the Gare du Nord and the Gare de l'Est, a few minutes from the Grands Magasins, the Hotel Appia La Fayette offers you peace and quiet in a busy and dynamic Parisian district, in an intimate and convivial environment. In the surrounding are you can enjoy theatres, restaurants, the quiet banks of the Saint Martin canal, and the unmissable village of Montmartre, with the basilica Sacre-coeur and the Place du Tertre made famous by its portrait artists. For your professional and leisure stays, you'll enjoy the direct access to the Parc de Expositions de Villepinte, to Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Bourget airports, and the Stade de France, home to the Parisian Rugby Team!

Name: Hotel Saint Pierre
Adress: 4 rue de l Ecole de Medecine, 75006 Paris France
Description:
Located in Quartier Latin 6th arr, just over a quarter mile from Luxembourg Gardens and a 10 minute walk from Saint-Germain-des-Prés, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi internet access. Odéon and Cluny La Sorbonne Metro Station are 260 m from the hotel. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a work space are available in each of the rooms, which are serviced by an elevator. All rooms have private bathroom facilities with a hairdryer and some feature a balcony with a view of Paris. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the hotel each morning, and is served in guests' rooms upon request. The staff is available 24 hours a day at the hotel and can assist guests with planning excursions during their stay. 6th arr. is a great choice for travelers interested in food, culture and history. This is our guests' favorite part of Paris, according to independent reviews.

Description:

With easy access to the airports and to two Exhibition Parks, guests can enjoy their break right in the heart of Paris without wasting any precious time getting from A to B. Our 27 spacious, air-conditioned rooms, fully renovated in 2007, are decorated in a contemporary style to bring a touch of magic and comfort to your Parisian experience. Our tree-lined terrace is not only a suntrap but an oasis of green in the city and a wonderful place to sit and relax. Our stylishly modern bar is a warm and welcoming environment for sipping drinks with friends. WiFi broadband is freely available throughout the hotel. Two of our rooms is wheelchair-friendly. A public car park is only 150 metres away.

Name: Hotel du Cygne
Description:
The timelessness of the place, the warmth of the fabrics and materials as well as the presence of wooden period furniture carefully gathered from years of going round the Clignancourt flea market, they all take part in the maintenance of a cosy atmosphere here at the Hôtel du Cygne. It is an invitation to relaxation and well-being and your host Isabelle has made sure everything has been taken care of so that you feel completely at home. What is more, this lifestyle can be enjoyed in the 20 rooms of the hotel, each one being specifically furnished with taste. Hence, every room has a unique character due to the attention paid to each one of them. For example, a writing desk in the French Empire style can be found next to a piece of polished Provençal furniture or even an Art Deco occasional table. Or you may also like how a particular bedspread actually matches curtains which are delicately adorned with ribbons or even the small bag of lavender that we put in the cupboards so that the rooms carry around the sweet smell of bygone days… Each room has a television set, a telephone and a safe for you to put your valuable items. They also have a bathroom with all the modern comfort that you will need : a shower or a bath, toilets and a washbasin standing on marble slabs that are assorted with the tiled floors.

Name: JO&JOE Paris Nation Hotel
Description:
OPENING ON MAY 19TH ! JO&JOE is a house open for all, a cool and caring social hub! For people travelling alone, in pairs or in groups, JO&JOE offers an ideal and appropriately priced shared or private accommodation in Paris. Located next to the Place de La Nation, JO&JOE is your ideal base camp if you want to explore the city of lights. We are connected to the main touristic attractions with the Line A (Nation) that crosses Paris: a 15 minute ride will lead you to the heart of Paris. At JO&JOE either you come from the other side of the world or just live one block away you can enjoy tasty food and refreshing drinks at the bar and restaurant. The stage welcomes artists every week and our events programation brings travelers and locals together. Delicious homemade pizzas and salads made with fresh and quality products are on the menu. Cherry on the top : a 100m2 rooftop to have a drink, chill or just admire famous Parisian roofs view.

Name: Nuage
Description:
The world is changing. And so are we. After two years of work, the Hôtel Elysées Mermoz is reborn under a new name: NUAGE. Still at the helm, Olivier Breuil has transformed this family-friendly boutique hotel with 22 rooms and 5 suites into an urban retreat dedicated to resting the mind, body and spirit. All with a new décor and a new philosophy to experience Paris at your own pace. NUAGE. First of all, it is a name. It is an invitation to take a break in the middle of Paris and change your perspective. It evokes an ambiance filled with silence and lightness in perfect harmony with the emergence of a world where time is the new luxury. NUAGE features a completely new décor designed like a townhouse turned inward where materials, colors and art pieces invite permanent reverie. In the revamped lobby, you can observe the Parisian sky and its ever-changing moods. Or you may prefer to enjoy the in-house living room and bar where the hotel organizes meetups and events regularly. There is even a library with travel books for a literary escape whenever you wish. NUAGE is home to 22 rooms and 5 suites draped in French linen, custom furnished with sofas and armchairs for reading or meditating, yoga mats upon request and iPad tablets with applications focused on mindfulness and meditation. In the second floor suite, a four-poster bed, an armchair suspended in the air, a bathtub with a garden view and a private terrace take you to dreamland in style. NUAGE is also a cinema where you can watch documentaries or genre films. Share the experience or to privatize the space for yourself with family or friends. Above all, NUAGE is a new philosophy of travel that advocates a more responsible, environmentally-friendly way of living, a focus on locally-sourced fare for breakfast and a "Less is more" approach to tourism so you can enjoy Paris in peace.
Read more

Name: Tonic Hotel Saint Germain
Description:
Sheltered by an elegant 17th century building, the Tonic Hotel Saint Germain is a pure “boutique” spirit property, totally "Rive-Gauche" as we say in Paris, which opened in July 2014. Here, every element has been cautiously considered to accommodate you in a Parisian and timeless place, original, elegant and comfortable... That is the spirit of the Tonic Hotel Saint-Germain. Thus, in the heart of the quarter Saint-Germain–des-Prés, 13 rooms of exception, 13 charming cocoons, invite you to relaxation, to wellbeing, to abandon... The ideal location of the Hotel, at the Carrefour Odeon, is perfect regardless your desire... shopping or culture... daytime or nightlife... all wonderful Parisian sites are easily reachable on foot or by metro, the Seine is 200 meters... Our very professional team will guide and help you if you want, it or turn invisible if you prefer...Each room is a coziness setting where the original beams, as well as the stone walls have been carefully preserved when they existed. We chose design lights, ideal bathroom items, luxurious fabrics and materials, “tailor made” or designer furniture’s; every object was carefully thought before chosen and appropriately placed. Perfect havens of peace, dreamily illustrating the sweetness of life, elegance and spirit of Saint Germain des Prés. In room, free Wifi, direct dial phone, Plasma TV, universal plugs, hairdryer, mini bar, safe, heating and refreshing parquet floor, latest generation double glazing to isolate from street troubles…

The hotel is ideally located, near the Place de la Nation, and is less than 10 minutes from the centre of Paris. The twenty seven rooms are very tastefully decorated and most of them open to a beautiful garden where you can enjoy a delicious breakfast. We offer : - single and double rooms with queen beds - single and double rooms with two twin beds - Family bedrooms: two rooms each with two beds and one bathroom for three or four persons.

Name: Hotel Camille Paris Gare de Lyon, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
Description:
Our 56 rooms hotel welcomes you in a typical Parisian atmosphere, its glass roof and its historical elevator will charm you. It offers a modern and elegant decoration as well as large and comfortable rooms. Located in the heart of Paris, next to the train station Paris Gare de Lyon, Hotel Camille Tapestry Collection is the promise of a Parisian stopover, to discover and rediscover the real Paris. Live it up, welcomed by a team attentive to your needs. Hotel Camille promises you to become your Parisian home and gives you the keys to your gateway in the city of lights. The district offers all the characteristic faces of Paris, at the crossroads of the Jardin des Plantes and the Bastille Square, passing by the banks of the Seine, you will discover many addresses such as the Museum of Natural History, the Cathedral of Notre-Dame or the famous Coulée Verte. Close to the center, you will be able to stroll in Paris and enjoy the many stores of the Marais, a must-see neighborhood when you stay in Paris. You can also take benefit from the strategic location of our establishment, a few steps away from the Gare de Lyon train station and all his transports which will allow you to quickly move in the capital. Our dynamic hotel with a Parisian atmosphere, far from the standard hotels, will also be thanks to his strategic location the ideal place for all the business customers looking for a personalized stay with a team attentive to their needs.

Name: Hotel Villa Glamour

Description:
A quelques pas du plus beau point de vue sur la Tour Eiffel, la Villa Glamour vous accueille à Paris dans une ancienne demeure privée d'époque Napoléon III, transformée aujourd'hui en un romantique et élégant boutique-hôtel de 11 chambres au chic très parisien. Bordée par l'avenue Mandel, qui fut le lieux de résidence de stars mythiques comme La Callas ou Marlène Dietrich, la Villa Glamour est une adresse confidentielle qui connaît une situation idéale à Paris. Vous êtes seulement à 10 minutes à pied du Trocadéro, devant la tour Eiffel, et à 20 minutes à pied de l'Arc de Triomphe, tout en haut des Champs-Élysées...

Description:
Take advantage of your stay at the Hotel Concorde Montparnasse to immerse yourself in the heart of Paris’s old bohemian district. Here you will discover a multitude of different activities: shopping in the rue de Rennes, going to a theatre in the Gaité area, or taking in a panoramic view of Paris from the top of Montparnasse Tower. Located close to Montparnasse railway station, is extremely well located for both business and leisure stays . The 354 elegant and refined rooms of the hotel await you, at the end of a long day, to relax in. Some of them even have an unbeatable view of the Eiffel Tower. Our restaurant, Le 0’40 offers modern, homemade cuisine, including a gourmet breakfast created by our Chef Siakha YATERA, to be tasted and enjoyed in a relaxing atmosphere. Enjoy our beautiful patio, a space where residents and guests are used to sharing a pleasant moment. You can organize your seminars in our many salons. These have a capacity of up to 150 people.

Name: Hotel 33 Marbeuf
Description:
Housed within a Haussmann-style building in the exclusive Golden Triangle area of Paris, Hotel Oscar offers upscale accommodations two minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Each designer guestroom and suite features a small kitchen with oven, refrigerator and premium coffeemaker. Living spaces are equipped with iPad, iPhone docking station, security safe, and a TV and Blu-Ray player. En-suite bathrooms include Italian-style shower and luxury toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is available at the hotel, while tourist information is available from the on-site hotel manager. Guests can arrange to have breakfast delivered to their room. The hotel is located above a convenience store, while the local neighbourhood is home to a seemingly never ending supply of restaurants and eateries. Hotel Oscar is 650 metres from the Grand Palais and a ten-minute walk from the Arc de Triomphe. Meanwhile, the Place de la Concorde and the Eiffel Tower are within a mile.

Name: Panam Hotel
Description:
Un hotel accueillant dans le centre de Paris Situe Place Gambetta, dans le 20eme arrondissement de Paris, le Super Hotel, un etablissement moderne et accueillant, vous propose 31 chambres, toutes equippees. Le Quartier Gambetta - Pere Lachaise vous ravira de part le charme d'un quartier-village avec ses avenues ombragees, ses nombreux commerces, restaurants... Il se demarque par sa situation exceptionnelle dans le coeur de Paris, sa proximite de la Place de la Republique et les nombreux moyens de transports pour acceder aux principaux sites touristiques de Paris ainsi qu'aux aeroports. A quelques minutes de l'hotel a pieds: Cimetiere du Pere-Lachaise, Menilmontant; en metro: Grands Magasins du boulevard Haussman, Opera Garnier, Montmartre...Autant d'objectifs de promenades pendant votre sejour au Super Hotel. Nous sommes fiers de pouvoir compter sur un personnel attentif et efficace qui vous sera a votre disposition durant tout votre sejour pour repondre a toutes vos questions. Le Super Hotel est le lieu que vous cherchez pour sejourner dans la Ville Lumiere : tout a proximite, des installations modernes et une attention personnalisee

Description:
Hotel Jean Gabriel Montmartre is located in the chic and trendy area of "Les Batignolles", two steps away from Place de Clichy, the Moulin rouge, grands Boulevards, and Montmartre. The Hotel offers a calm and comfortable location far from the Parisian bustle.Our 28 rooms are all equipped with satellite TV and flat TV screen, free wifi access, direct line telephone and complimentary tea and coffee making facility.To start the day, for only 11.00 You will enjoy our Buffet breakfast in our typical Parisian basement. Find there fresh bread and pastries, fresh fruits salad, a choice of yogurts and cheeses, eggs and ham, hot and cold beverages.Hotel Jean Gabriel is very easy to reach, no matter where you are coming from, only 15 min away from Gare du Nord by metro with just one metro line (metro 2), 17 min away from Gare de l'Est by bus (bus 30), gare de lyon is also 35 min away by metro and Gare St Lazarre is reachable by foot in only 5 min.

Name: Novotel Paris Centre Tour Eiffel
Description:
The Hotel Novotel Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is located in the heart of Paris, opposite the Seine river and a short distance from the Eiffel Tower. It is ideal for business travel, meetings and seminars, as well as for weekends in Paris as a couple or with family. The hotel is situated in the center of Paris close to the Champs-Elysees, the Louvre and Notre-Dame. It has two restaurants, a bar, indoor pool and fitness room. Free WIFI and secure car park available. The hotel offers rooms with views of Paris and the Seine, accommodating families (2 adults and 2 children aged under 16), as well as a Japanese restaurant with a sushi bar. Swim shorts are not allowed in the pool.

Name: Hotel Auguste
Description:
A NEW HOTEL WITH PLENTY OF STYLE SITUATED IN A CHARMING NEIGHBOURHOOD New name, new style, new amenities. Now more comfortable than ever, the Hotel Auguste welcomes you in a setting that has been completely renovated. Chic and yet also warm, this hotel celebrates design and colour while offering the ideal accommodation in a neighbourhood brimming with true Parisian atmosphere. Located in a quiet street just off the Place de la Convention, and just a few metres from various shops and a Metro station that provides swift access to most of the monuments and museums of the capital, our hotel is particularly suitable for holidays or short breaks. What is more, we are only one Metro stop away from the Parc des Expositions de la Porte de Versailles, which also makes the Hotel Auguste the perfect pied-a-terre for a business trip. Business trips, family holidays or romantic weekends; whatever your reason for visiting Paris, the quality of the welcome, amenities and services provided by the Hotel Auguste is high enough to meet all your requirements. CONVENIENTLY LOCATED BETWEEN MONTPARNASSE AND THE PORTE DE VERSAILLES Non-smoking, air-conditioned and equipped with an elevator, the Hotel Auguste also offers free and unlimited Wi-Fi, a beautiful breakfast room offering a buffet breakfast available from 7:00 to 10:30, and the assistance of a friendly and accommodating team who take pleasure in organising transfers, restaurant bookings, theatre tickets and sightseeing trips for guests. Our 23 guestrooms each have all the facilities you require, including a desk, minibar, safe and flat screen TV, and all are soundproofed. The Hotel Auguste shares its neighbourhood with one of the most high-tech cinemas in Paris, a very convenient taxi terminal and a wide selection of shops, brasseries and restaurants. A colourful and lively market also takes place close to the hotel twice a week. Finally, nearby public transport services enable you to move quickly and easily throughout the city to reach key locations such as Montparnasse, Saint-Germain-des-Pres, the Orsay Museum, the Place de la Concorde, the Louvre, the Place de la Madeleine and the Eiffel Tower, as well as Montmartre and its exquisite Sacre-Cœur Basilica.

Description:
The hotel is located in the north front of Montmartre, in the eighteenth arrondissement, a few minutes walk from the Sacre Cœur and its restaurants ; hotel is close to the shopping and lively Poteau Street, subway (lines 12 and 4), buses or even Porte de Clignancourt (nearby Stade de France / highway to Roissy CDG Airport). Name: Quality Hotel & Suites Bercy Bibliotheque by HappyCulture
Description:
Quality Hotel & Suites Bercy Bibliothèque - an invitation to urban travel ! Just a short walk from the BNF, in a new and still evolving district, the hotel is developing, with a 3-star rating. In total, the 70 rooms with a generous surface area of 12 to 35 m2 combine the comfort and functionality of an apartment with hotel services. Easily accessible, to attract business and leisure travellers, it is located in close proximity to Line 14 and the RER C, which allows it to connect major monuments in a few minutes such as the Louvre Museum, Saint Michel, or Notre-Dame-de-Paris. In the 13th arrondissement, Bercy Village is less than 15 minutes by foot ; the AccorHotels Arena is 17 minutes away. In order to resonate with the art deco spirit of the building, the renovation has been designed around simple and graphic lines, emphasised by geometrical structures. The rooms are available in 4 categories : classic single or double rooms, family triple or quadruple.

Name: Hotel Charles V
Description:
Boutique hotel in Le Marais Discover our hotel in Rue Saint-Paul. The Hotel Charles V, is a little nest of comfort at the heart of Paris. Entirely renovated in a boutique hotel style, the place offers age-old charm and contemporary elegance. Located on the site of the former royal residence known as the “Hôtel Saint-Pol”, home to Charles V and his family, our 4-star hotel is your invitation to discover the different sides of Le Marais and the Village Saint-Paul with its antique shops, its artisan shops, its small courtyards and its authentic charm. When you stay at the Hotel Charles V on Rue Saint-Paul, you can also relax at the bar or in the hotel’s steam room - a well-earned break after a busy day out in Paris.

Name: Hotel Tilde
Description:
Hôtel Tilde is a Parisian boutique hotel located just 30 meters from the Quai de la Seine, a 2-minute walk from Riquet Metro Station and the Bassin de la Villette. It offers access to a gym, a conference room and free high-speed Wi-Fi. The hotel is new and was fully created in March 2018. The Hotel Tilde offers cozy and comfortable accommodation at the best prices. Our hotel is located in the middle of a lively neighborhood with many small restaurants, brasseries and bars. It is located less than 10 minutes from Gare du Nord, Gare de l’Est, the Montmartre hill and the Sacré Coeur basilica. It is less than a kilometer from Parc de la Villette which houses the City of Science and Industry, the City of Music, the Philharmonic of Paris and the Zenith of Paris. It is also perfectly located for the Parc des Expositions de Villepinte. It is accessible to people with reduced mobility and offers adapted rooms.

Name: Auberge de Jeunesse Hi Paris Yves Robert
Adress: 20 Esplanade Nathalie Sarraute In Front Of Face Du 43 Street Pajol, 75018 Paris France
Description:
Halle Pajol consists of a youth hostel, a public library, local activities and a public garden in three distinct but related entities. The hostel was fully completed in May 2013, and is a unique Parsian spot. Commissioned by the residents, the project Halle Pajol began in the early 2000s, following the decision of the city of Paris. In order to answer to the resident's requests, the city hall of Paris decided to build a cultural facility in a sustainable and ecofriendly way. It is in this spirit of innovative and efficient building that the hostel Yves Robert was born. The hostel is located in an environmental-friendly-neighborhood one of the best examples of sustainable development in Paris, between the Gare du Nord and Montmartre.

Name: Hotel Le Presbytere
Adress: 78 rue de la Verrerie, 75004 Paris France
Description:
Le Presbytère Hotel by Les Hôtels Saint-Louis is located in the heart of Paris, close to the Centre Pompidou. Attached to the Saint-Merry church, it is the result of the renovation of the former presbytery dating from the 17th century. Piece of history with its exposed beams, its flamboyant gothic architecture and its eleven rooms with a unique character, the hotel Le Presbytère is the perfect place for the travelers looking for an extraordinary experience. Being a building classified as an historical monuments, the hotel does not have a lift. Our team will tkae careof your luggage as soon as you arrive. The hotel is not accessible to persons with reduced mobility

Name: Hoy Paris - Home of Yoga
Description:
We believe that hospitality can be friendly, nurturing and accessible. We strive to make every stay with us as unique as the guests who walk through our front doors, because everyday is a new exciting opportunity waiting to happen! We have created a hotel that has been built with consciousness at its core, taking care of today for a better tomorrow. HOY is intended to be a meeting place, evolving around health and well being of the body, mind and soul in the heart of one of the world's most beautiful cities, where an international team is waiting to help you make today happen. HOY : House of Yoga We adopt yoga as one of our main pillars. Being not only a practice, yoga represents the amusement of living the present moment, and that moment is today and now. Gathering different disciplines to find a moment with your inner self, to start listening to your body and arouse curiosity. The spirit we're aspiring to embrace.

Name: Hotel Riviera Elysees
Description:
Throughout the years Paris has become a mythical place for the creation and influence of French fashion, and it is in this spirit that the Hotel Riviera Elysees has been recently renovated. Coco Chanel -- evoking her trade, her art, her passion -- would say "fashion is in the air." The wind that carries it. We feel it, we breath it. Fashion is in the heavens and on the asphalt. It is encapsulated by our ideas, ours values and our occasions.The Hôtel Riviera Elysées invites you to discover its "Paris, fashion capital of the world" ambiance. At your window is the Paris of the Place de l'Étoile with its imposing Arc de Triomphe. Near the hotel, many picturesque walks will charm you as you head down the legendary Avenue des Champs Elysées, with its must-see shopping.
