Name: Cheval Blanc Paris
Description:
The Cheval Blanc collection reveals its first urban Maison in the heart of Paris. Overlooking the Seine, just a stone’s throw from the Louvre and the Marais, Cheval Blanc Paris breathes new life into La Samaritaine’s iconic Art Deco building. Showcasing the French art de vivre and inspired by a bold, contemporary spirit, its 72 keys - 26 rooms and 46 suites - along with its living areas, restaurants and well-being facilities were imagined by architects Edouard François and Peter Marino. Chef Arnaud Donckele orchestrates a culinary symphony at the gastronomic restaurant Plénitude, whilst Pastry Chef Maxime Frédéric arranges a gourmet composition from breakfast to afternoon tea at Limbar, facing the Pont-Neuf. Completing the culinary offering, the 7th floor is home to a contemporary Parisian brasserie, Le Tout-Paris, as well as an Italian restaurant, Langosteria, opening onto a spacious tree-lined terrace, embracing the most beautiful views of Paris. At the heart of the Maison, a curved swimming pool adorned with mosaics is an invitation to a sensory escape, whilst the exclusive Dior Spa Cheval Blanc Paris offers a holistic immersion into the world of Maison Dior. Dreamt up for children by sailor Maud Fontenoy, Le Carrousel kids’ club celebrates the family spirit and the importance of environmental awareness. Intuitively pre-empting every desire, the Ambassadeurs carefully carve out each detail, each gesture, each personal touch to ensure every stay is an unforgettable one. Cheval Blanc Paris: more than a new address, a destination.

Name: Madame Reve
Description:
Located in the heart of Paris, a few minutes from the Bourse du Commerce and the Samaritaine, the Hôtel Madame Rêve is part of the revival of the luxury hotel industry. A 5-star hotel nestled in the iconic Poste du Louvre building, this new jewel box offers its guests a unique panorama of an unprecedented Paris. The 82 rooms and suites reveal throughout the day unobstructed views of its hanging garden, Paris and some of the most emblematic monuments such as the Eiffel Tower. The timeless decoration is a subtle blend of precious woods, honeyed marble and golden fabrics. The hotel offers two culinary experiences: a restaurant with Mediterranean flavors, Madame Rêve Café and a panoramic restaurant with Japanese influences, La Plume. The hotel's green rooftop will be the place to meet people and offers a real bubble of nature in the heart of the city's frenzy.

Name: Hotel Les Jardins Du Luxembourg
Description:
Only few steps away from the Jardin du Luxembourg and Panthéon, the elegant Haussmannian style building is located in a dead end small street, providing a peace haven in the very lively Latin Quarter. Sigmund Freud used to stay there at the end of the 19th century. Across from the hotel and listed as a historical building, the hotel particulier of Madame de Maintenon is where the illegitimate children of Madame de Montespan, King Louis the 14th’s mistress, were raised. Packed with history, the hotel offers a warm and cozy environment with a soothing design.

Name: Hotel Clairefontaine
Description:
Located between Montparnasse and Denfert Rochereau, the 3-star Hotel Clairefontaine stands proudly in the heart of the historic and cultural city of Paris near Montparnasse station. The hotel, which has recently been refurbished in a contemporary decor, offers a warm and personal service. A contemporary, cosy ambiance Whether you are staying in Paris for business or pleasure, book your single, double or triple room overlooking the street or the courtyard. Each of our 23 rooms offer the ultimate in comfort, a Wifi access and a flatscreen TV for a fantastic break in this capital city where peace and harmony go hand in hand. The hotel, situated in a quiet street, reflects all the charm of this Parisian district combining a modern and family ambiance. Montparnasse, the ideal base for exploring Paris Ideally located on the left bank in the 14th arrondissement, the Hotel Clairefontaine is the perfect base for discovering the capital's main attractions. You can start by visiting Montparnasse, a cultural and intellectual district popular for its theatres, cabarets and show rooms. Then you can visit Paris' famous monuments : : les Invalides, Montmartre, les Quais de Seine, le Louvre, les Champs Elysées, Notre Dame...easily accessible by bus and on the underground from the hotel. Are you looking for specific information about a museum, a show, a restaurant or bar? Our hotel staff are at hand to answer your questions and to advise you during your visit to Paris.

Name: La Demeure Montaigne

A representative building of the City of Light, this 5-star residence transports you into a palace atmosphere. The Demeure Montaigne offers 93 rooms and suites (including flats), a restaurant, a bar, a billiard room, a wellness area with sauna, hammam, jacuzzi and indoor swimming pool as well as a Thalgo Institute with 4 treatment rooms and a balneotherapy room. Unique location in the heart of the capital, between Avenue Montaigne and Avenue des Champs-Élysées, La Demeure Montaigne plunges you between history and modernity, delicacy and romanticism.

Name: Avalon Hotel Paris Gare Du Nord
Description:
The Hotel*** Avalon is the favorite of guest who believes that confort, a quality service and a central location are the key to an enjoyable stay in the City of Light. Located three minutes walking from Gare du Nord, this is the perfect location if you need a direct access to Charles de Gaules Airport, the Thalys or the Eurostar. The Sacré-Coeur and the Canal Saint Martin are only ten minutes walking distance, and the Galeries Lafayette, République, Pigalle and the famous Moulin Rouge, only twenty minutes. In a typical Parisian building, The Hotel*** Avalon offers a large choice of accommodation. Chose between our confortable, modern and tastefully decorated single, double or triple rooms. Every morning you will enjoy a french breakfast. The wifi is available for free in the entire hotel. We offer daily housecleaning of every room. Notice that one room is accessible for people with disabilities.

Name: J.K. Place Paris
Description:
Le luxe discret d'une maison privée dans un cadre élégant qui allie un service impeccable et une chaleur authentique. Le J.K. Place Paris est la dernière oeuvre de la collection J.K. Place, connue pour ses adresses à Capri et à Rome. L'hôtel est situé sur la Rive Gauche près de l'Assemblée nationale et comprend 29 chambres et suites individuelles conçues par Michele Bonan, célèbre architecte qui a signé tous les J.K. Places. L'hôtel dispose d'un spa avec une piscine intérieure, d'un sauna, d'un hammam et d'une salle de fitness singée Technogym. Son restaurant haut de gamme Casa Tua propose une cuisine d'Italie du Nord déjà bien connue des habitués des adresses à Miami et Aspen.

Description:
Welcome to the Hotel Saphir Grenelle ***! Our hotel offers a modern and warm setting ideally located at the entrance of the famous “Rue du Commerce”, one of the biggest shopping street of the 15th district of Paris « Rive Gauche ». Nearby you can also complete your “Shopping” in the new Commercial Center Beaugrenelle. A few steps from the metro station La Motte Picquet Grenelle, the Eiffel Tower, the Invalides, the Unesco and the Exhibition center of Porte de Versailles. Our “animated” neighborhood, where you will find numerous shops and restaurants including the famous Cafe du Commerce, is a strategic location both for business trips and for leisure and sightseeing. Name: Le Damantin Hotel & Spa
Adress: 1 rue Bayard 38 cours Albert 1er, 75008 Paris France
Description:
Luxurious mansion house with 44 rooms overlooking the river and the Eiffel Tower. A beautiful place to live in the heart of the the city center with spa, swimming pool, bar and restaurant. At the heart of the 8th district, join the iconic sites of Paris in just a few minutes : the Avenue des Champs Elysees, Avenue Montaigne, the Grand Palais or the Eiffel Tower. Filled with natural light, the 44 rooms including 2 suites and Junior suites, offer spaces from 18 to 80 square meters. Fourteen of the rooms have exceptional views of the River Seine and the Eiffel Tower as well as the dome of Les Invalides, the Panthéon and the Alexandre III bridge. Classical style furniture, Louis XVI armchairs, velvet woven by Rubelli as well as fabrics from leading companies such as Lelièvre and Pierre Frey complete the ambience. Each floor of the hotel offers large interconnecting rooms, ideal when staying as a family or with friends.

This 3 star hotel ideally placed and served invites you to discover the capital whilst taking advantage of the calm of its neighborhood and its shaded terrace welcome after a day of Parisian walk. Just renovated and arranged according to the theme of the journey, each room of the Comfort Hotel Davout Nation assumes the atmosphere of the big cities of the world. From Amsterdam to Hong Kong and from Barcelona to New York, the ambiance is personalized with an elegant wall decor. A continental breakfast buffet is served each morning from 07:00 until 10:00. Description:

This well-appointed 3-star hotel offers a range of excellent facilities and services, including tasty breakfasts, a concierge to deal with your questions and requests, a conference room and a charming patio. The rooms are comfortably spacious, have attractive and unusual bathrooms and many quality amenities... Here, the charm of yesteryear blends tastefully with the simple and refined decor to create a warm and inviting atmosphere. Whether you are visiting Paris for pleasure or business, you will find all the peace and comfort you need here. An exceptional location The Elysées Hotel is ideally situated in the heart of the 8th arrondissement between the Champs-Elysées, the Arc de Triomphe and the Place de la Concorde. The hotel is very well served by public transport, making it simple to access the capital’s various districts, monuments and attractions such as the Eiffel Tower, Montmartre, the Lido and the world-famous Grands Magasins (Department Stores). The business centres of La Défense and Saint Lazare are just minutes away by Metro. Don’t miss the opportunity to take a stroll in the neighbourhood and discover its many places of interest.

Name: ibis Styles Paris Crimee La Villette
Description:
Welcome at the ibis Styles Paris Crimee La Villette, based at 15 minutes' walk from the Villette Park and less than half an hour stroll from city center. We provide rooms with satellite LCD television sets, double-gazing windows, on suite bathrooms equipped with hairdryers and free wi-fi. A complete buffet breakfast is served every morning in our downstairs open space. Moreover, our neighbourhood is filled with a large variety of restaurants. All our rooms are accessible with a lift and our reception is open 24 hours. The nearest metro station, Crimee, line 7, is only five minutes' walk and gives direct access to city center Chatelet and the Louvre Museum. You will find ten minutes away, the Villette Canal, one of the branches from the very close and famous St-Martin Canal. Also 15 minutes out form the picturesque Buttes Chaumont Park. A car park is to be found in our street (payable directly on site). We wish you a very pleasant stay in our newly refurbished premises.

Name: Hotel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille
Description:
The Hotel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located between the « Gare de Lyon » train station and «Place de la Bastille». You will have access to the West side of Paris, les Champs Elysees and la Defense, as well as the East side toward Disneyland or the Bercy Arena POPB. You will also have access to all public transport located at « Gare de Lyon » station which will allow you to travel quickly to all the major tourist attractions of Paris. The Hotel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located 300 metres from « Gare de Lyon » train station and 500 metres from the Seine river. The Hotel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is a non-smoking hotel. Renovated in 2016, the hotel is great value for money and open 24h per day. Ideally located for business trips as well as leisure trips, the Hotel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille will allow you to enjoy an animated quarter during the day and festive at night with a large number of coffee shops and restaurants along streets such as « rue de Lappe » and the « Aligre quarters » all less than 10 minutes walk away. Nearby, you will find the Bercy and the Opera Bastille as well as shopping districts, «Jardin des Plantes» and «Place des Vosges». The hotel's location allows you easy access to all of Paris's historical and cultural sites. Direct access to mains shopping areas . You will enjoy the comfort of a hotel. The rooms are accessible by lift and all the rooms, from single to the family room for 4 people, have individual air conditioning. All the rooms are non-smoking, soundproofed and with the comfort of showers, Flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Family room with kitchenette. The "Comfort Rooms" offers additional welcome tray with coffee and tea.

Name: Hipotel Paris Bastille Saint Antoine
Adress: 42 rue de Citeaux 164 Rue Du Faubourg Saint Antoine, 75012 Paris France
Description:
The hotel Hipotel Paris Bastille Saint Antoine is located in the 12th district of Paris, a 4-minute walk from Place de la Bastille and 1 km from the Marais district. All rooms include free toiletries and some have access to a shared bathroom and toilet. The units also have heating and a desk. The reception is open 24 hours a day. Concierge services, luggage storage and express check-in and check-out are free. The property also offers an airport shuttle at a surcharge. There are several restaurants, cafés and grocery stores in the surrounding area. Notre Dame Cathedral and Place de la République are 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 14 km from the property.

Name: Hotel de la Mare
Adress: 20, rue de la Mare, 75020 Paris France
Description:
Located in the heart of Menilmontant, the hotel has been completly renovated in 2012. All rooms include a fully equiped kitchenette (microwave, fridge, boiler, dishes, coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, etc.) So that you can be immediatly independant. Flat screen 32" TV, Wifi in all rooms without any additional charge.On the ground floor, 2 suites and 3 studios with their own private bathroom. On the first floor, 7 studios which share common bathroom space (2 showers and 2 toilets) at a very affordable price.200M away from the Parc de Belleville, 500m from La Bellevilloise or La Maroquinerie, the hotest spots in Paris for alternative scenes, 500m or less from the best restaurants and very calm.What else? Direct metro and bus lines for Montmartre, Champs Elysees, Le Marais, etc.

Name: Buddha-Bar Hotel Paris
Description:
A character Boutique hotel on the corner of rue Faubourg Saint-Honore with its prestigious designer brands and the Place de la Concorde, which breaks boldly the traditional Parisian hotel codes. An exclusive lifestyle destination which combines French art de vivre with Asian refinement and all the elegance of the capital. - 56 Guestrooms including 19 suites The Suite de Gagny 182 m2 is an exceptional and unique "Pied-a-terre" - Rates : from 440 euros - Restaurant Le Vraymonde (85 seats) opens onto a large, lush Parisian courtyard, covered and heated. - Brunch every Sunday, 55 euros per person - Lounge Bar Le Qu4tre serves up original cocktails based on the 4 elements (water, earth, wind and fire). - Activities : Wellness & Fitness studio with hammam and Buddha-Bar signature treatments, Shopping, sight-seeing, Banqueting room for up to 35 guests.

Name: Montmartre Mon Amour
Description:
You’ll never find a better place to say “I love you” than at the Montmartre mon Amour, located in the romantic heart of Paris and only steps from Sacré Cœur.Montmartre mon Amour Hotel guest rooms are provided with high quality comforts to assure a pleasant stay in Paris.Every 24 rooms are a self-contained universe designed to explore a single type of amour: eternal love, true love, passionate love, free love, protective love…Choose from among eight cozy deluxe room and lose yourself in a world of glamour. Each room is an ode to a different French couple known for their uniquely passionate love story.Our four superior rooms offer unparalleled comfort in a unique setting inspired by Montmartre. The powerful color palette featuring fuchsia, red and violet will help spark your creativity.Our 12 classic rooms, four of which are singles, are all providing an inviting cocoon for your stay in the capital.

Name: Star Champs Elysees
Adress: 18 rue de l Arc de Triomphe, 75017 Paris France
Description:
This stylish air-conditioned hotel is located in the West of Paris,200 metres from the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern rooms, decorated with warm colours. The rooms at Star Champs-Elysées are also equipped with satellite TV, a telephone and a minibar. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub. A full buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. You can relax in the hotel’s lounge, which features a medieval décor and period fireplace. Star Champs-Elysées welcomes you 24/7 with multilingual staff. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel, and there is a laundry service. Star Champs-Elysées is 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro and RER Station, which provide direct access to Disneyland, La Defense, The Louvre Museum and the Montmartre district. The famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées is less than 10 minutes away on foot.

Name: Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame, an IHG hotel
Description:
Stay right in the heart of Paris at the chic Holiday Inn Paris-Notre Dame hotel, just 300 metres from the iconic Notre Dame cathedral. Holiday Inn Paris-Notre Dame is a former ministry which has been converted to a stylish eco-hotel, with energy-saving light bulbs and water recycling. Explore the Louvre museum, just a 15-minute stroll away, and take the Metro from nearby Saint Michel Notre-Dame station to the Eiffel Tower and the Champs-Elysees boulevard. Regular trains from the station deliver you to the Eurostar Terminal and airports at Paris Charles de Gaulle and Paris Orly. Neighbouring streets in the Latin Quarter are lined with bistros and enticing patisseries. Stroll from Holiday Inn Paris-Notre Dame to the Gothic Notre Dame Cathedral a few minutes away and visit the adjacent Jardins de Luxembourg park for a break from sightseeing. It's 30 minutes by train to events at Paris-Nord Villepinte Exhibition and Convention Centre, and 10 minutes to companies based on Avenue de France. The hotel's 3 meeting rooms have wireless Internet and room for up to 55 guests. Rise to a hot breakfast in the monochrome breakfast room at the Holiday Inn Paris-Notre Dame. After dark, order cocktails in the airy bar and chat to friends in the Lobby's honey-coloured leather armchairs. You can enjoy the rooftop terrace for a drink with a view of the Paris skyline.
Read more
Language_Spoken: English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 4 more

Name: Art Hotel Batignolles
Description:
Next to Montmartre, art hotel batignolles is a boutique hotel of 29 air conditioned rooms that can accommodate 1 or 2 people with complimentary wireless internet access.A 15-minutes metro ride away from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysées Boulevard, the art hotel batignolles is located northwest of Paris, near Saint Denis Basilique (direct by subway)Tastefully decorated with modern furniture in exotic wood wenge colour, this modern and totally refurbished 3 * hotel is 100% non-smoking including public areas and provides a 24-hour reception and all the needed comfort for both business travellers and tourists.Close to the Parc Monceau, at the edge of the chic and trendy 17th district and a 20-minutes metro ride away from the Porte Maillot, art hotel batignolles is located close to the well-known cabaret Le Moulin Rouge (15 minutes walking distance), the famous rue Lepic and the Butte Montmartre.Before leaving on a business appointment, thanks to the proximity of Gare Saint Lazare or the station Pont Cardinet (5 minutes walking distance) or before discovering Paris, thanks to several bus lines serving the Louvre, Opera Garnier and the Arc de Triomphe; enjoy a rich buffet breakfast, each morning, in a room in a typical Parisian vaulted ceiling

Name: Le Relais du Marais
Description:
Welcome home, welcome home! The Hotel Le Relais du Marais is, above all, a human adventure. One undertaken in 2001 by the Pirbay family around a favourite, although very ambitious, project to transform a modest hotel in the Rue de Turbigo into a chic and welcoming three star establishment. It’s a unique place of its kind. A place where it's good to be received, to spend time, to work. An address that is different from other hotels in Paris; distinguished by a strong sense of warmth, of welcome, of attentiveness to the needs of guests. An establishment whose commitment to quality does not detract from the hospitality offered, and whose contemporary decor does not lessen its historic charm. With the assistance of a firmly united team, loyal and friendly, the proprietors seek to transcend traditional hotel codes to shape the hotel of their dreams. One where there is always a kind word, a listening ear and personal attention awaiting guests. One where, far from any overtly commercial attitude and impersonally antiseptic atmosphere, everyone can feel at home while they are away from home. It’s a home from home.

Name: Young & Happy Hostel
Description:
Young & Happy Hostel is in the 5th district in the Latin Quarter where you can find a very lively atmosphere, with restaurants all along the street Mouffetard, a market on Place Monge every Wednesday and Friday morning. We are also located few minutes ago from touristic areas, Pantheon, Notre Dame, the Luxembourg Gardens...Have fun with us, meeting guests from all over the world, during the Happy Hour that we organize every day from 6 pm ! We have also other events, quizz, fuzeball tournaments, movie nights... Enjoy ice creams and snacks while watching sports on the big tv screen! The reception is open 24/7, everyone can book, in advance, a Parisian breakfast (French baguette and other pastries, honey and jam...). We have FREE wifi everywhere, FREE luggage room and lockers for your valuables. Use our laundry service at the best rate in the neighbourhood. No need to get out from the hostel! Please note that we don't accept guests under the age of 18 without an adult companion.

Name: Hotel Tuileries
Description:
This 18th-century mansion is set in the heart of Paris, 350 metres from the famous Place Vendôme. It features individually decorated guest rooms evoking the 18th century charm and elegance in a modern and innovative manner. Formerly the property of Marie Antoinette's first lady, this hotel offers elegant guest rooms with a minibar. All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a TV with cable channels and a safe. Free VOD and free Wi-Fi access are also provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hotel Des Tuileries, and can be taken in the guest room. Another express breakfast option is possible. After breakfast, guests can read the international newspapers provided in the lounge. Every evening, we have a free welcome drink between 6 and 8 pm. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with tourist information, airport shuttle, taxi or a reservation. Hotel des Tuileries is located 700 metres from the Louvre Museum. Tuileries Metro Station is 250 metres away, providing access to the Printemps and Galeries Lafayette department store.

Practical location of our hotel provides you a one minute access to the subway, easily able to bring you to any place of Paris, from famous Galeries Lafayette and Printemps (10min) to Luxurious place Vendôme and rue de la Paix (15min), through the must see Louvres museum (30min in bus). We can't wait to welcome you in Paris !

Name: Hotel Particulier Montmartre
Adress: Pavillon D 18th Arr 23 avenue Junot, 75018 Paris France
Description:
Welcome to our Private House, the Hotel Particulier Montmartre ! Hotel Particulier Montmartre is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Paris, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. What makes our Private House so special ? Well, Hotel Particulier Montmartre offers you the biggest hotel garden in Paris, with 900m2 designed by Louis Benech (who re-designed Jardins des Tuileries in the 90s). Also, Hotel Particulier Montmartre is the most private hotel in Paris, with only five Suites, each one has been decorated by a different artist and offers a unique universe. Everything is put together to make you feel at home. Hotel Particulier Montmartre is a living place, with a restaurant named "Le Grand Salon" where breakfast, lunch, tea-time and dinner are served (when it is not in our gardens). Fancy a sophisticated cocktail ? You should clearly enjoy our cocktail bar (very private but well, you will be part of the family by then) called "Le Tres Particulier". Rooms at Hotel Particulier Montmartre offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi. A 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service are some of the conveniences offered at our hotel. We also have a valet for your parking service. As you might know or will discover, Paris is a wonderful place, and Montmartre is close to everything you should see and taste ! Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Champs-Elysees (1.8 mi) and Louvre Museum (1.9 mi), guests of Hotel Particulier Montmartre can easily experience some of Paris best known attractions. If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Le Jules Verne, Le Grand Colbert, or Pedra Alta, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hotel Particulier Montmartre. Looking to explore? Then look no further than Montmartre (0.2 mi), Basilique du Sacre-Coeur de Montmartre (0.4 mi), and Palais Garnier - Opera National de Paris (1.1 mi), which are some popular Paris attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel. You might feel like you are time-traveling while walking in the old Montmartre streets but do not worry, you won't get lost, we will always be a short distance walk from you ! One last thing : Enjoy your stay in Paris!

Easy access reach, just steps from the Port Royal RER commuter station connecting Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports, the hotel enables you to make the most of Parisian life.On one side Boulevard Saint-Michel and Saint-Germain-des-Prés, on the other Boulevard du Montparnasse and its famous brasseries. In the heart of the Paris of intellectuals, Hôtel Beauvoir is opposite the celebrated restaurant La Closerie des Lilas, the gathering place of such famous writers as Baudelaire, Verlaine, Jean Paul Sartre, Simone de Beauvoir, Ernest Hemingway and Henry Miller. Take advantage of the calm setting and the friendly, cheerful, dynamic staff for a most enjoyable stay.

Name: Hotel d'Alsace
Description:
85 Boulevard de Strasbourg 75010 Paris - Ideally located opposite the Gare de l'Est and a few steps from the Gare du Nord, the Canal Saint Martin and the Grands Boulevards , Hôtel d'Alsace Paris Gare de l'Est is a 3 -star hotel renovated in 2015 subtly mingling atmosphere typically Parisian , contemporary décor. This accommodation whose building dates from the early twentieth century offers a quiet and pleasant surroundings, while enjoying a lively area with many restaurants , bars and shops. Hotel d'Alsace Paris Gare de l'Est is also well served by public transport (metro lines 4, 5, 7 and RER B) and is the perfect location for business or leisure travelers coming from destinations served by Eurostar.

The hotel offers en suite rooms with free Wi-Fi. hair dryer. The Hipotel Paris Montmartre Gare du Nord is a short walk to restaurants, supermarkets and grocery stores. The exhibition place Les Docks de Paris is 2.3 km away. The Simplon Metro Station is 300 meters from the Hipotel Paris Montmartre Gare du Nord, providing direct access to Gare de l'Est and Gare du Nord Train Stations. This 18th district is a perfect choice for travelers who are interested in architecture, monuments and art.

The Hipotel Paris Belleville Gare de l'Est consists of 3 buildings surrounded by a charming flowery courtyard offering pretty views allowing you to appreciate the particular aspect, and even rare, of Parisian homes. Name: Hotel Exelmans
Description:
Hotel Exelmans is located in West Paris, nearby the River Seine. It offers a nice courtyard, stylish rooms and free Wi-Fi access. Each room is equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms overlook the peaceful garden. There is a 24-hour front desk service at the Exelmans Hotel. Every morning a continental buffet breakfast is served. In summer time, you will enjoy having your breakfast outside in the garden. Metro Station Exelmans is 250 metres away and gives a direct access to Trocadero (Eiffel Tower) and Saint-Lazare. The Parc des Expositions located Porte de Versailles is accessible with the tramway. Roland Garros and Parc des Princes are within walking distance from Hotel Exelmans.

In a home with 50 rooms, traditional comfort, reduced tariffs capacity to meet all budgets, the hotel will guarantee you peace and quiet. Frequent bers (line 4: Simplon line 12: Jules Joffrin) and bus (31, 60, Montmartrobus 85) crisscross the district and you are in the heart of Paris in 15 minutes: the Louvre, instead of la Concorde, Notre Dame Cathedral ... If you come from the Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est, you can easily reach the hotel, public transport you deposit directly without change. Name: 52 Clichy Paris
Description:
Share this chic, comfortable Bed and Breakfast property for 2 with your English host & live like a local. Accompany Rosemary to the bakery if you want, discuss the best way to navigate Paris over an amazing breakfast or share an evening glass of wine on the balcony. Your bedroom can be arranged as a super king-size or twins & contains your ensuite bathroom with bath & shower & a separate, private toilet. You won't spend much time in your room though as the living room & balcony is also for your use. Pop a bottle of wine in the fridge, snuggle into the deep cushions of the huge sofa or plan tomorrows expeditions from the balcony using the high speed wifi. The apartment is quiet even though 52 Clichy is very central - just a few minutes walk away from Montmartre to the North & the Louvre is only 1.2 miles away but before getting there you may want to pop into Galeries Lafayette/Printemps for some luxury shopping, visit the Opera Garnier or wander the Tuileries gardens!

Name: Guest House Opera - Grands Boulevards
Adress: 1 rue de la Boule Rouge, 75009 Paris France
Description:
This studio of 20 sqm, located next to the famous music hall Folies Bergere and the Opera is located in a charming triplex apartment in a central location , well served by public transport ( metro Grands Boulevards ) . It has a separate entrance, private bathroom and toilets, separated. It is fully equipped and tastefully decorated : Wooden old ground , large comfortable bed 160cm with duvet , free WiFi , desk, telephone , safety deposit boxes . It also has a mini-kitchenette with fridge, microwave, toaster, coffee (Nespresso and electrical filters ) ,teapot, dishes for dining and commodities such as salt , pepper, sugar and dishwashing liquid. In the bathroom, you will find: Towel bar heater , hairdryer , shaver point, shower sheets , towels and welcoming products such as soap, shower gel and shampoo.

Name: Paris-Oasis
Description:
On a trendy, quiet street in Montmartre, located at the foot of the famous Sacre-Coeur Basilica (200m), Alexis warmly welcomes you to the Paris-Oasis. Indeed this amazing and uniquely attractive guest house offers to a courtyard, an indoor heated swimming-pool (1,40 meters of depth – 30°) and a beautiful private garden. I live on the property and my 4 high quality furnished flats, from 12 to 44 m2, can be rented separately or together for singles, couples or families that are seeking a comfortable homestay in Paris. Within each unit you will find cooking arrangements ranging from a small cooking area to a full range kitchen. This will enable you to save money by cooking breakfasts and meals for a long or a short term rental in Paris. Thre is everything you need inside the room for your confort. The house is non smoking but you can smoke inside the courtyard or the garden. An indoor private parking: €24/24H. The minimum of the stay is 2 nights. No additional prices!

Name: La Maison Saint Germain
Description:
La Maison Saint Germain is a luxurious and charming apartment hotel. Built in the 16th century, the building is located in Saint-Germain-des-Près, heart of the arty and literary Paris.It will provide you with a Parisian lifestyle instantly. Each accommodation is unique with his own decoration and offers a great view on the boulevard Saint Germain.Our apartment building offers four kinds of dwellings: The Studio (1 to 2 people) Several apartments (1 to 4 people) The Duplex with terrace (1 to 6 people) The Little Maison Saint Germain (1 to 4 people)Amenities: Lift Fully fitted kitchen Safe LCD television Ipod / Iphone alarm clock Free Internet Wifi Air condioning,

Name: CasaO
Description:
A stylish secret hideaway in the heart of Paris, offering the perfect combination between the comfort of a luxury hotel and the character of a Parisian apartment. CasaÔ is located in the authentic and lively 2nd arrondissement, right in the heart of Paris, on the 2nd floor of an Eiffel-style building. The soul of CasaÔ is deeply Parisian: wooden floors, large windows, soft touches with warm colours, and a selection of furniture and art hunted in the antique markets of the historical Marais. In the cosy and well-appointed living room, guests can relax and enjoy a refreshment whilst flipping through the pages of the stylish Parisian city guides. The business traveller will also find all the necessary facilities to work remotely: free Wi-Fi, computers, scanner and printer, local and international daily newspapers. Every morning, your CasaÔ Host will share the most confidential addresses in their little black book and help you curate a memorable stay in the City of Lights. CasaÔ: an invitation to live and experience Paris the French way.
